Abolish PNs therefore<br />\n<br />\n#####################################<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://twitter.com/Swamy39/status/1037191756067078144</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nFebruary 11, 2016 at 7:23 PM<br />\nhi e,<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS BEING USED AS WASHING MACHINE TO LAUNDER SLUSH MONEY OF FOREIGN CRIMINALS AND INDIANS WHO HAVE BILLIONS IN SWISS BANK ACCOUNTS.<br />\n<br />\nParticipatory Notes commonly known as P-Notes or PNs are instruments issued by registered foreign institutional investors (FII) to overseas investors, who wish to invest in the Indian stock markets without registering themselves with the market regulator, the Securities and Exchange Board of India - SEBI.<br />\n<br />\nThe PN system is blatantly discriminatory and favour DESH DROHI ghost investors-most of them are mere FRONTD for Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nFor PN investors, the system is totally silent, even on basic information\u2014while Indian citizens have to go through the grind.<br />\n<br />\nThe FIIs issue PNs to funds/companies whose identity is not known to the Indian authorities.<br />\n<br />\nPNs are used outside India for making investments in shares listed in the Indian stock market. SEBI permitted foreign institutional investors to register and participate in the Indian stock market in 1992.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild placed his STOOGE MANMOHAN SINGH on the Ministry of Finance chair for this and much more.<br />\n<br />\nHe came via the Rajya Sabha backdoor, much like Arun Jaitley today. At least Manmohan Singh is an economist.<br />\n<br />\nArun Jaitley is just a lawyer.<br />\n<br />\nWhy was this unqualified and LOST lawyer made Finance minister?<br />\n<br />\nBLACK MONEY INDIAN HOLDERS HAVE LOOPED BACK THEIR ILLGOTTEN MONEY SALTED AWAY ABROAD AS ANONYMOUS INVESTORS.<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU THEY HAVE MANIPULATED THE SYSTEM BY MASSIVE BRIBES TO REGULATORS IN POWER , TO RIG AND DOCTOR THEIR STOCKS.<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes blatantly enabled their desh drohi holders to conceal their identities-bleeding Bharatmata.<br />\n<br />\nManmohan Singh put the cart before the horse--<br />\n<br />\n-- we know what is happening - world funds are in search of markets, or markets looking for world funds .<br />\n<br />\nManmohan Singh made NO efforts to obtain details of beneficial ownership \u2014 or identity of the final holder or investor \u2014 of P-Notes, or atleast make it non-transferable.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN A RETARDED CHILD ( EXCEPT MODI ) KNOWS THAT PARTICIPATROY NOTES IS A EASY METHOD OF BRINGING BACK ILLGOTTEN MONEY VIA THE BACK DOOR \u2013 OR EVEN FOR DESH DROHI INDIANS TO BE MERE FRONTS FOR ZIONIST JEW BIG BROTHER, TO CONTROL THE INDIAN STOCK MARKET.<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n##############################<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://twitter.com/Swamy39/status/1037191756067078144</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMoney laundering undermines the integrity of business activities..<br />\n<br />\nA P-note is a derivative instrument issued by a foreign portfolio investor (FPI) against underlying Indian securities, which allow these investors to earn returns on investment in the Indian market without undergoing the significant cost of directly investing in India.<br />\n<br />\nParticipatory notes are instruments used for making investments in the stock markets. However, they are not used within the country. They are used outside India for making investments in shares listed in the Indian stock market. That is why they are also called offshore derivative instruments.<br />\n<br />\nPNs are becoming a favourite with a host of Indian money launderers who use them to first take funds out of country through hawala and then get it back using PNs.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_2BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_0T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_0TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_0TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_0TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_0B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c685261002841655447\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_0M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536158168608#c685261002841655447\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 5, 2018 at 8:06 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_0MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) on Thursday proposed tighter rules for participatory notes (P-Notes) in an attempt to curb the potential for money laundering through this investment route, popular among rich individuals and hedge funds.<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes, or off-shore derivative instruments (ODIs), are instruments issued by registered foreign portfolio investors (FPIs) to overseas investors who wish to invest in Indian stock markets without registering themselves with Sebi.<br />\n<br />\nBy their very nature, P-Notes are seen as an opaque route for investment which leave room for round-tripping\u2014the practice of money stashed away overseas by Indians returning home through tax havens in the garb of foreign capital\u2014and money laundering.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to a Sebi statement, the transfer of P-Notes will be restricted and allowed only after prior consent of the issuer. This means that for every downstream transfer of a P-Note, prior consent of the issuer would be needed.<br />\n<br />\nAdditionally, transfer of a P-Note will be allowed only to a pre-approved list of subscribers.<br />\n<br />\nOne of the reasons why a majority of the P-Note investment comes from Singapore and Mauritius could be that the FPI, which is the P-Note holder does not have to pay any Indian capital gains tax if it is based in Singapore or Mauritius under these treaties<br />\n<br />\nThe tax treaty with Mauritius prevents India from taxing capital gains of investors based out of Mauritius.<br />\n<br />\nSince there is no capital gains tax in Mauritius, these investors pay no capital gains tax in either country. Singapore has a similar treaty with India. Singapore also does not have a capital gains tax regime.<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes cannot be issued to a resident of a country identified by the inter-governmental Financial Action Task Force as being lax on money laundering and terror financing regulations.<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING is a phenomenon by which Indian individuals and companies avoid tax by sending funds abroad and then bringing them back on to home soil via Mauritius-based companies.<br />\n<br />\nMuch of the investment into India via Mauritius over the last 15 years is believed to have been by CORRUPT Indian residents\u2014all BIG FISH<br />\n<br />\nSigned in 1983, the Double Taxation Avoidance treaty between the two countries made Mauritius, which taxes capital gains at near-zero rates, an attractive \u201cpost box address\u201d for foreign investors to route investments into India .<br />\n<br />\nIndians who evaded taxes set up shell companies in Mauritius, concealing identities and channeling cash or stock market investments through \u201cround tripping\u201d and \u201cparticipatory notes\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) tightened the norms for participatory notes (P-notes) in order to check misuse of these instruments in round-tripping and money laundering.<br />\n<br />\nNow offshore derivative instruments (ODIs) issuers need to adhere to the Indian know your customer (KYC) norms and the subscribers will have to take prior permission from the ODI issuer in case of transfer of the instruments to another offshore investor.<br />\n<br />\nRevision of Mauritius treaty has caused India-bound investments now getting re-routed from other tax-friendly jurisdictions like Singapore.<br />\n<br />\nIn the financial year ending March 2016, Singapore overtook Mauritius ($8.3 billion) and reported highest FDI inflow ($13.6 billion) into India. This higher investment from Singapore is due to revised treaty with Mauritius.<br />\n<br />\nSingapore\u2019s investment of $5.98 billion has over taken Mauritius\u2019s investment of $4.85 billion as the single largest investor for the year 2013-14.<br />\n<br />\nThe Indian Government has also reached an agreement with Switzerland where the latter will share complete information on investments from Indians in Switzerland from 2019..<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes are instruments issued by registered foreign institutional investors to overseas investors. While the FPIs are registered with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI), the overseas investors investing in P-Notes are not registered with the market regulator, and thus their identity is not known to the authorities..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_0MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_0BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_0B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7034663945562597886\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536158320184#c7034663945562597886\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 5, 2018 at 8:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nAn Indian sending unaccounted money to tax havens through hawala transaction and the hawala operator in the tax haven investing that money into the P notes issued by an FPI registered with SEBI. In this way, unaccounted money can be converted into legitimate source of income.<br />\n<br />\nP-notes are basically 'hot money' which can be pulled in and out at any point of time increasing the volatility in the market. Terrorists can use these as instruments for their transactions as there is complete anonymity about the final receiver of P-notes or they can also use it as a tool of financial terrorism by increasing the volatility .<br />\n<br />\nP-notes are often criticised for evasion of capital gains tax. India\u2019s biggest source of FDI is India itself, money departing on a short holiday to a tax haven and then routed back as FDI. The bulk of P-note investments in the Indian stock market were from tax havens such as Cayman Islands.<br />\n<br />\nTax havens such as Mauritius and Singapore thrive parasitically, they feed on substantive economies like India<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.oecd.org/ctp/harmful/43757434.pdf<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.oecd.org/ctp/exchange-of-tax-information/42469606.pdf<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.oecd.org/ctp/exchange-of-tax-information/2082215.pdf<br />\n<br />\nINDIA WAS RULED BY AN ITALIAN WAITRESS , WHO WAS \"SUPER PRIME MINISTER\"<br />\n<br />\nSHE COULD NOT EVEN UTTER THE SPELLING OF \" E C O N O M I C S \"..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSHE CLAIMED TO HAVE GRADUATED FROM CAMBRIDGE UNIVERSITY , WHILE THE TRUTH IS WAS A MERE WAITRESS IN THAT TOWN<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE A WAITER IN A MUMBAI RESTAURANT CLAIMING THAT HE IS A BTECH FROM IIT MUMBAI.<br />\n<br />\nWe know the names of corrupt politicians who HOWLED IN PROTEST whenever there was an effort to ban participatory notes (P-Notes), or when we tried to ascertain their beneficial ownership.<br />\n<br />\nWe know that the money being brought into India was actually just Indian black money that had earlier been sent out of the country through the hawala route . We know who these Indian politicians are.<br />\n<br />\nA very large proportion of money invested in the markets by FIIs was funded through P-Notes. The bastards had the power to affect the flows and even crash the stock market<br />\n<br />\nThe CAD current account deficit is under control now. India is now attracting a lot of FDI which, by definition, isn\u2019t prone to flowing out as quickly as FII money<br />\n<br />\nWith a global crackdown on not just tax havens but also on unaccounted flows, India has found it easier to increase the know-your-customer norms for FIIs\u2014so while investors are still allowed to come in through P-Notes issued by well-known fund managers, the details of the beneficial ownership has to be made available to Sebi on a regular basis.<br />\n<br />\nOver a period of time, this has resulted in Sebi knowing the ownership details of all P-Note holders in the country<br />\n<br />\nWe don\u2019t want all eggs in one basket. A Special Investigation Team (SIT), MUST be set up to track black mone and MUST ask Sebi to give it all details on the beneficial ownership of P-Notes.<br />\n<br />\nSIT MUST correlate this data with the income/wealth-tax returns of P-Note-holders and see if there are undeclared incomes.<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW THE RAMPANT CORRUPTION IN SEBI\u2014<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nRBI GOVERNOR URJIT PATEL<br />\nSEBI<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nFINANCE MINISTERS OF ALL STATES<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Sir as buddhism denies the existence of soul, then how rebirth is possible. In jatak tales we get description of previous birth of buddha and even future Buddha \"Maitreya\" is yet to come. So if there is no permanent eternal soul then how rebirth is possible?<br />\n<br />\nOne important thing i want to include is that if there is no eternal soul then why a person should follow ashtangik marg and ten sheelas. Maharaja Kharak Singh, (Elder son of Maharaja Ranjit Singh)<br />\nBirth February 20, 1801, Accession June 27, 1839<br />\nDeposed in a coup October 8, 1839, Poisoned to death November 5, 1840\u2026<br />\n<br />\n2. Maharaja Naunihal Singh, (son of Maharaja Kharak Singh)<br />\nBirth February 11, 1820, Became a Maharaja October 8, 1839 (De-facto ruler)<br />\nDeath November 6, 1840, ( Murdered with stone pounded on his head )\u2026.<br />\n<br />\n3. Maharaja Sher Singh., (Second son of Maharaja Ranjit Singh)<br />\nOccupied the throne November 9, 1840, for 23 days only, Dethroned December 2, 1840..<br />\n<br />\n4. Maharani Chand Kaur ., (Widow of Maharaja Kharak Singh)<br />\nProclaimed Malika Mukaddas December 2, 1840 or Queen Empress.<br />\nCapituated January 17, 1841, Deposed January 18, 1841, Killed June 9, 1842..<br />\n<br />\n5. Ajit Vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarch 8, 2017 at 7:14 PM</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nfuntoosh--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI JUST REMINISCED --</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHICH WAS MY MOST HEARTFELT \"THANK YOU \"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI HAD JUST SIGNED OFF MY SHIP</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE WHOLE OFFICERS/ CREW / OFFICERS WIVES WERE AT THE GANGWAY TO SEE ME OFF</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE WHOLE PROCESS WAS SILENT--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNO FAATHU WORDS--NO MAXIMUM MAXIMUS CHANTS --</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nONLY ONE SECOND EYE TO EYE LOCKS \u2013</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWORDS SPOIL THIS PREGNANT GOODBYE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS WAS IN NEW YORK ANCHORAGE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE BOAT SHOVED OFF</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHEN THE FAST LARGE BOAT WAS ABOUT 50 METRES OFF --I SAW ALL ON SHIP WAVING HANDS-- \"COME BACK \"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS HAD HAPPENED TO ME BEFORE , AS ONCE I LEFT MY SLEEVELESS JACKET WITH PASSPORT / AIR TICKET AND MONEY ( MORE THAN 20000 USD ) BEHIND</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI TURNED THE BOAT BACK</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAS SOON AS IT REACHED THE GANGWAY I NOTICES THE PUMPMAN STANDING AT THE BOTTOM PLAFORM.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE LEAPT INTO THE BOAT ( A CHASM OF 5 FEET )</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS BLACK SWEATY TAMILIAN HUGGED ME HARD -- I WAS SOAKED IN HIS SWEAT</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE TELLS ME IN HINDI \" SAAB AAP JAHAAZ PAR HAI TO JAAN HA PARVAAH NAHI \" ( SIR--WHEN YOU ARE IN COMMAND , WE ARE NOT AFRAID OF OUR LIVES )</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAND THEN HE LEAPT BACK TO THE SHIP</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nmuch later i reminisced -- i had gone down to the pumproom during cargo discharge and noticed 9 inches of petrol in he bilges . this ship could carry 65,000 tonnes of petrol. i asked him--what is all this. i guess he expected me to screw him for dereliction of duty</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nmy chief officer was an incompetent CUNT</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ni took charge after cargo discharge and did the repairs PERSONALLY.. no captain does this -- nor he has the competence.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/pumping-systems-on-chemical-tankers.html</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT WAS ABOUT MECHANICAL SEALS FITTED THE WRONG WAY--THIS COULD HAVE CAUSED A FIRE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHAT SHIP -- MANNED BY WHITE CUNT AMERICANS BEFORE - HAD FEW BOURDEN TUBE DIRECT PRESSURE GUAGES IN THE CCR, INSTEAD OF REMOTE PRESSURE GUAGES RUN BY CONTROL AIR</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEVERYTHING WAS FUCKIN' HAYWIRE</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE IG PRESSURE WOULD SHOW DIFFERENT AT PUMPROOM, CCR, ENGINE ROOM, BRIDGE AND ON DECK</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nALL IT REQUIRED WAS SOME EXPERTISE OF \"PNEUMATIC INSTRUMENTATION \" WHICH I HAD. JUST A SMALL TURN OF A SMALL SCREW DRIVER\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNO MARINE ENGINEER ON THIS PLANET ( PAST/ PRESENT / FUTURE ) HAS IT -- FLAPPER/ ORIFICE TECHNOLOGY.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHEN THE CRANE COULD NOT LIFT THE SUBMARINE HOSE AND ALL ENGINEERS HAD FAILED FOR 4 HOURS \u2014</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n--I HAD CLIMBED UP THE CRANE AND REPAIRED THE CRANE IN 5 MINUTES .. OR MY SHIP WOULD BE CAST OFF -- THE WHOLE CREW WATCHED \u2013 CAPTAIN DID IT ALONE ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS PUMPMAN WITH 30 YEARS EXPERIENCE AT SEA HAD NOTICED ALL THIS .. HE HAD RUN UP FROM THE BOWELS OF THE SHIP TO CRY --GOOD BYE ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT WAS A GENUINE COMPLIMENT, FROM THE BOTTOM OF HIS HEART . HE DID NOT CARE IF HIS SWEAT HAD RUINED MY AIRPORT DRESS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNOT LIKE A PATRONISING COOK TELLING THE CAPTAIN FOR PERSONAL FAAYADA \" VERY GOOD NAVIGATION !\"</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTRY BEING THE SLAVE WHO IS MORE POWERFUL THAN CAESAR.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIT CAN HAPPEN TO YOU\u2014WATCH THE VIDEO BELOW\u2014</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hriR60Y4w48</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI HAD DONE THINGS FAR FAR BETTER.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/super-typhoon-bart-perfect-storm-capt.html</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTRY BEING A SLAVE MORE POWERFUL THAN CAESAR \u2013 IT COMES OUT OF PERFORMANCE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lKn-Agk-Yai</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_43BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536514353438#c4493948469647562661\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 9, 2018 at 11:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_142MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND CRIED--<br />\n<br />\nI AM CONFUSED-- WHY IS KRISHNA CALLING ARJUNA SO MANY NAMES<br />\n<br />\n1) SON OF BHARATA<br />\n2) DESCENDANT OF BHARATA<br />\n3) BEST OF BHARATAS<br />\n4) SCION OF BHARATA<br />\n<br />\nAAKHIR YEH BHARAT KAUN HAI BHAIYYA-- KAUN SA KHET KA BEET ROT HAI YEH IS HE THE SON OF SHAKUNTALA ?<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nSHAKUNTALA NEVER EXISTED.. KALIDASA WHO CREATED SHAKUNTALA NEVER EXISTED...<br />\n<br />\nKALIDASA WAS CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD .. TO HIJACK ANCIENT INDIAN HISTORY.. TO SHOW THAT BIG BAND OF BIBLE IN 4004 BC IS RELEVANT..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE TRUTH?<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA WAS SON OF EMPEROR RISHABHA WAS WAS BORN IN 8190 BC.. RISHABHA WAS THE SON OF NABHI RAJA..GRANDSON OF AGNIDHARA , GREAT GRANDSON OF PRIYA VARTA ( 8255 BC )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA + RISHABHA ( BHARATARSHABHA ) RULED THE WHOLE PLANET...<br />\n<br />\nRISHABHA NAMED HIS SON BHARATA AFTER THE LAND OF BHARATA<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA THE LAND MASS IS DERIVED FROM THE SHABDHA BRAHMAN TERM ( BHAVA + RAGA + TALA ) BHA + RA + TA !!<br />\n<br />\nIN BHAGAWAD GITA KRISHNA CALLS ARJUNA BHARATARSHABHA --AND THIS HAS BEEN TRANSLATELY WRONLY BY EVER BODY AS -- O BULL AMONG BHARATAS..<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nBHARATARSHABHA MEANS FIRST NAME BHARAT + SURNAME RISHABHA ..<br />\n<br />\nPOOR JAINS DONT EVEN KNOW THEIR OWN HISTORY..<br />\n<br />\nIF I DONT REVEAL THIS--IT WILL NEVER BE REVEALED TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA..<br />\n<br />\nAND I HAVE HALF A MIND NOT TO REVEAL IT AS JAINS HAVE BEEN TRAITORS TO BHARATAMATA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RICHEST JAINS ARE CRYPTO JEWS WHO RUN THE DIAMOND MAFIA IN ANTWERP AND DUBAI-- WHO HAVE BUILD AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES FOR GHANSHYAM PANDE..<br />\n<br />\nBUDDHIRM DIED IN INDIA BUT IT FLOURISHED ABROAD..<br />\n<br />\nJAINISM NEVER WENT ABROAD..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">VARDHAMANA MAHAVIRA IS JUST THE 24TH THIRTHANKARA<br /><br />THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA IS ACTUALLY BAHUBALI SON OF RISHBHA , SON OF SUNANDA, BROTHER OF SUNDARI-- AND HALF BROTHER OF BHARATA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nHOW WAS JAINISM BORN?</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The white historian has put Mahavira as a contemporary of Buddha at 599 BC. This is wrong . First of all Mahavira was just a reformer. He was the 24th Thirtankara . And he was born in 4500 BC.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">IN REALITY BAHUBALI IS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA..</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.23 %..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BUT BAHUBALI BECAME A MONK AND HIS USELESS SON SOMAKRITI HAD NO CHILDREN\u2026<br /><br />THIS WHY JAINS CHOSE HIS FATHER THE GREAT EMPEROR RISHABHA AS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA ( OPPORTUNISM AT ITS BEST )<br /><br />THERE WAS A SCHISM IN THE ROYAL BLOODLINE\u2014AS MAHUBALI AND HIS HALF BROTHER HAD A FIGHT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Bharata was chosen by Emperor Rishabha to be his successor as he was loved by all and was level headed. Bahubali was an expert in Ayurveda and spent most of his time in Kerala learning Kalari ..</span></div>\n<br />\nAfter conquering the whole Bharata sent a communication to his brothers to accept his order. After an initial hesitation 98 brothers accepted Bharata\u2019s order.. .<br />\n<br />\nNow Bahubali ( son of Sunanda ) was left. When the messenger came to him with message he said \u2013 \u201cO messenger! Go and tell your emperor Bharat that Bahubali isn\u2019t like his brothers who became Sadhus leaving the kingdom.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_142BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_142b+seedDigeD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_141T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; Army of both sides fought hard. Sometimes army of Bharat dominated army of Bahubali and sometimes vice versa.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Seeing mass destruction in war it was decided that there should be a single combat between Bharat and Bahubali . One who wins will be the only Chakravarti or \"Emperor of Emperors\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In all the stages of battle Bharat had to face terrible defeat at the hands of his younger brother Bahubali in all these fights.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When a point came that Bahubali must give a lethal strike on his elder half brother Bharata, he raised his hand . He felt that his own sister Sundari and step sister Brahmi ( of script Brahmi Lipi fame ) were on the side of Bharata.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Instead of giving the final fatal blow, he suddenly uprooted a large tuft of hair from his own head instead, thus declaring himself as a monk, stunning all .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">After ruling for several years Bharata also became a wandering saint, like his father and brother..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Bahubali spent many years in meditation and severe penance. He was unable to become a Jivan Mukt as his enemity with Bharata scorched his soul..</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; AFTER THAT THE SOUL IS NOT REBORN..<br />\n<br />\n#### CAPTAIN, YOU HAVE SAID THAT THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER IS A PARKING PLACE FOR LOWER FORMS OF LIFE PLUS HUMAN CRIMINALS AND&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HOMOSEXUALS ( WHOSE TOP SIX CHAKRAS ARE STAGNANT EXCEPT LOWEST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA )</span></b>.. BUT FROM HERE THE SOUL IS RE-BORN.. SO THIS CANNOT BE HELL-- ..<br />\n<br />\nWHERE THEN IS HELL ?<br />\n<br />\nMY DEAR-- TAKE A DEEP BREATH..<br />\n<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nHELL IS PLANET EARTH.<br />\n<br />\n#############################<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A HUMAN DIES AND HE IS BURIED HIS SOUL IS TRAPPED FOREVER ON EARTH-- MISERABLE AND UNHAPPY.<br />\n<br />\nIF A LOWER FORM OF LIFE DIES AND IS BURIED-- ITS LOW FREQUENCY SOUL STILL GOES TO THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER..TO BE REBORN AS A HIGHER SPECIES. ..AS THEY DONT HAVE EGO..<br />\n<br />\nONCE YOU ARE BORN AS A HUMAN YOU WILL NEVER GO BACK TO ANIMAL SPECIES...<br />\n<br />\nHUMAN SOUL GETS SHOT UP TO ASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO SIX- ONLY BY CREMATION.. WHEN THE SKULL POPS , THE SOLITON WAVE ACTS AS A CARRIER.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHOW DID SOUL FIRST GET INDUCTED --WHEN BRAHMAN SHEARED OFF PARTS OF HIS OWN BODY ( FIELD ) AND SEND IT TO EARTH AT LOWEST FREQUENCY AS SINGLE CELLED BACTERIA..<br />\n<br />\nIT CAME BY SHIVA LINGAM -- A BLACK EXTRA TERRESTRIAL STONE WHICH CONTAINS DNA.<br />\n<br />\nDNA FROM SHIVA LINGAM FLOWS OUT BY WATER DRIP-- MEMORY INFUSION INTO WATER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&amp;v=1g7AKVZ3HC4<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html</span><br />\n<br />\nA MOKSHA SOUL IS NOT CREMATED-- THERE IS NO NEED TO.. IT MUST INDICATE IF THOSE NERBY DAM SHUTTERS ARE OPEN OR MAY BE OPENED IN AN IMMINENT MANNER .. THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS MUST BE WRITTEN DOWN IN THIS RISK ASSESSMENT FORM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM ( AND ATTACHED CHECK LIST ) MUST CONTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT HIGH WATER SPRING TIDES AND RISE OF SEA WATER LEVEL DUE TO LONG PERIODS OF SEA TO SHORE WINDS ( LONG FETCH ) WHICH RAISE THE SEA WATER LEVEL.PROBABILTY OF LONG PERIODS OF HEAVY RAIN DUE TO EL NINO..AS WHAT HAPPENED IN 1997 IN 2018 .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DURING EL NINO YEAR THERE WILL BE NO HURRICANES IN THE ATLANTIC OCEAN WHILE PACIFIC OCEAN HURRICANES INCREASE DRASTICALLY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO NEW DAM MUST BE CONSTRUCTED WITHOUT DESILTING FACILITIES\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WANT A TRANSPARENT WEBSITE WHICH TELL US HOW MUCH MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA HAVE BEEN SILTED .. WHY RE WE HIDING THIS.. THERE MUST BE A NEW MINISTRY FORMED FOR THE SUBJECT OF \u201cDAM SILTATION\u201d ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CURRENTLY ALOST ALL DAM RESERVOIRS IN INDIA ARE SILTED TO MORE THAN 60% CAUSING LOSS OF WATER HOLDING VOLUME ..SUBSEQUENTLY THESE WATER LEVEL OF THESE RESERVOIRS HAVE BEEN RAISED INDUNDATING MORE LAND, INCREASING WATER SURFACE AREA , INCREASING EVAPORATION LOSSES IN A CRIMINAL MANNER ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED DAM WATER RELEASE IS DISASTROUS AS WHAT HAPPENED IN KERALA.. RISK WAS NOT ASSESSED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED EXPLOSION CAUSES LOSS OF LIVES ( BOMB ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTROLLED EXPLOSION HELPS MAN ( DIESEL ENGINE INTERNAL COMBUSTION ) ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE DO NOT WANT ANY MORE DAMS IN ECOLOGICALLY SENSITIVE AREAS.. PATH OF NATURAL WATERWAYS MUST NOT BE BLOCKED ... ANCIENT FLOOD WATER DRAIN BASIS MUST NOT BE CONSTRUCTED OVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA IS LUCKY THAT WE THE PEOPLE STOPPED ARANMULA AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION AGAINST THE WISHES OF VESTED FOREIGN CONTROLLED CHRISTIAN FORCES, TRYING TO STOP SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BY KILLING THE PAMPA RIVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MUCH BEFORE MADHAV GADGIL WROTE AGAINST THE ARANMULA AIRPORT, CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD WARNED -- \"DO NOT BLOCK NATURAL WATERWAYS \"..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/11/aranmula-airport-kerala-mindless-rape.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY OF KUTTANAD ( VEMBANAD LAKE ) WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM NETHERLANDS WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL ..NETHERLANDS IS BELOW SEA LEVEL LIKE KUTTANAD AND THEY ARE DYKE EXPERTS..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..CAUSING KUTTANAD THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA TO GO UNDER WATER..</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">THE THANNERMUKKOM BUND WAS FOR THE RICH CHRISTIAN CONVERT LANDOWNERS TO CULTIVATE PADDY CROPS THREE TIMES A YEAR INSTEAD OF TWO AND MAXIMISE PROFITS... THIS BUND HAS CREATED EXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">REMEMBER 17 LAKH PEOPLE LIVE ON THE BANKS OF THE VEMBANAD LAKE AND THEIR LIVES ARE DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY DEPENDENT ON IT FOR SURVIVAL AND LIVELIHOOD.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_162BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_162b+seedoAUD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_160T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; AND THEIR INFORMATION MUST BE GIVEN TO THE DUTCH TEAM..<br />\n<br />\nLOCAL EXPERTS ARE NOT BEAURAUCRATS --- THEY HAVE TO BE EXPERIENCED FARMERS WITH A STAKE ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKERALA HAS LOST ALL HER WATER COLLECTION BASINS DUE TO CHRISTIAN , MUSLIM AND COMMIE POLITICAL PARTIES GIVING AWAY PADDY LANDS FOR PARTY CADRE TO BUILD HOUSES ILLEGALLY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DAM RIVERS EXCESSIVELY, NO RIVER WATER FLOWS TO THE SEA \u2013 LIKE CAUVERY IN TAMIL NADU.. THIS CAUSES SALT WATER INTRUSION INTO COASTAL AQUIFERS AND FISHERMEN TO SHAMELESSLY STEAL FISH FROM SRI LANKAN WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS LIKE MADHAV GADGIL / K KASTURIRANGAN\u2014AND PATHETIC NGT -- ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE? ..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">DO THESE SO CALLED EXPERTS EVEN KNOW OF THE TERM \u201c DAM RESERVOIR INDUCED SISEMCITY \u201c WHICH CAUSES LAND SLIDES?..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDO THEY EVEN KNOW THE MEANING OF A SOLITION WAVE CAUSED BY A LANDSLIDE INTO A DAM RESERVOIR.. IN BANASURA SAGAR DAM RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR YOU CAN SEE THE SIGNS OF PAST LANDSLIDES..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO SACK ALL IN IMD AND INFUSE FRESH BLOOD WHO ARE TRAINED ABROAD IN WEATHER PREDICTIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECARED 2018 AS A EL NINO YEAR , A FULL WEEK BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS AND WARNED AGAINST LAST MINUTE EMERGENCY FLOOD WATER RELEASE.. THIS IS ON RECORD EVEN IN PMO..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE MUST STOP THIS RIDICULOUS PRACTICE OF BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL AND BOTTOM OF THE LOSER LAWYERS POOL \u201cLAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES&nbsp; \u201d<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px;\"><b>SUPERIMPOSING THE BLUE PRINT OF THE CONSTITUTION ON TOP OF COMPLEX TECHNICAL CALCULATIONS \u2014WERE IS THE INTELLIGENCE IN THIS ?.</b></span>. ARE WE DONKEYS ?..<br />\n<br />\nMUCH BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS I HAD DONE COMPLEX CALCULATIONS AND DEMANDED THAT MULLAPERIAR DAM WATER MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO BUILD UP TO 141 FEET..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU BUILD EXCESSIVE DAMS ( POLITICIANS MAKING MONEY ) ON THE UPPER REACHES OF A RIVER , THE LOWER PART OF THE RIVER IS STARVED OF WATER..<br />\n<br />\nWATER FLOW IN LOWER PARTS OF A RIVER IS A MUST AS THEY RECHARGE AQUIFERS HUNDREDS OF MILES AWAY FROM THE RIVER BANKS..TODAY THESE UNDERGROUND RIVER CHANNELS ARE ALL BLOCKED DUE TO DISUSE..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO WE HAVE MAIN STREAM MEDIA WHO ARE FIT ONLY TO TALK ABOUT POTHOLES? WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO DO THE JOB OF THE STUPID INDIAN MAIN STREAM MEDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE , PM MODI WANTED TO KILL BHARATMATA BY RIVER INTERLINKING AND THAT TOO USING HIS WHITE JEW MASTERS IN ISRAEL\u2014 ISRAEL HAS GOT THOUSANDS OF MIGHTY RIVERS , RIGHT? BRAAAYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\">GANGES CANNOT BE CLEANED UNLESS THE RIVER WATER FLOWS ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\nWE ASK VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI\u2014TAKE CARE OF BHARATMATA . HE WAS PLAYER OF THE YEAR, WHEN HE JOINED..<br />\n<br />\nMY ELDER SON FLEW FROM USA TO MANCHESTER UK , AND TOOK HIS PICTURE SITTING ON THE SEAT OF TEVEZ IN THE DRESSING ROOM. THE WHITE INVADER STOLE OUR PHILOSOPHICAL SUBJECTIVE TEXTS AND CONVERTED THEM TO OBJECTIVE --BY ATTACHING SOME MINDLESS MATH EQUATIONS ..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SVADHYAYA MUST BE DONE ON THE THREE GUNAS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS SUBJECT IS TOO ADVANCED.. list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_39B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1506808177676703967\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_39M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535982742368#c1506808177676703967\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 3, 2018 at 7:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_39MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FINALLY WHAT I HAVE WARNED AGAINST REPEATEDLY OVER THE PAST TEN DAYS HAS HAPPENED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ACCUSES THE KERALA HEALTH MINISTER FOR NEGLIGENCE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Calicut now has 18 cases of Leptospirosis..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Estimates from the World Health Organisation (WHO) suggest a worldwide incidence of 1.2 million cases per year with up to 60,000 deaths.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">After floods in tropics Leptospirosis always happens --it is the No 1 disease --all doctors know this.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is the commonest zoonotic infection worldwide but is vastly underreported</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The cause of leptospirosis is bacteria (genus Leptospira and species interrogans), a Gram-negative spirochete (spiral-shaped bacteria).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The disease is transmitted through drinking water contaminated with urine of infected animals, often rats. However, human-to-human transmission occurs very rarely.The disease can\u2019t be passed through the air like a cold or the flu.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The incubation period of Leptospirosis is between 5 to 14 days.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is often difficult to diagnose clinically, as it can appear to be very similar to many other diseases such as dengue, typhoid and viral hepatitis.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Leptospira bacteria can enter the body through broken skin, water-softened skin, mucous membranes (the thin moist lining of many parts of the body such as the nose, mouth, throat and genitals) or by swallowing or inhaling contaminated water.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The first phase, which usually lasts 5 to 7 days, begins suddenly with symptoms including:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">high fever</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">vomiting</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">diarrhoea</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">red eyes</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">muscle aches (especially thigh and calf muscles)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">rash</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">chills</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">headache.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">MOST RECOVER AFTER THE FIRST PHASE. THE SECOND PHASE CAN BE WEILs DISEASE.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A second phase of illness (immune phase) may follow 1 to 2 weeks later, with symptoms such as:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">jaundice (yellowing of the skin and eyes)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">kidney failure</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">irregular heart beat</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">lung problems</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">meningitis (inflammation of the lining of the brain)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">red eyes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In most cases, leptospirosis is unpleasant but not life-threatening, like a case of the flu. It rarely lasts more than a week. But about 10% of the time, when you have a severe form of leptospirosis, you\u2019ll get better, but then get sick again. This is called Weil\u2019s disease&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis associated with liver and kidney disease is called Weil's syndrome and is characterized by yellowing of the eyes (jaundice). Patients with Weil's syndrome can also develop kidney disease and have more serious involvement of the organs affected.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Weil's Disease can cause organ failure and death ..it is a severe form of leptospirosis he condition can lead to more extreme complications, including shortness of breath, coughing up blood, a confused mental state, seizures and a painful swelling of the liver</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis can infect almost any animal where it is harboured in the kidneys, but most commonly it is found in rats is spread by their urine. It is not known to cause any noticeable illness in rats, so populations are unaffected by high levels of infection.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">To check for leptospirosis, your doctor does a simple blood test and examines the blood for antibodies. These are organisms your body produces to fight the bacteria</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Use disinfectant. Bleach, Lysol, acid solutions, and iodine are deadly to the bacteria. Keep them on hand to clean up.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Treat water to make it safe to drink by boiling or using an appropriate chemical treatment, especially if it has been collected from a source that could be exposed to urine from animals or contaiminated by floodwater runoff.</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK THE KERALA GOVT TO STOCK UP DOXYCYCLINE AND IBUPROFEN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis can be treated with antibiotics, including penicillin and doxycycline. Your doctor may also recommend ibuprofen for fever and muscle pain</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_39BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_37T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_37TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535982781091#c7285763356076832702\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 3, 2018 at 7:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_37MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The treatment of leptospirosis involves high doses of antibiotics. Antibiotic treatment (doxycycline , penicillin) is most effective when initiated early in the course of the illness. Severely ill patients may need hospitalization for IV fluid and antibiotic treatment. Severe liver manifestations and kidney damage and even failure resulting from the infection may require intensive medical care</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Doxycycline can be used for prevention.. CRITICAL.. take 200 mg of doxycycline per week by mouth starting before and during the time period of potential exposure.It works by stopping the growth of bacteria. This is not recommended in children of less than 7 year of age</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For severe leptospirosis, intravenous penicillin G has long been the drug of choice</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Infected dogs, cats, and other pets may exhibit vomiting, refusal to eat, weight loss, decreased activity, muscle pains, or stiffness.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If leptospirosis develops during pregnancy, the risk of miscarriage is increased.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is endemic in most areas where dengue virus is transmitted and may be mistaken for dengue, which is typically more common. It is important to consider leptospirosis when dengue is diagnosed in a severely ill patient, because early antibiotics are beneficial in the treatment of leptospirosis and are not given for dengue virus infection</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Again, many different animals can harbour Leptospira bacteria in their kidneys..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">After floods , silt that has been contaminated with animal urine can be the source of infection. This is why I had recommended to douse some kerosene as soon as flood water enters the home\u2014it keeps away snakes too.</span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ASK TV STATIONS TO BROADCAST INFORMATION\u2014ONLY A DOCTOR MUST BE ALLOWED\u2014NOT POTHOLE JOURNALISTS..</span></span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM AFRAID I HAD TO BREAK MY POLICY OF KEEPING AWAY FROM MEDICAL STUFF IN MY BLOGS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_37MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; BALL</span></b> ) ; prav\u1e5bitte\u2014about to commence; \u015bhastra-samp\u0101te\u2014to use the weapons; dhanu\u1e25\u2014bow; udyamya\u2014taking up; p\u0101\u1e47\u1e0dava\u1e25\u2014Arjun, the son of Pandu; h\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u012bke\u015bham\u2014to Shree Krishna; tad\u0101\u2014at that time; v\u0101kyam\u2014words; idam\u2014these; \u0101ha\u2014said; mah\u012b-pate\u2014King<br />\nTranslation<br />\nBG 1.20: At that time, the son of Pandu, Arjun, who had the insignia of Hanuman ( <b><span style=\"color: red;\">MY LEFT BALL</span></b> ) on the flag of his chariot, took up his bow. Seeing your sons arrayed against him, O King, Arjun then spoke the following words to Shree Krishna.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH DWAJAH IS NOT MONKEY FLAG</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH MEANS VISHNU\u2014</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cKAPIH DWAJAH\u201d MEANS VISHNUs BANNER \u2013 GARUDA</span><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">KAPIH </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( sun ) is one of the 1008 names of Vishnu in Vishnu Sahasranamah</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KAPI MEANS BROWN.<br />IN MALAYALAM WE CALL IT COFFEE COLOUR.<br />KAPI DOES NOT MEAN MONKEY IN MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT</span></b><br />\n<br />\n###################3<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO TELL ALL THIS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHCHILD NEVER EXPECTED A BLOGGER CAPTAIN IN TOWN !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.22 %</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_114M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03515649322352795115\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 4, 2018 at 2:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_114MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain ! Please read these articles ! Indian connect with Russia during rule of Islamic-&amp;-European Invaders ! Note how \"Nikitin\" is similar to Indian name \"Nikethan\".<br />\n============================<br />\n<br />\n-&gt; \"From Tver to Calicut: Retracing Afanasy Nikitin\u2019s life in India. The Russian merchant arrived in India in 1469 and lived in the country for three years, travelling all the way to Kerala and Sri Lanka.<br />\n<br />\nFrom Dabhol, Nikitin traveled to Calicut in what was a 25-day journey --- \u201cCalicut is a big harbor on the Indian Sea, and God forbid that any ship should pass by it; no one who sails past it will cross the sea unscathed,\u201d he wrote. \u201cAnd it produces pepper, ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon, clove, spices, adrak, and many kinds of herbs. Everything is cheap there.\u201d --- \"<br />\n<br />\nhttps://tinyurl.com/y7nvrfem<br />\n============================<br />\n<br />\n-&gt; \"Russia and India: A civilisational friendship. Athanasius (also known as Afanasy) Nikitin was in India nearly thirty years before Vasco da Gama and, in fact, opened the country for Europeans. After Nikitin, however, it took two centuries to establish direct contact between India and Russia. It was only in the late 17th century that Russian merchant Semyon Malenkiy brought a letter from Peter-the-Great to the Badshah, Mughal-Emperor-Aurangzeb, with a request to allow him to sell Russian goods, as well as purchase local products. In 1696 Aurangzeb received Semyon Malenkiy and allowed him to conduct free trade.\"<br />\n<br />\nhttps://tinyurl.com/y9k444q8<br />\n============================</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_114BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; RELIEF IS NOT ONLY PHYSICAL IT MUST BE PSYCHOLOGICAL TOO...</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY SUCCESS AS A SHIP CAPTAIN AT SEA HAD A SECRET...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WORKED HARD --BUT PLAYED HARDER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I CONDUCTED ALL TYPES OF COMPETITIONS WITH HEAVY PRIZE MONEY IN US DOLLAR.. MANY ASKED ME \"CAPTAIN FROM WHEREARE YOU GETTING THIS MONEY\" .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY REPLY \" FROM THIN AIR\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SPORTS/ GAMES/ FANCY DRESS/ SINGING/ TUG OF WAR - THE WORKS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/equator-crossing-ceremony-at-sea-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I GAVE BEAUTIFUL HAND CRAFTED CERTIFICATES WITH MY SIGNATURE..
