, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A FEW DAYS AGO, DURING\nTHE THICK OF KERALA FLOODS, PEA BRAINED POTHOLE JOURNALISTS WENT SKIPPETTY SKIP\nTO TAP INTO THE WISDOM OF THREE DUDES\u2014MADHAV GADGIL, K KASTURIRANGAN AND MS\nSWAMINATHAN.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THANK GOD VERGHESE\nKURIAN HAS KICKED THE BUCKET , OR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RUNNING TO HIM TOO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL FOUR ARE MEN OF\nAVERAGE INTELLECT AND INFERIOR PERCEPTION.. &nbsp;NEVER MIND THE HAJAAR AWARDS THEY REAPED.&nbsp; &nbsp;THEIR KNOWLEDGE OF ORGANIC CHEMISTRY IS PURELY PEDESTRIAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LET ME START FROM\nREVERSE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">PADMA VIBHUSHAN AWARD\nAND &nbsp;RAMON MAGSAYSAY AWARD WINNER <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>VERGHESE\nKURIAN</b></span> IS \u201cTHE FATHER OF THE WHITE REVOLUTION\u201d</span> &nbsp;.. THIS DESH DROHI SWITCHED OUR PRICELESS\nVEDIC HUMPED COWS WITH WORSE THAN PIGS HUMPLESS FOREIGN JERSEY COWS , WHO GIVE\nTOXIC A1 MILK, TOXIC URINE, TOXIC DUNG AND TOXIC BEEF.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">PADMA VIBHUSHAN AWARD\nAND RAMON MAGSAYSAY AWARD WINNER <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">MS SWAMINATHAN</span></b> IS \u201cTHE FATHER OF THE GREEN\nREVOLUTION \u201c</span>..&nbsp; THIS DESH DROHI RAPED\nINDIAs HOLY TOP SOIL AND WATER BODIES WITH TOXIC ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND\nPESTICIDES.&nbsp;&nbsp; 90% LAKES WHICH SURVIVED IN\nPRISTINE CONDITION FOR MILLIONS&nbsp; OF YEARS\nDIED IN JUST 55 YEARS &nbsp;FLAT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">PADMA BHUSHAN AWARD\nWINNER AND HARVARD TRAINED ECOLOGIST <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">MADHAV GADGIL</span></b> IS THE AUTHOR OF THE\nSQUEAMISH \u201cGADGIL REPORT\u201d</span> ON THE ECOLOGICAL MANAGEMENT OF THE WESTERN GHATS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">PADMA VIBHUSHAN AWARD\nWINNER , EX-ISRO CHIEF, EX-JNU CHANCELLOR <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">K KASTURIRANGAN </span></b>IS THE AUTHOR OF THE\nULTERIOR MOTIVED KASTURIRANGAN REPORT \u201c</span> , &nbsp;SPECIALLY CHOSEN &nbsp;BY VESTED POLITICAL POWERS TO SABOTAGE THE\nGADGIL REPORT ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I WILL NOT GIVE MY TIME\nOF DAY TO THIS FELLOW MS SWAMINATHAN.. &nbsp;HIS SOUND BYTES ON TV ARE &nbsp;LIKE A CHIEF ENGINEER TAKING ABOUT SHIP NAVIGATION\nIN A DEADLY HURRICANE. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BUT HEY, IF I WERE TO ASK MADHAV\nGADGIL AND K KASTURIRANGAN SOME SIMPLE QUESTIONS ON---</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">-- EL NINO, DAM RESERVOIR\nINDUCED SEISMICITY,&nbsp; SOLITON WAVE, SPRING HIGH WATER TIDES, &nbsp;COASTAL &nbsp;SEA WATER BUILD UP DUE TO LONG FETCH ONSHORE\nWINDS, &nbsp;TECHNICAL REASONS FOR LANDSLIDES, &nbsp;SCIENCE OF ANGLE OF REPOSE OF SATURATED SOILS,\n&nbsp;LIQUEFACTION OF SOILS INTO SOLS ETC ETC ---</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">-- I KNOW WHICH ORIFICE THEY WILL SCRATCH FIRST&nbsp; BEFORE\nVAMOOSING HOPPETY HOP..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE PRESERVATION OF\nPADDY FIELDS AND WATER BODIES ( TO PREVENT FLOODS IN MONSOONS ) IN THE ENTIRE\nWESTERN GHATS WAS NOT ADDRESSED BOTH IN THE GADGIL AND KASTURIRANGAN REPORTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN THE &nbsp;GIZA PYRAMIDS WERE OPENED THEY FOUND A\nROSEWOOD CANNISTER CONTAINING HONEY IN PERFECT EDIBLE CONDITION.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS REALLY PROVED THAT\nIF HONEY IS EXTRACTED BY BEES FROM THE RIGHT SOURCE ( WILD FLOWERS) &nbsp;IT HAS NO EXPIRY DATE. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE CANISTER AND HONEY WAS DETERMINED TO BE\nFROM THE LAND OF PUNT , WAYANAD , WESTERN GHATS OF &nbsp;NORTH KERALA ( MALABAR ).&nbsp; &nbsp;THE PHARAOH MUMMY HAD MALABAR PEPPER INSIDE HIS NOSE..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WAYANAD ( JUST ONE HOUR\nDRIVE FROM MY HOMETOWN CALICUT ) IS THE SWEET SPOT \u2013NAY-- JEWEL IN THE CROWN OF\nTHE WESTERN GHATS RANGE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS MOUNTAIN RANGE RUNS\nALONG THE PENINSULAR WEST COAST OF INDIA. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS FERTILE AND\nBEAUTIFUL AREA MALABAR ( HEAVY RAINFALL AND HOT SUN ) &nbsp;HELD THE PRICELESS AYURVEDIC HERB BANK AND THE\nBEST OF SPICES&nbsp; WHICH MADE INDIA RICH AND\nFAMOUS IN THE ANCIENT WORLD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The monsoon influencing\nWestern Ghats runs parallel to the West Coast &nbsp;is also known as Sahyadri (Benevolent\nMountains).. The range starts near the Songadh town of Gujarat, south of the\nTapti river, and runs approximately 1,600 km , 48 to 210 km wide,&nbsp; through the\nstates of Maharashtra, Goa, Karnataka, Kerala and Tamil Nadu ending at\nMarunthuvazh Malai, near Kanyakumari, at the southern tip of India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These hills cover\n160,000 km2 &nbsp;and form the catchment area\nfor complex riverine drainage systems that drain almost 40% of India. The\nWestern Ghats block southwest monsoon winds from reaching the Deccan Plateau.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The average elevation is around 1,200 m .. The mountains intercept the\nrain-bearing westerly monsoon winds, and are consequently an area of high\nrainfall, particularly on their western side.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The dense forests also contribute\nto the precipitation of the area by acting as a substrate for condensation of\nmoist rising orographic winds from the sea, and releasing much of the moisture\nback into the air via transpiration, allowing it to later condense and fall again\nas rain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 331 &nbsp;globally threatened species occur in the\nWestern Ghats..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Western Ghats\ntraverses south through the states of Maharashtra, Goa, Karnataka and Kerala.\nMajor gaps in the range are the Goa Gap, between the Maharashtra and Karnataka\nsections, and the Palghat Gap on the Tamil Nadu and Kerala border between the\nNilgiri Hills and the Anaimalai Hills. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The northern portion of\nthe narrow coastal plain between the Western Ghats and the Arabian Sea is known\nas the Konkan, the central portion is called Kanara and the southern portion is\ncalled MALABAR \u2014the most priceless part of this planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After you round the\ncoast of Ceylon sailing westwards, you reach the land known as Malabar , the\nnoblest , most beautiful and richest land on this planet.&nbsp; No one here ate beef for anything in the\nworld . The king and his barons sat on the earth. This kingdom produced no\ngrain except rice. \u2014 <b>Marco Polo 1296 AD </b>( which inspired sailor like Columbus )\naccounts on Calicut , my hometown<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Western Ghats form\none of the four watersheds of India, feeding the perennial rivers of India.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The\nmajor river systems originating in the Western Ghats are Godavari, Kaveri,\nKrishna, Thamiraparani and Tungabhadra.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The majority of streams draining the\nWestern Ghats join these rivers, and carry large volume of water during the\nmonsoon months.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These rivers flow to the east due to the gradient of the land\nand drain out into the Bay of Bengal. Major tributaries include Kali, Bhadra,\nBhavani, Bhima, Malaprabha, Ghataprabha, Hemavathi and Kabini. The Periyar,\nBharathappuzha, Pamba, Netravati, Sharavathi, Mandovi and Zuari rivers flow\nwestwards towards the Western Ghats, draining into the Arabian Sea and are\nfast-moving, owing to the steeper gradient.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jog Falls in Karnataka, and\nAthirpally waterfalls of Kerala are&nbsp; the\nmost spectacular waterfalls in India..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are more than 51\nmajor dams along the length of the Western Ghats.Most notable of these projects\nare the Koyna in Maharashtra, Linganmakki and Shivanasamudra in Karnataka,\nMettur and Pykara in Tamil Nadu, Parambikulam, Malampuzha and Idukki in Kerala.\nIt shelters as many more than 265 million people in six states, namely,\nGujarat, Maharashtra, Goa, Karnataka, Kerala and Tamilnadu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rivers have been\ndammed for hydroelectric and irrigation purposes with major reservoirs spread\nacross the states.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the monsoon\nseason, numerous streams fed by incessant rain drain off the mountain sides\nleading to numerous waterfalls. Major waterfalls include Dudhsagar, Unchalli,\nSathodi, Magod, Hogenakkal, Jog, Kunchikal, Shivanasamudra, Meenmutty Falls,\nAthirappilly Falls. Talakaveri is the source of the river Kaveri and the\nKuduremukha range is the source of the Tungabhadra.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western Ghats have several\nman-made lakes and reservoirs with major lakes at Ooty (84 acres) in Nilgiris,\nKodaikanal (64 acres) and Berijam in Palani Hills, Pookode lake, Karlad Lake in\nWayanad, Vagamon lake, Devikulam (15 acres) and Letchmi (4.9 acres) in Idukki,\nKerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Average annual\ntemperature is around 15 \u00b0C . In some parts frost is common, and temperatures\ntouch the freezing point during the winter months. Mean temperature range from\n20 \u00b0C&nbsp; in the south to 24 \u00b0C&nbsp; in the north.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the monsoon\nseason between June and September, the unbroken Western Ghats chain acts as a\nbarrier to the moisture laden clouds. The heavy, eastward-moving rain-bearing\nclouds are forced to rise and in the process deposit most of their rain on the\nwindward side.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rainfall in this region averages 300 centimetres (120 in) to 400\ncentimetres (160 in) with localised extremes touching 900 centimetres (350 in).\nThe eastern region of the Western Ghats which lie in the rain shadow, receive\nfar less rainfall of about 100 centimetres (39 in) resulting in an average\nrainfall of 250 centimetres (98 in) across regions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Western Ghats are\nhome to four tropical and subtropical moist broadleaf forest ecoregions \u2013 the\nNorth Western Ghats moist deciduous forests, North Western Ghats montane rain\nforests, South Western Ghats moist deciduous forests, and South Western Ghats\nmontane rain forests.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The northern portion of the range is generally drier than\nthe southern portion, and at lower elevations makes up the North Western Ghats\nmoist deciduous forests ecoregion, with mostly deciduous forests made up\npredominantly of teak. The evergreen forests in Wayanad mark the transition\nzone between the northern and southern ecologic regions of the Western Ghats.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The southern ecologic regions are generally wetter and more species-rich. The\nSouth Western Ghats montane rain forests are the most species-rich ecologic\nregion in peninsular India;&nbsp; more than 82\n% of the flowering plant species of the entire Western Ghats range are found in\nthis ecologic region.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Historically the\nWestern Ghats were well-covered in dense forests that provided wild foods and\nnatural habitats for native tribal people. Its inaccessibility made it\ndifficult for people from the plains to cultivate the land and build settlements.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the arrival of the British in the area, large swathes of territory were\ncleared for agricultural plantations and timber. The forests were raped by the\nwhite invader and he carted away 80% of the ancient huge girth Rosewood, Teak\nand Sandalwood trees.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the locals tried to stop it they were branded THUGGEES\nor murderers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THUGS OF HINDOSTAN , is\nabout the life of the killer mob (sic ) in India THUGGEE before independence.\n.. The film is based on 19th century novel 'Confession of a Thug'. The book\ndescribes about a cult in India which murdered people for money \u2026 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THUGGEEs WERE GREAT\nPATRIOTS , HARDCORE DESH BHAKTS WHO WOULD NOT TOLERATE THE WHITE INVADER\nCARTING AWAY INDIAs NATURAL PRODUCE AND CUTTING DOWN HUGE TREES .... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE GANGS ATTACKED\nONLY THE WHITE INVADER AND HIS INDIAN TRAITOR STOOGES.... THEY ARE NOT THUGS --\nBUT BRAVE AND HONORABLE CHILDREN OF BHARATMATA ..WE ARE PROUD OF THEM.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE WILL NOT ALLOW\nPATRIOTS WHO PROTECTED BHARATMATA TO BE CONVERTED TO PETTY THIEVES AND CRIMINAL\nMURDERERS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\ndestroyed the flora and the fauna of the Malabar in his haste to steal and cart\nit away to England .. Today we have foreign funded desh drohis praising the\nwhite invader for building railways, bridges and harbours\u2014as if they build it\nout of kindness to native Indians .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The forest in the Western Ghats were\nseverely fragmented due to human activities, especially clear felling for tea,\ncoffee, and teak plantations during 1799 to 1946. Species that are rare,\nendemic and habitat specialists were &nbsp;more adversely affected and were &nbsp;lost faster than other species.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Complex and\nspecies rich habitats like the tropical rainforest were much more adversely\naffected than other habitats. This area held more tigers than the Sundarbans\ndelta before the white invader came to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western ghats has 31%\nof Indias biodiversity.&nbsp; There are more\nthan&nbsp; 513&nbsp;\nbird species , 6100&nbsp; insect species,\n7,462 flowering plants species,&nbsp; 142\nmammal species, 263 reptile species and 182 amphibian species.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Western\nGhats eco-region has the largest Indian elephant population in the wild.. According\nto the IUCN, 97 freshwater fish species from the Western Ghats were considered\nthreatened..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2012, the following\nplaces are declared as World Heritage Sites:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indira Gandhi Wildlife\nSanctuary and National Park<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalakkad Mundanthurai\nTiger Reserve<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thattekad Bird\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mudumalai Tiger Reserve<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shendurney Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neyyar Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peppara Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Periyar Tiger Reserve<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Srivilliputtur Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eravikulam National\nPark<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grass Hills National\nPark<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chinnar Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Silent Valley National\nPark<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mukurthi National Park<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pushpagiri Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahmagiri Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Talakaveri Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aralam Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kaas Plateau<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parambikulam Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pambadum Shola National\nPark<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anamudi Shola National\nPark<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Peechi-Vazhani Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wayanad Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mathikettan Shola\nNational Park<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kurinjimala Sanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karimpuzha National\nPark<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Idukki Wildlife\nSanctuary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ranipuram National Park<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WAYANAD HAS LOST 95% OF\nHER PRECIOUS STINGING BEES WHO STORE WILD ORCHIDS DERIVED HONEY IN HEXAGONAL\nHIVES, &nbsp;IN THE PAST 60 YEARS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A LOT OF THIS HAS TO DO\nWITH TOXIC PESTICIDES USED BY THE ADVENT OF THE GREEN REVOLUTION AND THEN LATER\nBY WIFI SIGNALS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have sugar, it\nenters the blood stream only after digestion and conversion. Honey does NOT\nhave to be digested, that is the magic part. It has been digested by bees\nalready and then inverted and concentrated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The honey in hives exist on trees\nin the western ghat forests in great abundance. This natural honey has a rich\ndistinctive aroma.&nbsp; This scent is the\nsame aromatic volatile oils in the fresh wild tropical flowers . This natural\nnectar taken in by the bees has very high sugar concentration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ordinarily to\nobtain 450 grams ( a small bottle ) of pure honey, 16000 bees must visit 9.5\nmillion flowers--around 7200 work hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 3 different sugars\nare dextrose (34% ) , sucrose ( 2%) and fructose (40% ) water ( 17% ) and 7 %\nof minerals, vitamins, elements, acids, hormones and proteins. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This 7% is what the\nquality of honey is all about. In the hive the bees use their honey stomachs to\ningest and REGURGITATE several times till it is digested, and the end product\nreached a desired quality. Only then it is stored in honeycomb cells.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the final\nregurgitation the honey cell is left unsealed, for it is still high in water\ncontent and natural yeasts, which can cause fermentation.. The bees now use\ntheir wings as fans to evaporate the water. This raises the sugar concentration\ntoo. People with diabetes can have this honey without adverse problems to\nhealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nowadays useless\nartificial honey from bees force fed with artificial sugar and molasses in bee\nhives, has bacteria in it. This is why it has to be radiated with gamma rays to\ndestroy Clostridium Botulinium endospores, and hence is NOT quantum food. Such\nhoney cannot be used to embalm a dead Pharaoh. Bees are pollinators.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nature is\nNOT about stupid plastic gardens like Singapore without birds, bees and\nsquirrels. They are reduced to do artificial pollination, thanks to the mobile\nphone towers, too much of insecticide and artificial fertilisers.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In playing to\nthe gallery and making the tourists say WOW the muffs have screwed up their country,\nso much so that they need water from Malaysia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India must reduce the\nradiation limit of all the WIFI in hney bee areas of Western Ghats or we go the\nSingapore way, no bees for pollination -- all plastic ! The greatest value of\nbees is NOT in the honey, but in the service they do as pollinators. In USA it\nhas been quantified that 88% of the crops are dependant on the honey bee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY THERE ARE TWO\nTYPES OF BEES IN KERALA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1) STINGING BEES -- BIG\nIN SIZE &nbsp;\u2013 ORIGINAL BEES SINCE ANTIQUITY ..\nHONEY USED IN AYURVEDA .. THEY LOSE THEIR WAY AND DIE DUE TO WIFI RADIATION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2) NON STINGING BEES\n--SMALL LIKE HOUSE &nbsp;FLIES ( &nbsp;PROCURED FROM ABROAD AND RELEASED BY DESH\nDROHIS IN NORTH KERALA ).. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are red flags\nlinking wireless radiation to serious HUMAN disorders: leukemia, brain tumors,\nheart arrhythmias, sleep disruptions, irreversible DNA and neurological damage.\nBirds, bats, and bees are known to avoid cell towers, and to become disoriented\naround them. Their populations are plummeting.. Even vegetation reacts\nnegatively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The focus should be on\nhuman health, not energy efficiency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVER SEEN THE HOLLYWOOD\nMOVIE INTERSTELLAR WHERE THE EARTH BECOMES A DUST BOWL WITH NO BEES TO\nPOLLINATE- LEAVING ONLY GM CORN ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distance between\nwifi waves is shorter than that of radio waves and longer than that of\nmicrowaves, giving wifi a unique transmission band that can\u2019t be interrupted by\nother signals. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wifi waves travel\nthrough space as rapid, data encoded pulses or waves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wifi occupies the radio\nfrequency band of the electromagnetic spectrumbetween actual radio waves and\nmicrowaves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Objects such as trees\ncan obstruct the signal such that it has to be augmented by multiple wifi\nrouters placed in different positions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HEAVILY FINE ALL MANUFACTURERS\nWHO MAKE FAKE HONEY -BY FORCE FEEDING MOLASSES TO BEES -- OR ADULTERATES HONEY\nWITH SUGAR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Drop honey into the water, if it went straight\ndown in the water, the honey is pure, but if smeared in the water, it means\nit's fake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again cell phone\nradiation can disorient worker bees causing them to get lost on the way back to\nthe hive. India must NOT adopt 5G&nbsp; till\nwe study its negative effects<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WESTERN GHATS MUST\nREMAIN A PLACE WHERE INDIANS CAN GO AND REST IN SOLITUDE AND REVIVE THEIR\nSPIRITS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flowers rely on bees\nand their honey-making instincts; when a bee visits a flower to get nectar, it\nbecomes covered in that flower\u2019s pollen. As the bee continues to visit more and\nmore flowers, it drops pollen from one flower onto another. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This allows flowers to\npollinate, which means they become ready to produce more flowers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If there are NO bees\nthere will be famine on this planet . Ninety per cent of crops are cross\npollinated, of which 85% depend upon insects for pollination. It is estimated\nthat about one third of all plants and plant products eaten by humans are\ndirectly or indirectly dependant on bee pollination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my home compound\nitself I have noticed the lack of bee hives, unlike what it was 10 years ago .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIA IS GOING DOWN THE\nROAD OF SINGAPORE --WITH PLASTIC GARDENS AND NIL BEES, BUTTERFLIES, BIRDS etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raw unprocessed honey (\nNOT SUPERMARKET HONEY FROM BEE HIVE OWNERS ) is the richest source of live,\nhealing enzymes which go a long way in sharpening your IQ and making you more\nmentally alert. Honey is easily digestible and is a great energy boost for the\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Honey has the enzyme\ncatalase to convert deadly electron wrenching hydrogen peroxide molecules to\nwater and oxygen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The anti-oxidants in\nhoney like flavonoids and phenolic acids , make it God\u2019s food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Honey is effective in\nkilling drug-resistant biofilms and has an osmotic effect. The acidic pH of\nhoney is commonly between of about 3.5 prevents the growth of many strains of\nharmful bacteria. Antioxidants in honey reduce the damage to the colon in\ncolitis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE PERFECT HEXAGONAL\nLATTICE HIVES OF LARGE STINGING BEES IS PROOF OF GODs EXISTANCE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/queen-bee-and-darwin-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/queen-bee-and-darwin-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/honey-quantum-food-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/honey-quantum-food-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAugust 27, 2018 at 4:56 AM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMY READERS WANT ME TO PEN THE \"VADAKAYIL REPORT\"\nTO SUPERSEDE THE \"GADGIL REPORT\" AND THE \"KASTURIRANGAN\nREPORT\"..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWELL PADMA BHUSHAN MADHAV GADGIL , PADMA VIBHUSHAN\nKRISHNASWAMI KASTURIRANGAN ARE STILL ALIVE AND THEY HAVE BEEN GIVING RIDICULOUS\nSOUND BYTES ON TV , ABOUT LANDSLIDES AND KERALA FLOODS ALONG WITH PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN MS SWAMINANTHAN..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWELL FIRST LET ME DESCRIBE MS SWAMINATHAN , THE FATHER OF\nTHE \"GREEN REVOLUTION\".. THIS DESH DROHI IS THE REASON WHY INDIA LOST\nITS HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND LOST 90% OF LAKES ..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHESE LAKES SURVIVED FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS IN PRISTINE\nCONDITON , AND WERE DECIMATED IN JUST 55 YEARS BY THE GREEN REVOLUTION WHICH\nGAVE US TOXIC ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES...<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMADHAV GADGIL BEHAVING LIKE AN OUTRAGED VIRGIN , MUST KNOW\nTHAT QUARRYING HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH LANDSLIDES..&nbsp; THERE HAS BEEN NO LANDSLIDES IN THE VICINITY\nOF QUARRIES IN KERALA DURING THESE RECENT FLOODS.. OF COURSE THE SOUND CAN\nDISTURB BEES AND SMALL BIRDS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAN AVALANCHE OF SNOW CAN BE SET OFF BY A MERE SONIC BOOM OF\nA FIGHTER JET FLYING OVER THE MOUNTAIN.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nINDUCED SESMICITY CAUSED BY MAN MADE DAM RESERVOIRS ARE THE\nMAJOR REASON FOR LANDSLIDES IN KERALA\u2026 AND THE REASON WHY MANY DAM WALLS\nCOLLAPSED WITH MAJOR LOSS OF LIFE ALL AROUND THE PLANET..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE INDIAN MERCANTILE MARINE DEPT, THE DIRECTOR GENERAL OF\nSHIPPING AND SHIPPING MINISTER MUST KNOW THAT MANY IRON ORE SHIPS WHICH LOADED\nIRON ORE AT PARADIP HAVE SUNK AT SEA WITH TOTAL LOSS OF LIFE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPARADIP DOES NOT HAVE THE MEANS TO TRIM THE PILE OF IRON ORE\nWHICH IT LOADS INTO THE SHIPS HOLDS..THE ANGLE OF REPOSE WAS TOO HIGH AND THE\nORE SHIFTED DURING ROLLING IN HEAVY SEAS..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHUNDREDS OF ORE SHIPS CARRYING CONCENTRATES HAVE SUNK.. WHEN\nTHE POWERS THAT BE GOVERNING SHIPPING MADE NO EFFORTS ,<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI AS A YOUNG CAPTAIN HAS MY OWN RULES FOR MY SHIP.. THIS IS\nNARRATED IN THE BLOGPOST BELOW\u2026<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWHERE THERE IS EXCESSIVE RAIN LIKE THE EL NINO POWERED RAINS\nWHICH CAUSED THE FLOODS IN KERALA CERTAIN SOILS HOLD TOO MUCH MOISTURE .. WHEN\nTHE SOIL GETS SATURATED IT JUST FLOWS DOWN SLOPE LIKE A RIVER , WHICH IS CALLED\nLANDSLIDE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBELOW IS A YOUTUBE VIDEO OF SUCH A LANDSLIDE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=czVJ6MNgE8E\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=czVJ6MNgE8E</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE SLOPE DOES NOT HAVE TO BE TO STEEP IF DEEP ROOTED\nVEGETATION IS REMOVED WHICH BINDS COLLUVIUM TO BEDROCK.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH\nHIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS. AS THE TOP PERMEABLE\nSOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES\nTHEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nFOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL\nACUITY TO DELCARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY. THERE\nWILL ALWAYS BE A TRIGGER LIKE RAIN WATER STURATION OR A SEISMIC TREMOR ( IN\nCASE THERE IS NO RAIN ). EVEN THUNDER CAN CAUSE A LANDSLIDE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIN KODUGU DISTRICT THIS BLOGSITE HAS WARNED OF GROUND WATER\nPRESSURE FROM UNDERNEATH TRIGGERING LAND SLIDES AND HAS ASKED PEOPLE TO RUN IF\nTHEY SEE WATER FOUNTAINS ENAMANTING FROM THE GROUND.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA THIXOTROPIC MATERIAL SUCH AS MUD CAN CHANGE INTO A GEL OR\nSOL BY ADDING WATER OR PRESSURE OR SHAKING . IT GOES FROM BEING STABLE ONE\nMINUTE TO FLUID THE NEXT MINUTE ( THE REASON WHY ORE CONCENTARE SHIPS SANK )<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI ASK \u2013WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ARE THESE..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nDON\u2019T WE HAVE TRAINED AND INTELLIGENT PEOPLE IN INDIA.. WHAT\nARE OUR THINK TANKS WORTH..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I AM NOT GONNA WASTE\nANY OF MY TIME IN EXPOUNDING AGAIN,HOW &nbsp;MS SWAMINATHAN THE FATHER OF THE DESH DROHI\nGREEN REVOLUTION DESTROYED THE WATER BODIES OF INDIA IN 55 YEARS FLAT.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVERY PEOPLE IN WAYANAD\nWHO DRANK WATER OFF GUTTERS 50 YEARS AGO , &nbsp;NOW DRINK BOTTLED MINERAL WATER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; THAN THESE MELORD JUDGES\nIN RIDICULOUS ROBES.</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>JUST BEFORE THE KERALE\nFLOODS STARTED , I WAS WORRIED ABOUT MULLAPERIAR DAM BURSTING \u2013AND HAD TO SEND\nTHIS MESSAGE BELOW TO REDUCE THE WATER LEVEL FROM 142 TO 139 FEET.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; BAAYE GAAAD !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAVE NOT YET SEEN A SINGLE JUDGE WHO CAN APPLY BODAS ON OUR CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE PREPONDERANCE OF LAWS IN THE CONSTITUTION MUST BE CLEARLY LAID OUT IN A CRYSTAL \"BODMAS \" STYLE... 1 + 5 x 6 - 3 + (4 - 2)... what part should you calculate first?.....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Calculate them in the wrong order, and you will get a wrong answer !...&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is where BODMAS kicks in !......</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR UNSUCCESSFUL LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES DONT HAVE THE BRAINS TO PRIORITIZE.....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">B- Brackets first.... O- Orders (ie Powers and Square Roots, etc.)..... DM- Division and Multiplication (left-to-right)..... AS- Addition and Subtraction (left-to-right)..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE TEAM HEADED BY BR AMBEDKAR WHO COMPILED OUR CONSTITUTION, DID NOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL - NAY- PERCEPION-- TO APPLY BODMAS ....&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS HAS RESULTED IN EVEN FOREIGN FORCES USING TROJAN HORSE NGOs ( VIA PIL ) TO HIJACK OUR CONSTITUTION..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE SUPREME COURT LAWYER TURNED JUDGES ARE UNABLE TO INTERPRET THE CONSTITUTION... , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS BLOGSITE TOOK THE\nLEAD IN SHOOTING DOWN \u201cARANMULA AIRPORT\u201d- A DESH DROHI CHRISTIANs WET DREAM TO\nKILL THE SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ARANMULA WETLANDS HAVE\nBEEN A WATER HOLDING BASIN TO DRAIN AND &nbsp;HOLD FLOOD WATERS FOR MILLENNIUMS.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
