text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gNhEE8CNZks/W4jazifoKwI/AAAAAAABd8Q/cxHQZt0W4gIYFdFK6G9_4dbWRkr_TpOqACLcBGAs/s1600/King-Gcobra-portait.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"434\" data-original-width=\"379\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gNhEE8CNZks/W4jazifoKwI/AAAAAAABd8Q/cxHQZt0W4gIYFdFK6G9_4dbWRkr_TpOqACLcBGAs/s640/King-Gcobra-portait.jpg\" width=\"558\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE AYURVEDIC HERB BANK\nOF WAYANAD WERE BASICALLY SNAKE GROVES ALL CREATED BY LORD PARASHURAMA 6000\nYEARS AGO TO INCREASE THE HUMIC ACID CONTENT OF THE TOP SOIL AND KEEP AWAY\nEXCRETA OF ANIMALS &nbsp;..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/king-cobra-and-snake-temples-of-kerala.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UnMtdYCJ9eg/W4jaTTm0boI/AAAAAAABd8I/24PpuGPVHuAJpOsDaR2YFzes75mAdnfvACLcBGAs/s1600/snackJH-man7_1501701569_150.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"550\" data-original-width=\"636\" height=\"552\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-UnMtdYCJ9eg/W4jaTTm0boI/AAAAAAABd8I/24PpuGPVHuAJpOsDaR2YFzes75mAdnfvACLcBGAs/s640/snackJH-man7_1501701569_150.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">You can\u2019t buy humus.\nEvery product that calls itself humus, is just some form of compost.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The gardeners job is to\nincrease the amount of humus in soil. Think of humus as being a big sponge that\ncan hold up to 90% of it\u2019s weight in water. This water holding capacity of\nhumus is why humus rich soil will remain moist for weeks longer than soil\nwithout humus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Humus is the most\nimportant thing in soil: more important that dew worms, and organic matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;HUMUS IN TOP SOIL GAVE INDIA PRICELESS FLORA\nFOLLOWING THE GOLDEN MEAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Again, compost is NOT\nhumus. When organic matter starts to decompose these molecules are broken down\ninto smaller and smaller molecules by the micro-organisms in the soil (mostly\nbacteria and fungi).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">During the humification process, microbes secrete sticky\ngum-like mucilages; these contribute to the crumb structure (tilth) of the soil\nby holding particles together, and allowing greater aeration of the soil. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Toxic substances such\nas heavy metals, as well as excess nutrients, can be chelated (that is, bound\nto the complex organic molecules of humus) and so prevented from entering the\nwider ecosystem. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today humus rich snake\ngroves have been decimated by vested people calling it superstition. 200 years\nago Kerala had more than 80,000 snake groves, &nbsp;on the western ghats , the most abundant\nsource of Humic acid rich soil. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today we have just\naround 4500 snake groves and they are disappearing fast. &nbsp;Snakes keep away animals and rodents whose\nexcreta degrades the humus .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In humus, carbon\nfrequently outweighs nitrogen by 10 to one. Humpless western cow dung has too\nmuch nitrogen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Humic acid increases\nwater retention, retains nutrients and enhances microbiological activity,\nenzymes in soil, etc. The organic matter on biodegradation is converted in to\nhumus, which contains humic and fulvic substances.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The humic substance contains\nvarious functional groups of carboxylic, carbonyl, phenolic, alcoholic with\nhigher molecular weight of 40,000 to 70,000 and higher cation exchange capacity\n(100-130 meq/100 gm). Lignite contains more of humic acid..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The quinoidine and\nactive acids within the liquid product of potassium humate have strong\npotentiality of oxidation, which restrains the activities of free radicals and\nhence, avails the development of the foliage and positively influences plants\nmetabolism, photosynthesis, respiration, activity of ferments. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Potassium, acting on\nthe cell level, facilitates the absorption of nutrients by the roots and the\nexchange of gases through the stomata; this element is also a vital constituent\nof chlorophyll, speeding up photosynthesis. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Potassium Humate\nalleviates the toxicity of pesticide residue and prevents soil from\ncontamination of heavy metallic ions as well as other harmful matters. &nbsp;The high Cation Exchange Capacity of the\nproduct improves the utilization of fertilizers. It combines with such elements\nas Nitrogen, Phosphorus and Potassium which constitute in highly-efficient multi-function\ncompound fertilizers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At some point, all of the good stuff in the\norganic matter is used up and some molecules remain that can\u2019t be used by\nmicro-organisms or plants.. This remaining material is called humus. It\nconsists mostly of carbon and so it is still organic, but micro-organisms just\ncan decompose it any further. Humus is so stable that it can persist in the\nsoil for hundreds of years\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Humus has a negative\ncharge which means that many of the nutrients plants require stick to humus,\nincluding ammonium (source of nitrogen), calcium, magnesium and phosphorous to\nname a few.. The humus sponge holds onto these nutrients and prevents rain from\nwashing them away. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When a plant root comes\nin contact with it, the plant root is able to remove the nutrients from the\nhumus sponge. The process is a bit more complicated than this, but you can\nthink of humus as being a slow release source of fertilizer for your plants. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most important\nreason for having humus is that it is responsible for aggregation. Aggregation\nis what makes soil loose and very friable, improving the structure of soil.\nBetter soil structure found in humus rich soil makes it easier for plant roots\nto grow by providing them with better access to nutrients, water and most\nimportantly oxygen\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Humus is a colloidal\nsubstance, and increases the soil's cation exchange capacity, hence its ability\nto store nutrients by chelation. While these nutrient cations are accessible to\nplants, they are held in the soil safe from being leached by rain or\nirrigation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Healthy soils contain 2.5 to 5% organic\nmatter, by weight (5 -10% by volume).. This number does not include the humus\namount. Too much organic matter can be a problem for soils so adding huge\namounts of organic matter in order to build humus quickly is not a good idea\u2026</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Humus can hold the\nequivalent of 90 % of its weight in moisture, and therefore increases the\nsoil's capacity to withstand drought condition. The biochemical structure of\nhumus enables it to moderate \u2013 or buffer \u2013 excessive acid or alkaline soil\nconditions\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HUMUS IS DECIMATED BY\nCHEMICAL FERTILISERS. \u2026 SWAMINATHAN BABY , GADGIL BABY AND KASTURIRANGAN BABY\nWILL NOT KNOW THIS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MOST OF THE FARMER\nSUICIDES IN INDIA IS 100% DUE TO LOSS OF HUMUS IN THE SOIL .. CHEMICAL FERTILIZERS MAKE THE SOIL THIRSTY AND INCAPABLE OF HOLDING MOISTURE... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">APCO MODI IS TOO BUSY\nANGLING FOR A NOBEL PRIZE FROM ZIONIST JEWS TO UNDERSTAND THE REASON FOR MARMER\nSUICIDES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TAMIL NADU MUST\nUNDERSTAND THIS INSTEAD OF CRYING LIKE RETARDED BABIES FOR CAUVERY WATER\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-e3JNYIk1tlI/W4lM9kYyzFI/AAAAAAABd9M/EpaAUZgcno0jb9azHtwpZLXMrmYJJ1X2wCLcBGAs/s1600/kuttaNnad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LwNXizzEnAc/W4lNd9wV5nI/AAAAAAABd9Y/j8N0Cr9ninAdsVIacCfNq7IJcGetJQLMwCLcBGAs/s1600/15alrrp01-fB%2Barm-%252B16TV-KUTTANAD.eps.j.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535714446665#c8111759016671708497\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 31, 2018 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOMEBODY ASKED ME --IF I HAVE BEEN A BIT HARSH WITH OUR PDAMA AWARD HEROES MADHAV GADGIL AND K KASTURIRANGAN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LISTEN --- IF I GO HAMMER AND TONGS AFTER THE, THEY WILL BE COVERED WITH SHIT AND PEOPLE WILL THROW STONES AT THEM. ECOLOGISTS MUST NOT DEVELOP THE OSTRICH SYNDROME..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS--ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT SEA AS A CHEMICAL TANKER SHIP CAPTAIN, IF I GO TO MY SHORE BOSSES WITH A PROBLEM WITHOUT AN ATTACHED SOLUTION, IT GOES AGAINST ME ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF MY ATTACHED SOLUTION IS LATER PROVED TO BE HOGWASH I WILL NOT GET MY NEXT CONTRACT.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF I GO GHADI GHADI TO THEM WITH PROBLEMS ND ZERO ATTACHED SOLUTIONS --MY RELIEVER WILL LAND UP WITHOUT WARNING AT THE NEXT PORT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HAS OUR NGT EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ACCOUNTABLITY IS NOT ONLY WHAT WE DO , BUT ALSO WHAT WE DO NOT DO--FOR WHICH WE ARE ACCOUNTABLE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">OUR GRUESOME TWOSOME MADHAV GADGIL AND K KARURIRANGAN HAS TURNED A NELSONs EYE TO THE BIGGEST ECOLOGICAL PROBEM IN KUTTANAD --THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KUTTANAD WENT UNDER FLOODS ONLY BECAUSE OF RAMPANT LAND RECLAMATION OF VEMBABAND LAKE...THIS MASSIVE ENCROACHMENT STARTED DURING THE WHITE INVADERS RULE WITH HELP OF OF CHURCH FOR THE RICH LAND OWNING CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CHRISTIAN CONVERT FISHERMEN WANTED TO CATCH NICE BRACKISH WATER FISH WITHOUT VENTURING INTO SEA, KEEPING THEIR ASSES SAFE IN PLACID WATERS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY HAS THE GRUESOME TWOSOME NOT SAY A SINGLE WORD ABOUT THANEERUKKOM BUND AND THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">Over 1.7 million people live on the banks of the Vembanad lake and are directly or indirectly dependent on it for their livelihoods</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE THANNERMUKKOM BUND WAS FOR THE RICH CHRISTIAN CONVERT LANDOWNERS TO CULTIVATE PADDY CROPS THREE TIMES A YEAR INSTEAD OF TWO AND MAXIMISE PROFITS. THIS BUND HAS CREATED EXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">NETHERLANDS </span><span style=\"color: red;\">WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL .</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The bund has caused deterioration of fish varieties in the region and the fishermen opposed to the bund.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The bund has also disrupted the harmony of the sea with the backwaters and has caused problems not foreseen before the bund like the omniprescence of the water weeds.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Earlier the salt water tends to cleanse the backwaters but this does not happen any more leading to the pollution of the backwaters and the entire land near by.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kuttanad region has the lowest altitude in India, and is one of the few places in the world where farming is carried around between four to ten feet below sea level. Rice grown in saline waters is not good for heath.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The history of FRESH WATER paddy cultivation in Kuttanad can be traced back for millenniums</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I will write in more detail later</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE ASK GADGIL BABY AND KASTURIRANGAN BABY--WHY IS KUTTANAD STILL UNDER WATER? PRAY --PRITHEE ?</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">IT DID NOT ACCOUNT FOR HIGHWATER SPRING TIDES, SEAWATER LEVEL RISE DUE TO ADVERSE WINDS OF LONG FETCH , EL NINO POWERED SEVERE RAINS , SUDDEN RELEASE OF DAM WATERS ETC&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_50BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedLdND\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_49T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedLdND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_49TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_49TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_49TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedLdND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_49TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_49TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedLdND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_49TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_49TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_49TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_50b+seedLdND\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_49B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8273514522238414785\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_49M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_65TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8836530626581760483\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_64M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535723056266#c8836530626581760483\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 31, 2018 at 7:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA, </span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KUTTANAD</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"> WAS CALLED </span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CHUTTANADU.</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />CHUTTA MEANS BURNT..NADU MEANS LAND</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">KHANDAVA FOREST WAS SITUATED HERE.. THIS FOREST WAS BURNT DOWN 6000 YEARS AGO BY LORD KRISHNA TO ARM TWIST MAYA DANAVA ( BEST ARCHITECT ON THE PLANET -- </span><span style=\"color: red;\">MAYAVI -- GRANDMASTER OF ILLUSIONS</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ) INTO BUILDING THE INDRAPRASTA PALACE WITH ITS HALL OF ILLUSIONS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya ( Danava ) is mentioned 23 times in the Ramayana, and 61 times in the Mahabharata. A unique reason for glory and legacy indeed. He was the acharya of all the Mayavis ( sorcerers).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya Danava was a descendant of Danu, one of Kasyapa\u2018s 13 wives and a daughter of Dakhsa Prajapati.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya Danava was in the Khandava forest, to build for Takshaka the Naga king.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">This was the opportunity Arjuna in collusion with Lord Krishna looked for. They set fire to the mighty forest which was reputed to hold every specimen of flora and fauna.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In this gruesome deliberate fire everything died except Takshaka's Aswasena son and 4 sarnagaka birds. Maya Danava was conveniently saved by Lord Krishna.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Out of sheer gratitude Asura Maya Danava asked , how he can ever repay Arjuna. Immediately Lord Krishna trapped him. \"Let a palatial Sabha (meeting hall) as thou choosest, be built by thee, if thou, O son of Diti, who art the foremost of all artists, desirest to do good to Yudhishthira the just (Mahabharata.2.1)\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Krishna told Arjuna \"Your city has been constructed by Vishwakarma and is truly beautiful. However, the Indraprastha palace is much too plain for such a wonderful city. Let a palatial meeting hall be constructed for Yudhishtra the just. Maya Danava is the best person to construct it, being the architect of the Asuras.\"</span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KRISHNA WAS ALREADY SETTING UP THE INCIDENT OF KING DURYODHANA FALLING INTO A POOL OF WATER , QUEEN DRAUPADI LAUGHING LOUND IN SARCASM\u2014WHICH WAS THE TRIGGER FOR THE MAHABHARATA WAR.</span></b></div>\n<br />Maya measured out a plot of land five thousand cubits square and began the construction. Soon the peerless palace of great beauty encrusted with diamonds was completed. The columns of this palace were made of gold.<br /><br />Maya appointed 8000 asuras called Kinkaras to guard this palace. Inside the palace, there were many amazing devices. It took the Maya just fourteen months to complete this building. Everything was made as per the principles of Vaastu.<br /><br />In Indian history, Mayan appears several times, most significantly as the author of Mayamatam, \"Concept of Mayan\" which is a Vastu Shastra, a text on art, architecture and town planning. He created the Mayan calendar.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">MAYA DANAVA AND KERALA KING MAHABALI WENT TO PERU ( PATALA ) BY VIMANA</span></b><br /><br />Aswasena later tried to take revenge for his mother, and hid in the quiver of Karna who was fighting Arjuna still like an arrow, but Arjuna's charioter Lord Krishna prevented this dart from hitting Arjuna by causing the horses to bend down thus sinking the chariot wheels. .</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n60 years after the Mahabharata war, Takshaka ( son of Ashwasena ) had his revenge by killing Parikshit, Arjuna's grandson.<br />\n<br />\nParikshit was forewarned and so he build a tower in the midle of a lake, with every hole and crevice plugged. But Takshaka coverted itself into a worm and bore into a mango, which was to be taken in a basket as food.<br />\n<br />\nParikshit was engulfed in flames due to the potency of the venom--as a poetic justice , as Takshaka's wife was killed in the Khandava forest fire.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">King Parikshit who was killed by snake bite , was father of Emperor </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Jayameyjayan </span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">who built Kedarnath Temple in a grand manner .</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/6000-year-old-kedarnath-temple-highest.html</span><br /><br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">59.21%</span></b><br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>BELOW: THE FACE OF KING JAYAMEYJAYAN IS AT CENTRE TOP (UNDER THE LIGHT BULB )</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
