, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEHRU JAILED INDIAN COMMIES BEFORE THE 1962 WAR ..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE COMMIE BASTARDS\nWHEN THEY CAME OUT OF JAIL- THOUSANDS OF THEM---- PISSED ON FOOD BAGS IN FCI\nGODOWNS ( CONCERTED EFFORT ) AND CAUSED THE GREAT FAMINE , WHICH INTRODUCED THE\nKOSHER GREEN REVOLUTION\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR HOLY HUMUS LADEN\nTOP TOIL WAS RAPED BY ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES KILLING BENEFICIAL\nMICROBES ..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;90% OF OUR LAKES WHICH SURVIVED IN PRISTINE CONDITION FOR MILLIONS\nOF YEARS WERE KILLED IN JUST 55 YEARS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lWpVsu_dgBk/W4p_7ow_7iI/AAAAAAABd_w/QhBHgQ_mxV0vGO_hF3LoUT6b6rq-DlqZgCLcBGAs/s1600/AJIT%2B9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"479\" data-original-width=\"638\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lWpVsu_dgBk/W4p_7ow_7iI/AAAAAAABd_w/QhBHgQ_mxV0vGO_hF3LoUT6b6rq-DlqZgCLcBGAs/s640/AJIT%2B9.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Go3pXZiiBYg/W4qAHvykcvI/AAAAAAABd_0/sqof9xGBxvQ7IsIcTxultNdvGRz4PFMmQCLcBGAs/s1600/AJIT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"604\" data-original-width=\"805\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Go3pXZiiBYg/W4qAHvykcvI/AAAAAAABd_0/sqof9xGBxvQ7IsIcTxultNdvGRz4PFMmQCLcBGAs/s1600/AJIT.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BELOW: MY PASSPORT SAYS THAT I WAS BORN IN&nbsp; KOZHIKODE CITY ( CALICUT ).. WAYANAD , THE LAND OF SPICES ,IS THE MOST PRICELESS PART OF THIS PLANET</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-f2v2tQ7wE9M/W4qGKxOfG3I/AAAAAAABeAM/yA7L4XxPTjwCyrAfedOc0-LPUqDE47reQCLcBGAs/s1600/KerFFala_City_Map.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"313\" data-original-width=\"251\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-f2v2tQ7wE9M/W4qGKxOfG3I/AAAAAAABeAM/yA7L4XxPTjwCyrAfedOc0-LPUqDE47reQCLcBGAs/s640/KerFFala_City_Map.jpg\" width=\"511\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ministry of Environment\nhad enough reports (Gadgil and Kasturirangan; Ooman committee was state-level),\nbut still, they didn\u2019t take any action. The reports were neither available in\nthe public domain nor the opinion of states was asked.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So guess who intervened\nby this time? None other than the National Green Tribunal (NGT)!&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bench headed\nby NGT Chairperson Justice Swatanter Kumar imposed a fine of Rs 25,000 on the\nministry for failing to file its final report on recommendations of two panels\nset up to study environmental sensitivity and ecological significance of the\nWestern Ghats, saying better standards were expected from it.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In May 2014 National\nDemocratic Alliance (NDA) came to power and stated that it would take the\nrecommendations of the Kasturirangan committee over Madhav Gadgil committee\nreport.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In effect, the\nrestriction level of Kasturirangan\u2019s ESA corresponds to that of Gadgil\u2019s ESZ-1.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ommen Chandy panel\nhas made several pro-farmer recommendations, including the exclusion of\ninhabited regions and plantations ( <span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">owned by RICH Christians who control the\nchurch --some mere Indian fronts of Jew Rothschild who left India in 1947</span>&nbsp; ) from the purview of\necologically sensitive areas (ESAs). The Kasturirangan report had said 123\nvillages fall under the ESA purview.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three major rivers\nthat originate in the Western Ghats and flow to the east are Godavari, Krishna\nand Kaveri etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Ghats contains\nenormous wealth of beautiful species and trees<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Western Ghats is an\nextensive region spanning over six States, 44 districts and 142 taluks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the home of many\nendangered plants and animals. Western Ghats host India\u2019s richest wilderness in\n13 national parks and several sanctuaries. Recognised by UNESCO as one of the\nworld\u2019s eight most important biodiversity hotspots, these forested hills are\nalso sourcing to numerous rivers..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A total of 39\nproperties including national parks, wildlife sanctuaries were designated as\nworld heritage sites - twenty in Kerala, ten in Karnataka, five in Tamil Nadu\nand four in Maharashtra.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">The major criticism of\nthe Kasturirangan committee is it used remote sensing and aerial survey methods\nfor zonal demarcation of land in WG.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">After all&nbsp; Kasturi baby is an ISRO man.&nbsp; The use of&nbsp;\nthis erroneous method had caused inclusion of many villages under ESAs.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Kasturi baby thus stole a march over Gadgil baby.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ministry of\nEnvironment, Forests and Climate Change, which has been holding meetings with\nKerala, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Goa, Gujarat and Maharashtra, is yet to get all\nstates on board for demarcation of Ecologically Sensitive Areas (ESAs).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karnataka, which has\nthe highest area of 20,668 sq km under ESA, is completely opposed to declaring\nthe Western Ghats as ecologically sensitive. In a recent meeting at the\nministry, Karnataka expressed its inability to demarcate sensitive area.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Madhav Gadgil\nReport and The Sendai Framework for disaster risk reduction(2015-2030) must be\nconsider while planning and implementing and completely involving adopting\nintegrated and inclusive institutional measures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sendai Framework\nfor Disaster Risk Reduction (2015-2030) is an international document which was\nadopted by UN member states between 14th and 18th of March 2015 at the World\nConference on Disaster Risk Reduction held in Sendai, Japan and endorsed by the\nUN General Assembly in June 2015<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sendai Framework\nsets four specific priorities for action:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Understanding disaster\nrisk;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strengthening disaster\nrisk governance to manage disaster risk;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Investing in disaster\nrisk reduction for resilience;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enhancing disaster\npreparedness for effective response, and to \"Build Back Better\" in\nrecovery, rehabilitation and reconstruction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To support the\nassessment of global progress in achieving the outcome and goal of the Sendai\nFramework, seven global targets have been agreed:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Substantially reduce\nglobal disaster mortality by 2030, aiming to lower average per 100,000 global\nmortality between 2020-2030 compared to 2005-2015<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Substantially reduce\nthe number of affected people globally by 2030, aiming to lower the average\nglobal figure per 100,000 between 2020-2030 compared to 2005-2015<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reduce direct disaster\neconomic loss in relation to global gross domestic product by 2030<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Substantially reduce\ndisaster damage to critical infrastructure and disruption of basic services,\namong them health and educational facilities, including through developing\ntheir resilience by 2030<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Substantially increase\nthe number of countries with national and local disaster risk reduction\nstrategies by 2020<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Substantially enhance\ninternational cooperation to developing countries through adequate and\nsustainable support to complement their national actions for implementation of\nthe framework by 2030<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Substantially increase\nthe availability of and access to multi-hazard early warning systems and\ndisaster risk information and assessments to the people by 2030.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The foothill region\neast of the Ghats in Maharashtra is known as Desh, while the eastern foothills\nof the central Karnataka state is known as Malenadu. The range is known as\nSahyadri in Maharashtra and Karnataka. The Western Ghats meets the Eastern\nGhats at Nilgiris in northwestern Tamil Nadu. Nilgiris connects Biligiriranga\nHills in southeastern Karnataka with the Shevaroys and Tirumala hills.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">South of\nthe Palghat Gap are the Anamala Hills, located in western Tamil Nadu and Kerala\nwith smaller ranges further south, including the Cardamom Hills, then Aryankavu\npass, Aralvaimozhi pass near Kanyakumari. The range is known as Sahyan or\nSahian in Kerala. In the southern part of the range is Anamudi (2,695 metres\n(8,842 ft)), the highest peak in Western Ghats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The govt of India\nhas&nbsp; established many protected areas\nincluding 2 biosphere reserves, 13 National parks to restrict human access,\nseveral wildlife sanctuaries to protect specific endangered species and many\nReserve Forests, which are all managed by the forest departments of their\nrespective state to preserve some of the ecoregions still undeveloped.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nNilgiri Biosphere Reserve comprising 5,500 square kilometres (2,100 sq mi) of\nthe evergreen forests of Nagarahole and deciduous forests of Bandipur in\nKarnataka, adjoining regions of Wayanad-Mukurthi in Kerala and Mudumalai\nNational Park-Sathyamangalam in Tamil Nadu forms the largest contiguous\nprotected area in the Western Ghats. Silent Valley in Kerala is among the last\ntracts of virgin tropical evergreen forest in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Western Ghats are\nhome to thousands of animal species including at least 325 globally threatened\nspecies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many sensitive areas\n(e.g. Kuruva islands and Edakal caves in Wayanad) are excluded and many areas\nwhere no stipulated criteria were satisfied have been included.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the most important is Thirunelly in\nWayanad district of Kerala\u2014almost a Mecca for Hindus who do Shraddh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/.%20http:/ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/edakkal-caves-phantom-rock-meenmutty.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/edakkal-caves-phantom-rock-meenmutty.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL\nSAYS\u2014 BAN ALL PLASTICS ON THE WESTERN GHATS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PROJECTS MUST BE\nALLOWED ONLY AFTER APPROVAL OF GRAM SABHAS, WHO HAVE LOCAL KNOWLEDGE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRIBALS MUST BE\nAFFORDED CLEAN DRINKING WATER.. BAN MINING IF REQUIRED UNLESS THE MINERAL IS\nCRITICAL FOR BHARATMATAs SECURITY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The loud sounds created\nby quarrying drives away pollinating bees and smaller species like birds and\ninsects<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS PER KASTURIRANGAN\nREPORT INCINERATIN IS NOT VIABLE IN INDIA .. BALLS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WESTERN GHATS MUST BE\nRID OF HUMPLESS JERSEY COWS WHO PRODUCE TOXIC DUNG AND URINE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BAN ALL ARTIFICIAL\nFERTILISERS , TOXICPERSTICIDES FROM WESTERN GHATS .. WE MUST PRESERVE OUR HONEY\nBEES WHO POLLINATE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ENSURE NAXALS AND MAFIA\nARE CRUSHED IN ECOLOGICALLY SENSITIVE AREAS..&nbsp;\nBAN ALL CHRISTIAN CONVERSION NGOs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2006 act about the\nrights of tribals and traditional forest dwellers allows them to cultivate the\nforest land on which they have depended for livelihood for generations. &nbsp;A clause the WGEEP report says: \u201cforest land\nshould not be used for non-forest purpose.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILLOT\nALLOW DEEP STATE &nbsp;JUDGES CONTROLLED BY\nFOREIGN FORCES TO QUOTE THE CONSTITUTION AND DECIDE THAT TRIBALS MUST BE GIVEN\nOWNERSHIP OF FOREST LAND.. SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF LAND WILL KILL BHARATATA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There must be &nbsp;no monoculture plantation of exotics like\neucalyptus and existing plantations should be replaced by planting endemic\nspecies. The white invader planted Eucapytus trees for his selfish personal\nreasons<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535871574594#c8318280190062080305\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 2, 2018 at 12:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_162MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN FUTURE NO MAJOR DAM MUST RELEASE WATER WITHOUT FILLING UP A RISK ASSESSMENT FORM , SIGNED , FILED AND SCAN SENT BY EMAIL TO PROPER AUTHORITIES ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUDDEN UNCONTROLLED RELEASE WITHOUT WARNING IS THE REASON WHY KERALA HAS SUFFERED MORE THAN 400 DEATHS AND 30,000 CRORES IN DAMAGES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YET OUR RULERS PROTECT THE GUILTY\u2026. ARE WE MONKEYS OR HUMANS ?.. WHO DO WE PRETEND TO SLEEP AND EXPECT OTHERS TO WAKE US UP?...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ALL SAW HOW SECOND STANDARD FAIL KERALA MINISTER MM MANI CAME ON TV TO GIVE RIDICULOUS AND FRIVOLOUS SOUND BYTES ABOUT CHERUTHONI DAM WATER RELEASE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DAMS MUST NOT OPERATE AS SILOS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM MUST CONTAIN THE WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS WHICH CAN FLOOD THE HINTERLAND .. IT MUST INDICATE IF THOSE NERBY DAM SHUTTERS ARE OPEN OR MAY BE OPENED IN AN IMMINENT MANNER .. THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS MUST BE WRITTEN DOWN IN THIS RISK ASSESSMENT FORM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM ( AND ATTACHED CHECK LIST ) MUST CONTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT HIGH WATER SPRING TIDES AND RISE OF SEA WATER LEVEL DUE TO LONG PERIODS OF SEA TO SHORE WINDS ( LONG FETCH ) WHICH RAISE THE SEA WATER LEVEL.PROBABILTY OF LONG PERIODS OF HEAVY RAIN DUE TO EL NINO..AS WHAT HAPPENED IN 1997 IN 2018 .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DURING EL NINO YEAR THERE WILL BE NO HURRICANES IN THE ATLANTIC OCEAN WHILE PACIFIC OCEAN HURRICANES INCREASE DRASTICALLY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO NEW DAM MUST BE CONSTRUCTED WITHOUT DESILTING FACILITIES\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WANT A TRANSPARENT WEBSITE WHICH TELL US HOW MUCH MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA HAVE BEEN SILTED .. WHY RE WE HIDING THIS.. THERE MUST BE A NEW MINISTRY FORMED FOR THE SUBJECT OF \u201cDAM SILTATION\u201d ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CURRENTLY ALOST ALL DAM RESERVOIRS IN INDIA ARE SILTED TO MORE THAN 60% CAUSING LOSS OF WATER HOLDING VOLUME ..SUBSEQUENTLY THESE WATER LEVEL OF THESE RESERVOIRS HAVE BEEN RAISED INDUNDATING MORE LAND, INCREASING WATER SURFACE AREA , INCREASING EVAPORATION LOSSES IN A CRIMINAL MANNER ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED DAM WATER RELEASE IS DISASTROUS AS WHAT HAPPENED IN KERALA.. RISK WAS NOT ASSESSED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED EXPLOSION CAUSES LOSS OF LIVES ( BOMB ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTROLLED EXPLOSION HELPS MAN ( DIESEL ENGINE INTERNAL COMBUSTION ) ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE DO NOT WANT ANY MORE DAMS IN ECOLOGICALLY SENSITIVE AREAS.. PATH OF NATURAL WATERWAYS MUST NOT BE BLOCKED ... ANCIENT FLOOD WATER DRAIN BASIS MUST NOT BE CONSTRUCTED OVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA IS LUCKY THAT WE THE PEOPLE STOPPED ARANMULA AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION AGAINST THE WISHES OF VESTED FOREIGN CONTROLLED CHRISTIAN FORCES, TRYING TO STOP SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BY KILLING THE PAMPA RIVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY OF KUTTANAD ( VEMBANAD LAKE ) WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM NETHERLANDS WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL ..NETHERLANDS IS BELOW SEA LEVEL LIKE KUTTANAD AND THEY ARE DYKE EXPERTS..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..CAUSING KUTTANAD THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA TO GO UNDER WATER..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; AND THEIR INFORMATION MUST BE GIVEN TO THE DUTCH TEAM..<br />\n<br />\nLOCAL EXPERTS ARE NOT BEAURAUCRATS --- THEY HAVE TO BE EXPERIENCED FARMERS WITH A STAKE ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKERALA HAS LOST ALL HER WATER COLLECTION BASINS DUE TO CHRISTIAN , MUSLIM AND COMMIE POLITICAL PARTIES GIVING AWAY PADDY LANDS FOR PARTY CADRE TO BUILD HOUSES ILLEGALLY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DAM RIVERS EXCESSIVELY, NO RIVER WATER FLOWS TO THE SEA \u2013 LIKE CAUVERY IN TAMIL NADU.. THIS CAUSES SALT WATER INTRUSION INTO COASTAL AQUIFERS AND FISHERMEN TO SHAMELESSLY STEAL FISH FROM SRI LANKAN WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS LIKE MADHAV GADGIL / K KASTURIRANGAN\u2014AND PATHETIC NGT -- ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE? ..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">DO THESE SO CALLED EXPERTS EVEN KNOW OF THE TERM \u201c DAM RESERVOIR INDUCED SISEMCITY \u201c WHICH CAUSES LAND SLIDES?..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDO THEY EVEN KNOW THE MEANING OF A SOLITION WAVE CAUSED BY A LANDSLIDE INTO A DAM RESERVOIR.. IN BANASURA SAGAR DAM RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR YOU CAN SEE THE SIGNS OF PAST LANDSLIDES..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO SACK ALL IN IMD AND INFUSE FRESH BLOOD WHO ARE TRAINED ABROAD IN WEATHER PREDICTIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECARED 2018 AS A EL NINO YEAR , A FULL WEEK BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS AND WARNED AGAINST LAST MINUTE EMERGENCY FLOOD WATER RELEASE.. THIS IS ON RECORD EVEN IN PMO..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE MUST STOP THIS RIDICULOUS PRACTICE OF BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL AND BOTTOM OF THE LOSER LAWYERS POOL \u201cLAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES&nbsp; \u201d<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px;\"><b>SUPERIMPOSING THE BLUE PRINT OF THE CONSTITUTION ON TOP OF COMPLEX TECHNICAL CALCULATIONS \u2014WERE IS THE INTELLIGENCE IN THIS ?.</b></span>. ARE WE DONKEYS ?..<br />\n<br />\nMUCH BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS I HAD DONE COMPLEX CALCULATIONS AND DEMANDED THAT MULLAPERIAR DAM WATER MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO BUILD UP TO 141 FEET..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU BUILD EXCESSIVE DAMS ( POLITICIANS MAKING MONEY ) ON THE UPPER REACHES OF A RIVER , THE LOWER PART OF THE RIVER IS STARVED OF WATER..<br />\n<br />\nWATER FLOW IN LOWER PARTS OF A RIVER IS A MUST AS THEY RECHARGE AQUIFERS HUNDREDS OF MILES AWAY FROM THE RIVER BANKS..TODAY THESE UNDERGROUND RIVER CHANNELS ARE ALL BLOCKED DUE TO DISUSE..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO WE HAVE MAIN STREAM MEDIA WHO ARE FIT ONLY TO TALK ABOUT POTHOLES? WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO DO THE JOB OF THE STUPID INDIAN MAIN STREAM MEDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE , PM MODI WANTED TO KILL BHARATMATA BY RIVER INTERLINKING AND THAT TOO USING HIS WHITE JEW MASTERS IN ISRAEL\u2014 ISRAEL HAS GOT THOUSANDS OF MIGHTY RIVERS , RIGHT? BRAAAYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">GANGES CANNOT BE CLEANED UNLESS THE RIVER WATER FLOWS ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\nWE ASK VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI\u2014TAKE CARE OF BHARATMATA . , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY IS KUTTANAD STILL FLOODED WITH WATER ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY IS THE WATER NOT BEING ABSORBED BY THE GROUND AS USUAL-- NEVER MIND THAT THE FIELDS ARE BELOW THE LEVEL OF THE SEA-- THIS IS IRRELEVANT..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">KUTTANAD IS NOW COVERED BY A LAYER oF FINE SILT , WHICH IS COLLOIDAL TOP SOIL FROM HIGHER AREAS , WHEN CAME DOWN WITH THE FLOODS..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; Achuthanandan, media members and legal luminaries including Supreme Court ustice (retd) Markandey Katju.<br />\n<br />\nIn the blog, Justic Katju had written,--\"Even a student of law in a law college knows this elementary principle that hearsay evidence is inadmissible\"<br />\n<br />\nIn response, Rajan Gogoi decided to convert that blog by Justice Markandey Katju into a review petition in a shockingly arbitrary manner and asked him to personally appear in court . text-decoration-line: none;\">September 6, 2018 at 7:41 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_48MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN<br />\n<br />\nASK ALL MLAs ( RULING / OPPOSITION ) TO DO TO THEIR CONSTITUENCIES TO BRAIN STORM THE PEOPLE-- GIVE A DEAD LINE .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BRAIN STORMING SESSION MUST BE COVERED BY AT LEAST TWO TV CHANNELS<br />\n<br />\nBRAIN STORMING IS NOT ABOUT BITCHING-- WE NEED POSITIVE FEEDBACK , INCLUDING GENERATING REVENUE -- EXAMPLE , BY TOURISM..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nNGT<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nALL COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nDGP KERALA<br />\nIG KERALA<br />\nALL MINISTERS OF KERALA<br />\nALL MLAs/ MPs OF KERALA<br />\nC JUSTICE KERALA<br />\nKERALA ASSEMBLY SPEAKER<br />\nMEDIA OF KERALA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nNational Crisis Management Committee (NCMS)</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<ol id=\"bc_0_189TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_188B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c782687426727886869\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_188M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535892123070#c782687426727886869\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 2, 2018 at 6:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSOMEONE ASKED ME-- IF WE MANUALLY DE-SILT DAM RESERVOIRS , WHAT IS THE HARM?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GANGES IS NOT A HOLY RIVER ANY MORE AS THE \"LIVING\" PART OF IT LIES AT THE BOTTOM OD DAM RESERVOIRS UPSTREAM..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nFOR MILLIONS OF YEARS LIVING WATER FLOWED DOWN GANGES RIVER.. THIS IS RIVER WATER PLUS SILT.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SILT IS NOT JUST MUD--- IT IS THE COLLOIDAL LIFE OF THE RIVER..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">GANGES WATER AT GAUMUKH ( SOURCE ) CONTAINS MASSIVE AMOUNT OF COLLOIDAL SILVER AND OTHER COLLOIDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS WATER IS HIGHLY ALKALINE AND HAS AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF HYDROGEN WITH AN EXTRA ELECTRON TO NEUTRALIZE DAMAGING FREE RADICALS WHICH CAUSE DNA DAMAGE AND RAPID AGEING.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LOW SURFACE TENSION WATER IS BIO-ENERGISED MIRACLE WATER..LESS THAN THE USUAL 73 DYNES..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MIRACLE WATER EASILY PENETRATES THE 75 TRILLION CELLS AND MITOCHONDRIAL MEMBRANES TO SUPPLY NUTRIENTS AND FLUSH WAY TOXINS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE OLYMPICS CERTAIN ATHLETES HAVE GOOD COACHES WHO TELL THEM WHAT TO DRINK BEFORE THE RACE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_16.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS AT SEA FOR 40 YEARS AND THUS MISSED FAMILY MARRIAGES--WHERE RELATIVES MEET EACH OTHER..<br />\n<br />\nI WENT TO KANNUR TO GIVE INVITATIONS FOR MY ELDER SONs WEDDING 3 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF MY RELATIVES WERE SEEING ME AFTER HALF A CENTURY.. AND THEY ALL MADE SURE THAT I ATE WHATEVER NATIVE SWEETS THEY GAVE ME --IN ADDITION TO SWEET COLD DRINKS AND SWEET TEA..<br />\n<br />\nON THE DRIVE BACK FROM KANNUR TO CALICUT MY TOES AND FINGERS WENT HAYWIRE.. I BANGED INTO A MOTORCYCLIST AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.. HE JUST LOOKED BACK AND ACTED AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS UNABLE TO EVEN HOLD THE WHEEL LEAVE ALONE PRESS THE BRAKE.<br />\n<br />\nI IMMEDIATELY TOLD MY WIFE-- I WILL PARK AT THE NEAREST BAKERY-- MY BODY NEEDS SODIUM AND POTASSIUM IMMEDIATELY.. BUY A TIN OF SALTED CASHEW..BEFORE I GET BRAIN FOG..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS 2130 PM AND MOST STORES WERE SHUTTING..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE CAME RUNNING BACK WITH A HUGE TIN OF SALTED CASHEW--I GORGED ON IT AND DRANK LOT OF WATER...<br />\n<br />\nWITHIN THREE MINUTES I WAS OK--AND I DROVE THE NEXT ONE HOUR TO CALICUT AT FULL SPEED WITHOUT PROBLEM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bPFKDdWlCg</span><br />\n<br />\nBONGS CANT GET HILSA FISH ANYMORE AFTER THE FARAKKA ARRAGE WAS BUILT SANS FISH LADDER.. HILSA FISH SWIMS HUNDREDS OF MILES UPRIVER TO SPAWN IN PURE SWEET WATER..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI WANTED TO INTERLINK INDIAN RIVERS.. HE THINKS RIVERS ARE GUTTERS FLOWING INTO THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS SARASWATI RIVER FLOWED, GANGES WITH ALL IT DIVINE MACROPHAGES HAD NO IMPORTANCE..<br />\n<br />\nSARASWATI RIVER HAD MORE DIVINE AXOLOTLS...WHICH COULD REGENERATE EVEN THE SPINAL CORD ( VIA THE BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER ).<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL --WHAT DO YOU KNOW ?<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT GANGA MINISTER UMA BHARATI TO KNOW ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nHEY VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI-- WE HAD ENOUGH JAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR .. BASS KAR YAAARR ...<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_188BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_188b+seedsVpD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_187T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1506808177676703967\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_39M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535982742368#c1506808177676703967\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 3, 2018 at 7:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_39MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FINALLY WHAT I HAVE WARNED AGAINST REPEATEDLY OVER THE PAST TEN DAYS HAS HAPPENED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ACCUSES THE KERALA HEALTH MINISTER FOR NEGLIGENCE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Calicut now has 18 cases of Leptospirosis..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Estimates from the World Health Organisation (WHO) suggest a worldwide incidence of 1.2 million cases per year with up to 60,000 deaths.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">After floods in tropics Leptospirosis always happens --it is the No 1 disease --all doctors know this.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is the commonest zoonotic infection worldwide but is vastly underreported</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The cause of leptospirosis is bacteria (genus Leptospira and species interrogans), a Gram-negative spirochete (spiral-shaped bacteria).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The disease is transmitted through drinking water contaminated with urine of infected animals, often rats. However, human-to-human transmission occurs very rarely.The disease can\u2019t be passed through the air like a cold or the flu.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The incubation period of Leptospirosis is between 5 to 14 days.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is often difficult to diagnose clinically, as it can appear to be very similar to many other diseases such as dengue, typhoid and viral hepatitis.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Leptospira bacteria can enter the body through broken skin, water-softened skin, mucous membranes (the thin moist lining of many parts of the body such as the nose, mouth, throat and genitals) or by swallowing or inhaling contaminated water.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The first phase, which usually lasts 5 to 7 days, begins suddenly with symptoms including:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">high fever</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">vomiting</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">diarrhoea</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">red eyes</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">muscle aches (especially thigh and calf muscles)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">rash</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">chills</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">headache.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">MOST RECOVER AFTER THE FIRST PHASE. THE SECOND PHASE CAN BE WEILs DISEASE.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A second phase of illness (immune phase) may follow 1 to 2 weeks later, with symptoms such as:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">jaundice (yellowing of the skin and eyes)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">kidney failure</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">irregular heart beat</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">lung problems</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">meningitis (inflammation of the lining of the brain)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">red eyes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In most cases, leptospirosis is unpleasant but not life-threatening, like a case of the flu. It rarely lasts more than a week. But about 10% of the time, when you have a severe form of leptospirosis, you\u2019ll get better, but then get sick again. This is called Weil\u2019s disease&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis associated with liver and kidney disease is called Weil's syndrome and is characterized by yellowing of the eyes (jaundice). Patients with Weil's syndrome can also develop kidney disease and have more serious involvement of the organs affected.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Weil's Disease can cause organ failure and death ..it is a severe form of leptospirosis he condition can lead to more extreme complications, including shortness of breath, coughing up blood, a confused mental state, seizures and a painful swelling of the liver</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis can infect almost any animal where it is harboured in the kidneys, but most commonly it is found in rats is spread by their urine. It is not known to cause any noticeable illness in rats, so populations are unaffected by high levels of infection.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">To check for leptospirosis, your doctor does a simple blood test and examines the blood for antibodies. These are organisms your body produces to fight the bacteria</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Use disinfectant. Bleach, Lysol, acid solutions, and iodine are deadly to the bacteria. Keep them on hand to clean up.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Treat water to make it safe to drink by boiling or using an appropriate chemical treatment, especially if it has been collected from a source that could be exposed to urine from animals or contaiminated by floodwater runoff.</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK THE KERALA GOVT TO STOCK UP DOXYCYCLINE AND IBUPROFEN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis can be treated with antibiotics, including penicillin and doxycycline. Your doctor may also recommend ibuprofen for fever and muscle pain</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_39BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_37T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_37TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_37TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_37TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_37TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_37TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_37TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_37TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_37TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_37B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7285763356076832702\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_37M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535982781091#c7285763356076832702\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 3, 2018 at 7:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_37MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The treatment of leptospirosis involves high doses of antibiotics. Antibiotic treatment (doxycycline , penicillin) is most effective when initiated early in the course of the illness. Severely ill patients may need hospitalization for IV fluid and antibiotic treatment. Severe liver manifestations and kidney damage and even failure resulting from the infection may require intensive medical care</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Doxycycline can be used for prevention.. CRITICAL.. take 200 mg of doxycycline per week by mouth starting before and during the time period of potential exposure.It works by stopping the growth of bacteria. This is not recommended in children of less than 7 year of age</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For severe leptospirosis, intravenous penicillin G has long been the drug of choice</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Infected dogs, cats, and other pets may exhibit vomiting, refusal to eat, weight loss, decreased activity, muscle pains, or stiffness.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If leptospirosis develops during pregnancy, the risk of miscarriage is increased.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is endemic in most areas where dengue virus is transmitted and may be mistaken for dengue, which is typically more common. It is important to consider leptospirosis when dengue is diagnosed in a severely ill patient, because early antibiotics are beneficial in the treatment of leptospirosis and are not given for dengue virus infection</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Again, many different animals can harbour Leptospira bacteria in their kidneys..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">After floods , silt that has been contaminated with animal urine can be the source of infection. This is why I had recommended to douse some kerosene as soon as flood water enters the home\u2014it keeps away snakes too.</span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ASK TV STATIONS TO BROADCAST INFORMATION\u2014ONLY A DOCTOR MUST BE ALLOWED\u2014NOT POTHOLE JOURNALISTS..</span></span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM AFRAID I HAD TO BREAK MY POLICY OF KEEPING AWAY FROM MEDICAL STUFF IN MY BLOGS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_37MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
