Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536158070584#c6394954301027597662\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 5, 2018 at 8:04 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSubramanian Swamy\u200f<br />\nVerified account<br />\n@Swamy39<br />\nFollow Follow @Swamy39<br />\nMore<br />\nI had been warning that since Mauritius and Singapore are the two largest providers of foreign investment into India mostly through the destabilising blackmoney whitener: Participatory Notes, therefore today\u2019s slide of the \u20b9/$ is due PNs fleeing India. Abolish PNs therefore<br />\n<br />\n#####################################<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://twitter.com/Swamy39/status/1037191756067078144</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nFebruary 11, 2016 at 7:23 PM<br />\nhi e,<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS BEING USED AS WASHING MACHINE TO LAUNDER SLUSH MONEY OF FOREIGN CRIMINALS AND INDIANS WHO HAVE BILLIONS IN SWISS BANK ACCOUNTS.<br />\n<br />\nParticipatory Notes commonly known as P-Notes or PNs are instruments issued by registered foreign institutional investors (FII) to overseas investors, who wish to invest in the Indian stock markets without registering themselves with the market regulator, the Securities and Exchange Board of India - SEBI.<br />\n<br />\nThe PN system is blatantly discriminatory and favour DESH DROHI ghost investors-most of them are mere FRONTD for Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nFor PN investors, the system is totally silent, even on basic information\u2014while Indian citizens have to go through the grind.<br />\n<br />\nThe FIIs issue PNs to funds/companies whose identity is not known to the Indian authorities.<br />\n<br />\nPNs are used outside India for making investments in shares listed in the Indian stock market. SEBI permitted foreign institutional investors to register and participate in the Indian stock market in 1992.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild placed his STOOGE MANMOHAN SINGH on the Ministry of Finance chair for this and much more.<br />\n<br />\nHe came via the Rajya Sabha backdoor, much like Arun Jaitley today. At least Manmohan Singh is an economist.<br />\n<br />\nArun Jaitley is just a lawyer.<br />\n<br />\nWhy was this unqualified and LOST lawyer made Finance minister?<br />\n<br />\nBLACK MONEY INDIAN HOLDERS HAVE LOOPED BACK THEIR ILLGOTTEN MONEY SALTED AWAY ABROAD AS ANONYMOUS INVESTORS.<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU THEY HAVE MANIPULATED THE SYSTEM BY MASSIVE BRIBES TO REGULATORS IN POWER , TO RIG AND DOCTOR THEIR STOCKS.<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes blatantly enabled their desh drohi holders to conceal their identities-bleeding Bharatmata.<br />\n<br />\nManmohan Singh put the cart before the horse--<br />\n<br />\n-- we know what is happening - world funds are in search of markets, or markets looking for world funds .<br />\n<br />\nManmohan Singh made NO efforts to obtain details of beneficial ownership \u2014 or identity of the final holder or investor \u2014 of P-Notes, or atleast make it non-transferable.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN A RETARDED CHILD ( EXCEPT MODI ) KNOWS THAT PARTICIPATROY NOTES IS A EASY METHOD OF BRINGING BACK ILLGOTTEN MONEY VIA THE BACK DOOR \u2013 OR EVEN FOR DESH DROHI INDIANS TO BE MERE FRONTS FOR ZIONIST JEW BIG BROTHER, TO CONTROL THE INDIAN STOCK MARKET.<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n##############################<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://twitter.com/Swamy39/status/1037191756067078144</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMoney laundering undermines the integrity of business activities..<br />\n<br />\nA P-note is a derivative instrument issued by a foreign portfolio investor (FPI) against underlying Indian securities, which allow these investors to earn returns on investment in the Indian market without undergoing the significant cost of directly investing in India.<br />\n<br />\nParticipatory notes are instruments used for making investments in the stock markets. However, they are not used within the country. They are used outside India for making investments in shares listed in the Indian stock market. That is why they are also called offshore derivative instruments.<br />\n<br />\nPNs are becoming a favourite with a host of Indian money launderers who use them to first take funds out of country through hawala and then get it back using PNs.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_2BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_0T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_0TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_0TN\"></span></span><br /></span>\n<br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_0TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedMlDD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_0B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c685261002841655447\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_0M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536158168608#c685261002841655447\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 5, 2018 at 8:06 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_0MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nThe Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) on Thursday proposed tighter rules for participatory notes (P-Notes) in an attempt to curb the potential for money laundering through this investment route, popular among rich individuals and hedge funds.<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes, or off-shore derivative instruments (ODIs), are instruments issued by registered foreign portfolio investors (FPIs) to overseas investors who wish to invest in Indian stock markets without registering themselves with Sebi.<br />\n<br />\nBy their very nature, P-Notes are seen as an opaque route for investment which leave room for round-tripping\u2014the practice of money stashed away overseas by Indians returning home through tax havens in the garb of foreign capital\u2014and money laundering.<br />\n<br />\nAccording to a Sebi statement, the transfer of P-Notes will be restricted and allowed only after prior consent of the issuer. This means that for every downstream transfer of a P-Note, prior consent of the issuer would be needed.<br />\n<br />\nAdditionally, transfer of a P-Note will be allowed only to a pre-approved list of subscribers.<br />\n<br />\nOne of the reasons why a majority of the P-Note investment comes from Singapore and Mauritius could be that the FPI, which is the P-Note holder does not have to pay any Indian capital gains tax if it is based in Singapore or Mauritius under these treaties<br />\n<br />\nThe tax treaty with Mauritius prevents India from taxing capital gains of investors based out of Mauritius.<br />\n<br />\nSince there is no capital gains tax in Mauritius, these investors pay no capital gains tax in either country. Singapore has a similar treaty with India. Singapore also does not have a capital gains tax regime.<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes cannot be issued to a resident of a country identified by the inter-governmental Financial Action Task Force as being lax on money laundering and terror financing regulations.<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING is a phenomenon by which Indian individuals and companies avoid tax by sending funds abroad and then bringing them back on to home soil via Mauritius-based companies.<br />\n<br />\nMuch of the investment into India via Mauritius over the last 15 years is believed to have been by CORRUPT Indian residents\u2014all BIG FISH<br />\n<br />\nSigned in 1983, the Double Taxation Avoidance treaty between the two countries made Mauritius, which taxes capital gains at near-zero rates, an attractive \u201cpost box address\u201d for foreign investors to route investments into India .<br />\n<br />\nIndians who evaded taxes set up shell companies in Mauritius, concealing identities and channeling cash or stock market investments through \u201cround tripping\u201d and \u201cparticipatory notes\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) tightened the norms for participatory notes (P-notes) in order to check misuse of these instruments in round-tripping and money laundering.<br />\n<br />\nNow offshore derivative instruments (ODIs) issuers need to adhere to the Indian know your customer (KYC) norms and the subscribers will have to take prior permission from the ODI issuer in case of transfer of the instruments to another offshore investor.<br />\n<br />\nRevision of Mauritius treaty has caused India-bound investments now getting re-routed from other tax-friendly jurisdictions like Singapore.<br />\n<br />\nIn the financial year ending March 2016, Singapore overtook Mauritius ($8.3 billion) and reported highest FDI inflow ($13.6 billion) into India. This higher investment from Singapore is due to revised treaty with Mauritius.<br />\n<br />\nSingapore\u2019s investment of $5.98 billion has over taken Mauritius\u2019s investment of $4.85 billion as the single largest investor for the year 2013-14.<br />\n<br />\nThe Indian Government has also reached an agreement with Switzerland where the latter will share complete information on investments from Indians in Switzerland from 2019..<br />\n<br />\nP-Notes are instruments issued by registered foreign institutional investors to overseas investors. While the FPIs are registered with the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI), the overseas investors investing in P-Notes are not registered with the market regulator, and thus their identity is not known to the authorities..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_0MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_0BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_0B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7034663945562597886\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536158320184#c7034663945562597886\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 5, 2018 at 8:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nAn Indian sending unaccounted money to tax havens through hawala transaction and the hawala operator in the tax haven investing that money into the P notes issued by an FPI registered with SEBI. In this way, unaccounted money can be converted into legitimate source of income.<br />\n<br />\nP-notes are basically 'hot money' which can be pulled in and out at any point of time increasing the volatility in the market. Terrorists can use these as instruments for their transactions as there is complete anonymity about the final receiver of P-notes or they can also use it as a tool of financial terrorism by increasing the volatility .<br />\n<br />\nP-notes are often criticised for evasion of capital gains tax. India\u2019s biggest source of FDI is India itself, money departing on a short holiday to a tax haven and then routed back as FDI. The bulk of P-note investments in the Indian stock market were from tax havens such as Cayman Islands.<br />\n<br />\nTax havens such as Mauritius and Singapore thrive parasitically, they feed on substantive economies like India<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.oecd.org/ctp/harmful/43757434.pdf<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.oecd.org/ctp/exchange-of-tax-information/42469606.pdf<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.oecd.org/ctp/exchange-of-tax-information/2082215.pdf<br />\n<br />\nINDIA WAS RULED BY AN ITALIAN WAITRESS , WHO WAS \"SUPER PRIME MINISTER\"<br />\n<br />\nSHE COULD NOT EVEN UTTER THE SPELLING OF \" E C O N O M I C S \"..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSHE CLAIMED TO HAVE GRADUATED FROM CAMBRIDGE UNIVERSITY , WHILE THE TRUTH IS WAS A MERE WAITRESS IN THAT TOWN<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE A WAITER IN A MUMBAI RESTAURANT CLAIMING THAT HE IS A BTECH FROM IIT MUMBAI.<br />\n<br />\nWe know the names of corrupt politicians who HOWLED IN PROTEST whenever there was an effort to ban participatory notes (P-Notes), or when we tried to ascertain their beneficial ownership.<br />\n<br />\nWe know that the money being brought into India was actually just Indian black money that had earlier been sent out of the country through the hawala route . We know who these Indian politicians are.<br />\n<br />\nA very large proportion of money invested in the markets by FIIs was funded through P-Notes. The bastards had the power to affect the flows and even crash the stock market<br />\n<br />\nThe CAD current account deficit is under control now. India is now attracting a lot of FDI which, by definition, isn\u2019t prone to flowing out as quickly as FII money<br />\n<br />\nWith a global crackdown on not just tax havens but also on unaccounted flows, India has found it easier to increase the know-your-customer norms for FIIs\u2014so while investors are still allowed to come in through P-Notes issued by well-known fund managers, the details of the beneficial ownership has to be made available to Sebi on a regular basis.<br />\n<br />\nOver a period of time, this has resulted in Sebi knowing the ownership details of all P-Note holders in the country<br />\n<br />\nWe don\u2019t want all eggs in one basket. A Special Investigation Team (SIT), MUST be set up to track black mone and MUST ask Sebi to give it all details on the beneficial ownership of P-Notes.<br />\n<br />\nSIT MUST correlate this data with the income/wealth-tax returns of P-Note-holders and see if there are undeclared incomes.<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW THE RAMPANT CORRUPTION IN SEBI\u2014<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nRBI GOVERNOR URJIT PATEL<br />\nSEBI<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nFINANCE MINISTERS OF ALL STATES<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4939363172567571684\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_91M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IT IS AN ACCOUNTING SYSTEM OF THE COSMOS..<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNA TOLD ARJUNA-- AMONG MAHARISHIS I AM KAPILA..<br />\n<br />\nKAPILA DOWNLOADED SANKYHA VEDANTA FROM AKASHA.. HE WAS NOT THE AUTHOR--HE WAS A CHANNEL.<br />\n<br />\nsiddh\u0101n\u0101m\u0301 kapilo munih\u0323 ( BHAGAWAD GITA 10.26 )<br />\n<br />\n\"AMONG THE PERFECTED BEINGS ,I AM SAGE KAPILA\"<br />\n<br />\nSANKHYA GAVE US PURUSHA , PRAKRITI AND THE THREE GUNAS ( RAJAS/ SATTVA / TAMAS ).<br />\n<br />\nTILL TODAY NOBODY --REPEAT--NOBODY HAS UNDERSTOOD SANKHYA .. YOU CANT CALL THIS EGO-- IT IS SELF ASSESSMENT WHICH SPROUTED OUT OF SVADHYAYA..<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA ,AS SOON AS I TOOK OVER COMMAND , I TOOK OUT THE SWORD OF DAMOCLES AND HUNG IT RIGHT ABOVE MY CAPTAINs CHAIR--<br />\n<br />\nALL MY SHORE BOSSES KNEW IT.. THEY KNEW I DO THIS TO BOOST ME OWN PERFORMANCE ..IT WAS FOR MYSELF, NOT FOR ANYBODY ELSE..<br />\n<br />\nHOW THEY HATED MY GUTS !<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KNEW THAT I LEAD A TEAM -- WHOSE STRENGTH WAS AS GOOD AS ITS WEAKEST LINK.. Central government organisations are not custodians of dams in India. Not even recently created Cauvery Water Management Authority has been given any authority over dams in Cauvery basin.<br />\n<br />\n2. Even State government departments may not be having information on siltation.<br />\n<br />\n3. It needs periodical bathymetric studies. Even then it may not be possible to have regular information on 'Dam siltation' unlike storage level position. You may kindly make suggestions ( along with budget and manpower provisions) by writing to the decision makers.<br />\n<br />\nIs this bathymetric studies that determines Siltation level of Dam? ANY IDIOT WHO KNOWS UNDERGROUND RADAR MAPPING CAN DO THIS.. SILT HAS A SMOOTHER COMPOSITION THAN THE HARD GROUND IT STANDS OVER..<br />\n<br />\nIT CAN BE DONE BY SEVERAL MEANS- EVEN A HALF WIT CAN FIGURE THIS OUT. IF INDIA IS NOT INTELLIGENT ENOUGH TO DO THIS-- OUTSOURCE THIS JOB TO NETHERLANDS..<br />\n<br />\nWE INCLUDE STUPID \"LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES \" IN IMPORTANT INFRASTRUCTURE DECISIONS .. THIS IS A CRIME..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE: IF TAMIL NADU IS RUNNING MULLAPERIAR DAM INSIDE KERALA, IT IS THEIR JOB TO DO DE-SILTING...<br />\n<br />\nWHEN RESERVOIR VOLUME REDUCES 65% BY SILTING , THE JUDGES LIKE SOOTH SAYERS PARROTS IN A CAGE, RULE THAT RESERVOIR LEVEL CAN BE RAISED..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE ARE HIGHLY TECHNICAL DECISIONS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\nTHE POST ON GROUND WATER HAS BEEN SENT TO PM MODI AT LEAST 20 TIMES.. They lost everything and haven't got any government help yet and they cant wait forever.<br />\n<br />\nBeyond everything, there is something nagging my mind. How all are confident rain will not happen again next week or next month or during Thulavarsham ? Well, you may know whether it will. But how about CM and KSEB and everyone ? How can they be so confident ?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_183BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_183b+seedBZdD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_182T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_182TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_183b+seedBZdD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_182B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6441058105633253732\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_182M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535325967587#c883203796410833733\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 27, 2018 at 4:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_104MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">MY READERS WANT ME TO PEN THE \"VADAKAYIL REPORT\" TO SUPERSEDE THE \"GADGIL REPORT\" AND THE \"KASTURIRANGAN REPORT\"..</span></div>\n<br />\nWELL PADMA BHUSHAN MADHAV GADGIL , PADMA VIBHUSHAN KRISHNASWAMI KASTURIRANGAN ARE STILL ALIVE AND THEY HAVE BEEN GIVING RIDICULOUS SOUND BYTES ON TV , ABOUT LANDSLIDES AND KERALA FLOODS ALONG WITH PADMA VIBHUSHAN MS SWAMINANTHAN..<br />\n<br />\nWELL FIRST LET ME DESCRIBE MS SWAMINATHAN , THE FATHER OF THE \"GREEN REVOLUTION\".. THIS DESH DROHI IS THE REASON WHY INDIA LOST ITS HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND LOST 90% OF LAKES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAKES SURVIVED FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS IN PRISTINE CONDITON , AND WERE DECIMATED IN JUST 55 YEARS BY THE GREEN REVOLUTION WHICH GAVE US TOXIC ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nMADHAV GADGIL BEHAVING LIKE AN OUTRAGES VIRGIN , MUST KNOW THAT QUARRYING HAS NOTING TO DO WITH LANDSLIDES..THERE HAS BEEN NO LANDSLIDES IN THE VICINITY OF QUARRIES IN KERALA DURING THESE RECENT FLOODS..<br />\n<br />\nAN AVALANCHE OF SNOW CAN BE SET OFF BY A MERE SONIC BOOM OF A FIGHTER JET FLYING OVER THE MOUNTAIN.<br />\nINDUCED SESMICITY CAUSED BY MAN MADE DAM RESERVOIRS ARE THE MAJOR REASON FOR LANDSLIDES IN KERALA\u2026 AND THE REASON WHY MANY DAM WALLS COLLAPSED WITH MAJOR LOSS OF LIFE ALL AROUND THE PLANET..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN MERCANTILE MARINE DEPT, THE DIRECTOR GENERAL OF SHIPPING AND SHIPPING MINISTER MUST KNOW THAT MANY IRON ORE SHIPS WHICH LOADED IRON ORE AT PARADIP HAVE SUNK AT SEA WITH TOTAL LOSS OF LIFE..<br />\n<br />\nPARADIP DOES NOT HAVE THE MEANS TO TRIM THE PILE OF IRON ORE WHICH IT LOADS INTO THE SHIPS HOLDS..THE ANGLE OF REPOSE WAS TOO HIGH AND THE ORE SHIFTED DURING ROLLING IN HEAVY SEAS..<br />\n<br />\nHUNDREDS OF ORE SHIPS CARRYING CONCENTRATES HAVE SUNK.. WHEN THE POWERS THAT BE GOVERNING SHIPPING MADE NO EFFORTS ,<br />\n<br />\nI AS A YOUNG CAPTAIN HAS MY OWN RULES FOR MY SHIP.. THIS IS NARRATED IN THE BLOGPOST BELOW\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHERE THERE IS EXCESSIVE RAIN LIKE THE EL NINO POWERED RAINS WHICH CAUSED THE FLOODS IN KERALA CERTAIN SOILS HOLD TOO MUCH MOISTURE .. WHEN THE SOIL GETS SATURATED IT JUST FLOWS DOWN SLOPE LIKE A RIVER , WHICH IS CALLED LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS A YOUTUBE VIDEO OF SUCH A LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=czVJ6MNgE8E</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SLOPE DOES NOT HAVE TO BE TO STEEP IF DEEP ROOTED VEGETATION IS REMOVED WHICH BINDS COLLUVIUM TO BEDROCK.<br />\n<br />\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH HIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS. AS THE TOP PERMEABLE SOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES THEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<br />\n<br />\nFOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL ACUITY TO DELCARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY. THERE WILL ALWAYS BE A TRIGGER LIKE RAIN WATER STURATION OR A SEISMIC TREMOR ( IN CASE THERE IS NO RAIN ). EVEN THUNDER CAN CAUSE A LANDSLIDE.<br />\n<br />\nIN KODUGU DISTRICT THIS BLOGSITE HAS WARNED OF GROUND WATER PRESSURE FROM UNDERNEATH TRIGGERING LAND SLIDES AND HAS ASKED PEOPLE TO RUN IF THEY SEE WATER FOUNTAINS ENAMANTING FROM THE GROUND.<br />\n<br />\nA THIXOTROPIC MATERIAL SUCH AS MUD CAN CHANGE INTO A GEL OR SOL BY ADDING WATER OR PRESSURE OR SHAKING . IT GOES FROM BEING STABLE ONE MINUTE TO FLUID THE NEXT MINUTE ( THE REASON WHY ORE CONCENTARE SHIPS SANK )<br />\n<br />\nI ASK \u2013WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ARE THESE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">DON\u2019T WE HAVE TRAINED AND INTELLIGENT PEOPLE IN INDIA.. WHAT ARE OUR THINK TANKS WORTH..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_2TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2532167491269529031\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_28.html?showComment=1535447752194#c8021356560558798927\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 28, 2018 at 2:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUBJECT: WHAT IS THIS DISGRACE TO KERALA -- ATTIMARI AND NOOKU KOOLI ? LET THE WHOLE WORLD KNOW THIS...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">######################################################</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">April 5, 2015 at 8:40 AM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Shocked-US-artist-compares-Kerala-labour-unionists-to-mafia/articleshow/46809703.cms</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT THIS MAN SAYS IS TRUE AND EVEN THE CM OF KERALA KNOWS IT -- BUT THEY ALL LIE . .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">EVERY KERALA POLITICAL PARTY HAVE THEIR GOONDAS FOR ENFORCING BANDHS , AND THIS IS HOW THEY REWARD THEM . .</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">EVEN THE POLICE/ JUDICIARY IS IN CAHOOTS .</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NEXT TIME MODI SEES A MALAYALI HE MUST ASK HIM-- WHAT IS ATTI MARI AND NOKKU KOOLI .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">if he does NOT know this he is NOT from kerala .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ATTIMARI is an extortion system of wages that headload workers\u2019 unions in Kerala imposed for loading/unloading goods from lorries .&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They are supported by congress/ communist kerala politicians and they do the vendetta during bandhs .</span></b></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">If you use outside workers, the union insists on a compensation, NOKKU KOOLI, literally, wages for just looking on from the sidelines .</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS FOR DENYING THEM THE RIGHT TO WORK .</span></span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They will NEVER touch dirty cargo like cement and manure bags\u2014they convert this to PAY UP FOR FORCING US TO WATCH .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Once an angry foreigner hollered - Who the hell is this Atti Mary ? I\u2019ll deal with the bad wench myself -&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TEE HEEEE !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">He wasn\u2019t amused to learn that attimari was not some woman, but a blighted practice unions, chiefly controlled by the soulless communists , who have bullied Kerala into accepting as the norm .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The average Keralite dreads these people . they can play VERY dirty if you do NOT pay up .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These POLITICAL GOONDA workers barge into your house while loading/ unloading and even your privacy is compromised for they look everywhere . They stare at your wives and daughters .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Kerala Loading and Unloading (Regulation of Wages and Restriction of Unlawful Practices) Act, 2002, states that attimari rates are to be regulated by the government and that nokkukooli is unlawful .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But successive governments have done nothing to enforce the law and end the practice. For these are goondas used by MP and MLA to settle scores and break legs and knee caps .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The unions of the ROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED Left parties were most forceful in extracting attimari and nokkukooli, .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Senior CPM leaders spake - Eradicating nokkukooli is fine, but we will not allow that to become a pretext for exploiting workers .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Now with mobile phone system they lurk in the shadows and ambush you even if you shift house at midnight .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The attimari people set up camp near supermarkets to extort. If they are NOT happy with the payment you can kiss the glass panes goodbye .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DOES NARENDRA MODI HAVE THE POLITICAL WILL ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">or should people lose hope ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">are we a democracy ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Wanna know what happens at one of the oldest places of worship on this planet ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; THERE ARE MORE THAN TWO LAKH COMMENTS IN MY BLOGSITE..<br />\n<br />\nMANY READERS COME HERE JUST TO READ THE TAAZA COMMENTS -- NOT MY BLOGS ( WHICH THEY SAY ARE TOO LONG )..<br />\n<br />\nHERE WE GO..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE OF YESTERDAY TWO BENAMI MEDIA COMMIE TV CHANNELS WERE BITCHING ABOUT BAAAD HINDUS ZEALOTS KILLING ATHEIST RATIONALISTS DHABOLKAR , KALBURGI, PANSARE , GAURI LANKESH ETC.<br />\n<br />\nTHESE PATHETIC COMMIES HAD A SINGLE MISSION-- DENIGRATE HINDUS AND SANATANA DHARMA.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY GOT FOREIGN MONEY AND FAME FOR BRANDING SANATANA DHARMA AS A RELIGION OF EXTREME SUPERSTITION AND PAINTING HINDUS AS SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nONE WRITER UC ANANTHAMURTHY PISSED ON A VISHNU IDOL BEING WORSHIPED TO PROVE THAT THE IDOL HAS NO POWERS AND CANNOT HIT BACK.. HE WENT AROUND BOASTING.. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br />\n<br />\nOF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b><br />\nTHE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br />\n<br />\nFOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br />\n<br />\nEINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nVISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br />\n<br />\nA BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..<br />\n<br />\nBY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_32MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_32B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_33B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2392855216779193670\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_33M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535690408894#c1038406363754000749\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 31, 2018 at 10:10 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nANAL SEX RECEIVING GAYS ARE CONSIDERED WORSE THAN THE LOWEST GRADE ANIMAL IN JUDAISM AND ISLAM..<br />\n<br />\nBOTH HUMPING GAYS AND ANAL SEX RECEIVING GAY SOULS GO TO THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER WHERE THEY KEEP COMPANY WITH ANIMALS AND LOWER LIFE.. THEIR KUNDALINI CANNOT RISE BEYOND THE MOOLADHARA CHAKRA. AN AURA READER CAN SEE THAT THEIR AURA HAS ONLY ONE COLOUR LAYER ( RED )<br />\n<br />\nASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO SIX ARE FOR HUMANS --BASED ON SOUL FREQUENCY -- THE LOWER THE KARMIC BAGGAGE THE HIGHER THE SOUL FREQUENCY..<br />\n<br />\nTHE AURA OF A MAN WHOSE SOUL WILL GO TO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER WILL HAVE INDIGO/ BLUE/ GREEN/ YELLOW/ ORANGE / RED<br />\n<br />\nASTRAL LAYER SEVEN --THE HIGHEST FREQUENCY SOUL MERGES WITH THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN .. THE AURA OF A MOKSHA MAN ( JIVAN MUKT ) WILL HAVE ALL SEVEN RAINBOW COLOUR ENCASED IN GOLD.<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL HINDU SAINTS ( MODERN ) WHO PRETEND TO BE BRAHMACHARIS , ARE MEANT FOR THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER.. THEY ARE CONMEN --WORSE THAN ANIMALS ..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedwefD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedwefD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_44TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_43B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7660409319166210378\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_43M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535714446665#c8111759016671708497\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 31, 2018 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME --IF I HAVE BEEN A BIT HARSH WITH OUR PDAMA AWARD HEROES MADHAV GADGIL AND K KASTURIRANGAN.<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN --- IF I GO HAMMER AND TONGS AFTER THE, THEY WILL BE COVERED WITH SHIT AND PEOPLE WILL THROW STONES AT THEM. ECOLOGISTS MUST NOT DEVELOP THE OSTRICH SYNDROME..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS--ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE?<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA AS A CHEMICAL TANKER SHIP CAPTAIN, IF I GO TO MY SHORE BOSSES WITH A PROBLEM WITHOUT AN ATTACHED SOLUTION, IT GOES AGAINST ME ..<br />\n<br />\nIF MY ATTACHED SOLUTION IS LATER PROVED TO BE HOGWASH I WILL NOT GET MY NEXT CONTRACT.<br />\n<br />\nIF I GO GHADI GHADI TO THEM WITH PROBLEMS ND ZERO ATTACHED SOLUTIONS --MY RELIEVER WILL LAND UP WITHOUT WARNING AT THE NEXT PORT..<br />\n<br />\nHAS OUR NGT EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE ?<br />\n<br />\nACCOUNTABLITY IS NOT ONLY WHAT WE DO , BUT ALSO WHAT WE DO NOT DO--FOR WHICH WE ARE ACCOUNTABLE.<br />\n<br />\nOUR GRUESOME TWOSOME MADHAV GADGIL AND K KARURIRANGAN HAS TURNED A NELSONs EYE TO THE BIGGEST ECOLOGICAL PROBEM IN KUTTANAD --THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nKUTTANAD WENT UNDER FLOODS ONLY BECAUSE OF RAMPANT LAND RECLAMATION OF VEMBABAND LAKE...THIS MASSIVE ENCROACHMENT STARTED DURING THE WHITE INVADERS RULE WITH HELP OF OF CHURCH FOR THE RICH LAND OWNING CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br />\n<br />\nCHRISTIAN CONVERT FISHERMEN WANTED TO CATCH NICE BRACKISH WATER FISH WITHOUT VENTURING INTO SEA, KEEPING THEIR ASSES SAFE IN PLACID WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nWHY HAS THE GRUESOME TWOSOME NOT SAY A SINGLE WORD ABOUT THANEERUKKOM BUND AND THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY ?</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">Over 1.7 million people live on the banks of the Vembanad lake and are directly or indirectly dependent on it for their livelihoods</span></div>\n<br />\nTHE THANNERMUKKOM BUND WAS FOR THE RICH CHRISTIAN CONVERT LANDOWNERS TO CULTIVATE PADDY CROPS THREE TIMES A YEAR INSTEAD OF TWO AND MAXIMISE PROFITS. THIS BUND HAS CREATED EXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">NETHERLANDS&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL .</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nThe bund has caused deterioration of fish varieties in the region and the fishermen opposed to the bund.<br />\n<br />\nThe bund has also disrupted the harmony of the sea with the backwaters and has caused problems not foreseen before the bund like the omniprescence of the water weeds.<br />\n<br />\nEarlier the salt water tends to cleanse the backwaters but this does not happen any more leading to the pollution of the backwaters and the entire land near by.<br />\n<br />\nKuttanad region has the lowest altitude in India, and is one of the few places in the world where farming is carried around between four to ten feet below sea level. Rice grown in saline waters is not good for heath.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of FRESH WATER paddy cultivation in Kuttanad can be traced back for millenniums<br />\n<br />\nI will write in more detail later<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE ASK GADGIL BABY AND KASTURIRANGAN BABY--WHY IS KUTTANAD STILL UNDER WATER? PRAY --PRITHEE ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: bold;\">IT DID NOT ACCOUNT FOR HIGHWATER SPRING TIDES, SEAWATER LEVEL RISE DUE TO ADVERSE WINDS OF LONG FETCH , EL NINO POWERED SEVERE RAINS , SUDDEN RELEASE OF DAM WATERS ETC&nbsp;</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_50BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; The opposition party is haters, angry mobs, people who make up the news, swamp-dwellers and embedded bureaucrats working to bring down his presidency. Achuthanandan, media members and legal luminaries including Supreme Court ustice (retd) Markandey Katju.<br />\n<br />\nIn the blog, Justic Katju had written,--\"Even a student of law in a law college knows this elementary principle that hearsay evidence is inadmissible\"<br />\n<br />\nIn response, Rajan Gogoi decided to convert that blog by Justice Markandey Katju into a review petition in a shockingly arbitrary manner and asked him to personally appear in court . Gogoi then dictated the order rejecting the review petition and issued contempt of court notice to him stating that \"Prima facie, the statements made seem to be an personal attack on the Judge and not on the judgment and bushwhacked Katju with CONTEMPT OF COURT proceedings.<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE ASK LAW MINISTER RAVI SHANKAR PRASAD-- WHY HAVE THESE INCIDENTS NOT GONE AGAINST RANJAN GOGOI ?<br />\n<br />\nBY THE WAY RAVI SHANKAR PRASAD-- WE KNOW HOW CURRENT JUDGES ARE SUPPPORTING NAXAL LEADERS FROM PUCL.. font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535871574594#c8318280190062080305\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 2, 2018 at 12:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_162MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN FUTURE NO MAJOR DAM MUST RELEASE WATER WITHOUT FILLING UP A RISK ASSESSMENT FORM , SIGNED , FILED AND SCAN SENT BY EMAIL TO PROPER AUTHORITIES ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUDDEN UNCONTROLLED RELEASE WITHOUT WARNING IS THE REASON WHY KERALA HAS SUFFERED MORE THAN 400 DEATHS AND 30,000 CRORES IN DAMAGES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YET OUR RULERS PROTECT THE GUILTY\u2026. ARE WE MONKEYS OR HUMANS ?.. WHO DO WE PRETEND TO SLEEP AND EXPECT OTHERS TO WAKE US UP?...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ALL SAW HOW SECOND STANDARD FAIL KERALA MINISTER MM MANI CAME ON TV TO GIVE RIDICULOUS AND FRIVOLOUS SOUND BYTES ABOUT CHERUTHONI DAM WATER RELEASE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DAMS MUST NOT OPERATE AS SILOS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM MUST CONTAIN THE WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS WHICH CAN FLOOD THE HINTERLAND .. IT MUST INDICATE IF THOSE NERBY DAM SHUTTERS ARE OPEN OR MAY BE OPENED IN AN IMMINENT MANNER .. THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS MUST BE WRITTEN DOWN IN THIS RISK ASSESSMENT FORM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM ( AND ATTACHED CHECK LIST ) MUST CONTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT HIGH WATER SPRING TIDES AND RISE OF SEA WATER LEVEL DUE TO LONG PERIODS OF SEA TO SHORE WINDS ( LONG FETCH ) WHICH RAISE THE SEA WATER LEVEL.PROBABILTY OF LONG PERIODS OF HEAVY RAIN DUE TO EL NINO..AS WHAT HAPPENED IN 1997 IN 2018 .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DURING EL NINO YEAR THERE WILL BE NO HURRICANES IN THE ATLANTIC OCEAN WHILE PACIFIC OCEAN HURRICANES INCREASE DRASTICALLY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO NEW DAM MUST BE CONSTRUCTED WITHOUT DESILTING FACILITIES\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WANT A TRANSPARENT WEBSITE WHICH TELL US HOW MUCH MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA HAVE BEEN SILTED .. WHY RE WE HIDING THIS.. THERE MUST BE A NEW MINISTRY FORMED FOR THE SUBJECT OF \u201cDAM SILTATION\u201d ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CURRENTLY ALOST ALL DAM RESERVOIRS IN INDIA ARE SILTED TO MORE THAN 60% CAUSING LOSS OF WATER HOLDING VOLUME ..SUBSEQUENTLY THESE WATER LEVEL OF THESE RESERVOIRS HAVE BEEN RAISED INDUNDATING MORE LAND, INCREASING WATER SURFACE AREA , INCREASING EVAPORATION LOSSES IN A CRIMINAL MANNER ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED DAM WATER RELEASE IS DISASTROUS AS WHAT HAPPENED IN KERALA.. RISK WAS NOT ASSESSED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED EXPLOSION CAUSES LOSS OF LIVES ( BOMB ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTROLLED EXPLOSION HELPS MAN ( DIESEL ENGINE INTERNAL COMBUSTION ) ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE DO NOT WANT ANY MORE DAMS IN ECOLOGICALLY SENSITIVE AREAS.. PATH OF NATURAL WATERWAYS MUST NOT BE BLOCKED ... ANCIENT FLOOD WATER DRAIN BASIS MUST NOT BE CONSTRUCTED OVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA IS LUCKY THAT WE THE PEOPLE STOPPED ARANMULA AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION AGAINST THE WISHES OF VESTED FOREIGN CONTROLLED CHRISTIAN FORCES, TRYING TO STOP SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BY KILLING THE PAMPA RIVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MUCH BEFORE MADHAV GADGIL WROTE AGAINST THE ARANMULA AIRPORT, CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD WARNED -- \"DO NOT BLOCK NATURAL WATERWAYS \"..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY OF KUTTANAD ( VEMBANAD LAKE ) WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM NETHERLANDS WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL ..NETHERLANDS IS BELOW SEA LEVEL LIKE KUTTANAD AND THEY ARE DYKE EXPERTS..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..CAUSING KUTTANAD THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA TO GO UNDER WATER..</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; THIS BUND HAS CREATED EXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THIS CAUSES SALT WATER INTRUSION INTO COASTAL AQUIFERS AND FISHERMEN TO SHAMELESSLY STEAL FISH FROM SRI LANKAN WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS LIKE MADHAV GADGIL / K KASTURIRANGAN\u2014AND PATHETIC NGT -- ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE? ..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">DO THESE SO CALLED EXPERTS EVEN KNOW OF THE TERM \u201c DAM RESERVOIR INDUCED SISEMCITY \u201c WHICH CAUSES LAND SLIDES?..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDO THEY EVEN KNOW THE MEANING OF A SOLITION WAVE CAUSED BY A LANDSLIDE INTO A DAM RESERVOIR.. IN BANASURA SAGAR DAM RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR YOU CAN SEE THE SIGNS OF PAST LANDSLIDES..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO SACK ALL IN IMD AND INFUSE FRESH BLOOD WHO ARE TRAINED ABROAD IN WEATHER PREDICTIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECARED 2018 AS A EL NINO YEAR , A FULL WEEK BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS AND WARNED AGAINST LAST MINUTE EMERGENCY FLOOD WATER RELEASE.. THIS IS ON RECORD EVEN IN PMO..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE MUST STOP THIS RIDICULOUS PRACTICE OF BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL AND BOTTOM OF THE LOSER LAWYERS POOL \u201cLAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES&nbsp; \u201d<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px;\"><b>SUPERIMPOSING THE BLUE PRINT OF THE CONSTITUTION ON TOP OF COMPLEX TECHNICAL CALCULATIONS \u2014WERE IS THE INTELLIGENCE IN THIS ?.</b></span>. ARE WE DONKEYS ?..<br />\n<br />\nMUCH BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS I HAD DONE COMPLEX CALCULATIONS AND DEMANDED THAT MULLAPERIAR DAM WATER MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO BUILD UP TO 141 FEET..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU BUILD EXCESSIVE DAMS ( POLITICIANS MAKING MONEY ) ON THE UPPER REACHES OF A RIVER , THE LOWER PART OF THE RIVER IS STARVED OF WATER..<br />\n<br />\nWATER FLOW IN LOWER PARTS OF A RIVER IS A MUST AS THEY RECHARGE AQUIFERS HUNDREDS OF MILES AWAY FROM THE RIVER BANKS..TODAY THESE UNDERGROUND RIVER CHANNELS ARE ALL BLOCKED DUE TO DISUSE..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO WE HAVE MAIN STREAM MEDIA WHO ARE FIT ONLY TO TALK ABOUT POTHOLES? WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO DO THE JOB OF THE STUPID INDIAN MAIN STREAM MEDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE , PM MODI WANTED TO KILL BHARATMATA BY RIVER INTERLINKING AND THAT TOO USING HIS WHITE JEW MASTERS IN ISRAEL\u2014 ISRAEL HAS GOT THOUSANDS OF MIGHTY RIVERS , RIGHT? BRAAAYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">GANGES CANNOT BE CLEANED UNLESS THE RIVER WATER FLOWS ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\nWE ASK VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI\u2014TAKE CARE OF BHARATMATA . FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_188M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535892123070#c782687426727886869\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 2, 2018 at 6:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br /><br />SOMEONE ASKED ME-- IF WE MANUALLY DE-SILT DAM RESERVOIRS , WHAT IS THE HARM?<br /><br />LISTEN--<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GANGES IS NOT A HOLY RIVER ANY MORE AS THE \"LIVING\" PART OF IT LIES AT THE BOTTOM OD DAM RESERVOIRS UPSTREAM..</span></b><br /><br />FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS LIVING WATER FLOWED DOWN GANGES RIVER.. THIS IS RIVER WATER PLUS SILT.<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SILT IS NOT JUST MUD--- IT IS THE COLLOIDAL LIFE OF THE RIVER..</span></b><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">GANGES WATER AT GAUMUKH ( SOURCE ) CONTAINS MASSIVE AMOUNT OF COLLOIDAL SILVER AND OTHER COLLOIDS..</span></b><br /><br />THIS WATER IS HIGHLY ALKALINE AND HAS AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF HYDROGEN WITH AN EXTRA ELECTRON TO NEUTRALIZE DAMAGING FREE RADICALS WHICH CAUSE DNA DAMAGE AND RAPID AGEING.<br /><br />THIS LOW SURFACE TENSION WATER IS BIO-ENERGISED MIRACLE WATER..LESS THAN THE USUAL 73 DYNES..<br /><br />THIS MIRACLE WATER EASILY PENETRATES THE 75 TRILLION CELLS AND MITOCHONDRIAL MEMBRANES TO SUPPLY NUTRIENTS AND FLUSH WAY TOXINS.<br /><br />IN THE OLYMPICS CERTAIN ATHLETES HAVE GOOD COACHES WHO TELL THEM WHAT TO DRINK BEFORE THE RACE.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_16.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html</span><br /><br />I WAS AT SEA FOR 40 YEARS AND THUS MISSED FAMILY MARRIAGES--WHERE RELATIVES MEET EACH OTHER..<br /><br />I WENT TO KANNUR TO GIVE INVITATIONS FOR MY ELDER SONs WEDDING 3 YEARS AGO..<br /><br />MOST OF MY RELATIVES WERE SEEING ME AFTER HALF A CENTURY.. AND THEY ALL MADE SURE THAT I ATE WHATEVER NATIVE SWEETS THEY GAVE ME --IN ADDITION TO SWEET COLD DRINKS AND SWEET TEA..<br /><br />ON THE DRIVE BACK FROM KANNUR TO CALICUT MY TOES AND FINGERS WENT HAYWIRE.. I BANGED INTO A MOTORCYCLIST AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.. HE JUST LOOKED BACK AND ACTED AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.<br /><br />I WAS UNABLE TO EVEN HOLD THE WHEEL LEAVE ALONE PRESS THE BRAKE.<br /><br />I IMMEDIATELY TOLD MY WIFE-- I WILL PARK AT THE NEAREST BAKERY-- MY BODY NEEDS SODIUM AND POTASSIUM IMMEDIATELY.. BUY A TIN OF SALTED CASHEW..BEFORE I GET BRAIN FOG..<br /><br />IT WAS 2130 PM AND MOST STORES WERE SHUTTING..<br /><br />MY WIFE CAME RUNNING BACK WITH A HUGE TIN OF SALTED CASHEW--I GORGED ON IT AND DRANK LOT OF WATER...<br /><br />WITHIN THREE MINUTES I WAS OK--AND I DROVE THE NEXT ONE HOUR TO CALICUT AT FULL SPEED WITHOUT PROBLEM..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bPFKDdWlCg</span><br /><br />BONGS CANT GET HILSA FISH ANYMORE AFTER THE FARAKKA ARRAGE WAS BUILT SANS FISH LADDER.. HILSA FISH SWIMS HUNDREDS OF MILES UPRIVER TO SPAWN IN PURE SWEET WATER..<br /><br />PM MODI WANTED TO INTERLINK INDIAN RIVERS.. HE THINKS RIVERS ARE GUTTERS FLOWING INTO THE SEA..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br /><br />AS LONG AS SARASWATI RIVER FLOWED, GANGES WITH ALL IT DIVINE MACROPHAGES HAD NO IMPORTANCE..<br /><br />SARASWATI RIVER HAD MORE DIVINE AXOLOTLS...WHICH COULD REGENERATE EVEN THE SPINAL CORD.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br /><br />WELL WELL --WHAT DO YOU KNOW ?<br /><br />YOU EXPECT GANGA MINISTER UMA BHARATI TO KNOW ALL THIS ?<br /><br />HEY VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI-- WE HAD ENOUGH JAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR .. BASS KAR YAAARR ...<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_188BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_188b+seedsVpD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_187T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_187TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_187TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_187TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_187TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_187B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2685264252650684747\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_187M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The king and his barons sat on the earth. This kingdom produced no grain\nexcept rice. \u2014<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> Marco Polo </span>1296 AD ( which inspired sailor like Columbus )\naccounts on Calicut , my hometown </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I CAN PING HIS EXACT POSITION TO WITHIN 2 INCHES OFF HIS BOTTOM ORIFICE.<br />\n<br />\nITALIAN HALF BREED WENT TO UC BERKELEY UNIVERSITY AND WOWED ALL-- GOOD REPLIES , HAJAAAR CHENGA BODY LANGUAGE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECRET?<br />\n<br />\nSAM PITRODA COLLECTED A CONGRESS SLANTED AUDIENCE AND THE QUESTIONS WERE KNOWN TO THE ITALIAN HALF WIT WELL IN ADVANCE ( LIKE HOW TRUMP DEBATE QUESTIONS WERE GIVEN TO HILLARY IN ADVANCE )...<br />\n<br />\nTHEN THE HALF WIT WENT TO SINGAPORE AND NOW GERMANY / UK-- AND TRIED THE SAME THING.. PEOPLE HAVE CAUGHT ON.. DHAKKAN FELL PHUTTTT ON HIS FACE..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA WILL NEVER EVER ACCEPT A PM WITH ITALIAN MAFIA BLOOD --EVEN OF THE BLOOD IS 1%..<br />\n<br />\nSAME PITRODA WORMED HIS WAY INTO RAJIV GANDHIs INNER CLIQUE.. THIS BLOGSITE HAS HUGE RESPECT FOR RAJIV GANDHI..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1984, SAM BABY sold himself to Rajiv Gandhi who put him as his tech advisor . He instantly developed a Messiah Complex. He was literally ze cat\u2019s whiskers.<br />\n<br />\nHe had his first meeting with the Indian Tech minister Mr Unnikrishnan \u2013 a sharp and level headed politician, who had returned six times to Lok Sabha, from Badagara constituency, next to my hometown .<br />\n<br />\nThe entire group was waiting for Sam to appear. And there he breezes in , nay--sashays his ass in, fashionably late.<br />\n<br />\nAll must wait for the messiah right? He lisps to the Kerala minister \u201c Hi , you must have heard of me , I am SAM -- Sam Pitroda\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nIn the meeting , his huge ego occupied the whole room and he rubbed everybody the wrong way.<br />\n<br />\nThere was a grandiose sense of self-importance. There was this arrogant attitude and inflated feeling of personal ability, privilege, or infallibility.<br />\n<br />\nFinally Unnikrishnan told him \u201c I do NOT need messiahs!! \u201d<br />\n<br />\nAfter this electric shock Satyanarayan Gangaram Pitroda\u2014 OOPS\u2014 Sam got his CHOOTIYA messiah syndrome rearranged.<br />\n<br />\nThe messiah sees himself as the one visionary who can save the world and restore utopia, even if they have to drag everyone else kicking and screaming to get there, because they are the only ones that understand things as they are.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO SAM PITRODA<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO OUR ITALIAN HALF BREED CUM HALF WIT...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535264994347#c2766037549176043609\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 11:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_57MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWAS SARASWATI RIVER A MORE HOLY RIVER THAN GANGES<br />\n<br />\nYES!<br />\n<br />\nAYURVEDA USED SARASWATI RIVER WATER BEFORE THE RIVER WENT DRY..<br />\n<br />\nSARASWATI RIVER HAD AXOLOTLS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html<br />\n<br />\nGANGES RIVER HAS MACROPHAGES<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html<br />\n<br />\nAxolotl is a species of aquatic salamander. Unlike humans, it has the \u201csuperpower\u201d of regenerating its limbs, spinal cord, heart, and other organs..<br />\n<br />\nYoung frogs are known to regrow limbs, though they lose this ability when they change from tadpoles to adult frogs. On the other hand, the axolotl retains it throughout its entire life, making it unique among vertebrates<br />\n<br />\nHumans have also been known to regenerate the tips of the fingers, including the bone and skin. I once lost the tip of my left forefinger on the ship--it has regrown fully.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF CHEMICAL POLLUTION FOR TANNERIES, GANGES MACROPHAGES HAVE LOST THEIR ANCIENT POWERS OF REGENERATION..<br />\n<br />\nInjecting a drug to get rid of macrophages in an axolotl\u2019s limb before amputation leads to the accumulation of scar tissue instead of regrowth..<br />\n<br />\nThis scarring, which happens when a protein called collagen becomes disordered, is a normal part of wound healing in humans, but it is unusual in axolotls. This result suggests that macrophages are essential for regeneration<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls stay 'babies' for their whole lives. Axolotls are neotenic creatures meaning they achieve sexual maturity without losing any of their larval features<br />\n<br />\nIf an axolotl is given a shot of iodine, it will experience a rush of hormones that triggers the animal's growth processes, and it will \"grow up\" and resemble a mature tiger salamander, their closest relative.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, this is not the axolotl's natural state. \"Grown-up\" axolotls are typically listless and die about a year after the injection.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls can regenerate pretty much any body part. A number of amphibians are capable of regenerating limbs, but axolotls take this habit up a notch by regenerating jaws, spinal cords, skin and even portions of their brain. Axolotls can also receive organ transplants and will not reject the new organ.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls have a genome 10 times the size of the human genome..<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0GJOjfYn74<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950386071109941035\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_59M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. She had come to my house at Calicut with her husband for a 2 day holiday .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is what she told me.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">My wife was always a class leader and later on the school leader. Whenever the nuns at Auxilium convent, wanted to give a bad girl who was heading for hell , a good role model , it would be my wife.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These nuns , due to sexual repression were very MEAN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They would NOT allow the girls to touch the walls, in as much as even while climbing the stairs they had to be in the middle with hands tucked in.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So that had this school march past in Mumbai.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When they went for a dress rehearsal for this republic day parade , with dozens of other schools, some boys jeered loudly when the Auxilium contingent marched past.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This was put to a debate, with my wife mediating , not like Arnab Goswami , who will push his opinion ahead of others, even as a debate moderator. I wish I had a tete a tete with this man on national TV. I can cure his self obsession in just 5 minutes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">One good lookin' Catholic girl ( most of the group were Catholics ) , cried copious tears and was disconsolate .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She was of ze humble but firm opinion that all other girls from other schools were smartly turned out, while the Auxlium girls were NOT.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And to add to her woes hey boy friend was the leader of the hooting party.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When asked to be more objective\u2014the girl said , that other school girls wore miniskirts, while Auxilium convent girls, wore their bottom hems 2 inches below the mangy knees.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hundreds of safety pins would be procured- el pronto .&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The same rowdy boys clapped and whistled in appreciation when the real march past took place.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
