They felt let down that my wife who was a graceful role model , was in cahoots .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All the girls were arbitrarily suspended from school and their parents had to come the next day.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parents had their own dress rehearsal. Some of them were IAS, some police, some lawyers, some even MLA s and media giants .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parents decided to go for scorched earth tactics--on the advise of a high court lawyer .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They would threaten to get the school shut down , by creating a stink in the media with demand for the PMS ridden head mistress nun to be sacked.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Needless to say, the nuns had weak hearts and less faith in their Lord, when the chips were down .</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The fall out was that my wife was sacked as the school leader - rather she declined the job .&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But when the annual prize distribution came, my wife got the most thunderous ovation, pissing off the holy , but MEAN nuns.</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535325967587#c883203796410833733\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 27, 2018 at 4:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_104MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MY READERS WANT ME TO PEN THE \"VADAKAYIL REPORT\" TO SUPERSEDE THE \"GADGIL REPORT\" AND THE \"KASTURIRANGAN REPORT\"..</span></div>\n<br />\nWELL PADMA BHUSHAN MADHAV GADGIL , PADMA VIBHUSHAN KRISHNASWAMI KASTURIRANGAN ARE STILL ALIVE AND THEY HAVE BEEN GIVING RIDICULOUS SOUND BYTES ON TV , ABOUT LANDSLIDES AND KERALA FLOODS ALONG WITH PADMA VIBHUSHAN MS SWAMINANTHAN..<br />\n<br />\nWELL FIRST LET ME DESCRIBE MS SWAMINATHAN , THE FATHER OF THE \"GREEN REVOLUTION\".. THIS DESH DROHI IS THE REASON WHY INDIA LOST ITS HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND LOST 90% OF LAKES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAKES SURVIVED FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS IN PRISTINE CONDITON , AND WERE DECIMATED IN JUST 55 YEARS BY THE GREEN REVOLUTION WHICH GAVE US TOXIC ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nMADHAV GADGIL BEHAVING LIKE AN OUTRAGES VIRGIN , MUST KNOW THAT QUARRYING HAS NOTING TO DO WITH LANDSLIDES..THERE HAS BEEN NO LANDSLIDES IN THE VICINITY OF QUARRIES IN KERALA DURING THESE RECENT FLOODS..<br />\n<br />\nAN AVALANCHE OF SNOW CAN BE SET OFF BY A MERE SONIC BOOM OF A FIGHTER JET FLYING OVER THE MOUNTAIN.<br />\nINDUCED SESMICITY CAUSED BY MAN MADE DAM RESERVOIRS ARE THE MAJOR REASON FOR LANDSLIDES IN KERALA\u2026 AND THE REASON WHY MANY DAM WALLS COLLAPSED WITH MAJOR LOSS OF LIFE ALL AROUND THE PLANET..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN MERCANTILE MARINE DEPT, THE DIRECTOR GENERAL OF SHIPPING AND SHIPPING MINISTER MUST KNOW THAT MANY IRON ORE SHIPS WHICH LOADED IRON ORE AT PARADIP HAVE SUNK AT SEA WITH TOTAL LOSS OF LIFE..<br />\n<br />\nPARADIP DOES NOT HAVE THE MEANS TO TRIM THE PILE OF IRON ORE WHICH IT LOADS INTO THE SHIPS HOLDS..THE ANGLE OF REPOSE WAS TOO HIGH AND THE ORE SHIFTED DURING ROLLING IN HEAVY SEAS..<br />\n<br />\nHUNDREDS OF ORE SHIPS CARRYING CONCENTRATES HAVE SUNK.. WHEN THE POWERS THAT BE GOVERNING SHIPPING MADE NO EFFORTS ,<br />\n<br />\nI AS A YOUNG CAPTAIN HAS MY OWN RULES FOR MY SHIP.. THIS IS NARRATED IN THE BLOGPOST BELOW\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHERE THERE IS EXCESSIVE RAIN LIKE THE EL NINO POWERED RAINS WHICH CAUSED THE FLOODS IN KERALA CERTAIN SOILS HOLD TOO MUCH MOISTURE .. WHEN THE SOIL GETS SATURATED IT JUST FLOWS DOWN SLOPE LIKE A RIVER , WHICH IS CALLED LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS A YOUTUBE VIDEO OF SUCH A LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=czVJ6MNgE8E</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SLOPE DOES NOT HAVE TO BE TO STEEP IF DEEP ROOTED VEGETATION IS REMOVED WHICH BINDS COLLUVIUM TO BEDROCK.<br />\n<br />\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH HIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS. AS THE TOP PERMEABLE SOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES THEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<br />\n<br />\nFOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL ACUITY TO DELCARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY. THERE WILL ALWAYS BE A TRIGGER LIKE RAIN WATER STURATION OR A SEISMIC TREMOR ( IN CASE THERE IS NO RAIN ). EVEN THUNDER CAN CAUSE A LANDSLIDE.<br />\n<br />\nIN KODUGU DISTRICT THIS BLOGSITE HAS WARNED OF GROUND WATER PRESSURE FROM UNDERNEATH TRIGGERING LAND SLIDES AND HAS ASKED PEOPLE TO RUN IF THEY SEE WATER FOUNTAINS ENAMANTING FROM THE GROUND.<br />\n<br />\nA THIXOTROPIC MATERIAL SUCH AS MUD CAN CHANGE INTO A GEL OR SOL BY ADDING WATER OR PRESSURE OR SHAKING . IT GOES FROM BEING STABLE ONE MINUTE TO FLUID THE NEXT MINUTE ( THE REASON WHY ORE CONCENTARE SHIPS SANK )<br />\n<br />\nI ASK \u2013WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ARE THESE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">DON\u2019T WE HAVE TRAINED AND INTELLIGENT PEOPLE IN INDIA.. WHAT ARE OUR THINK TANKS WORTH..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_104BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedERLcD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_103T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535264994347#c2766037549176043609\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 11:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWAS SARASWATI RIVER A MORE HOLY RIVER THAN GANGES<br />\n<br />\nYES!<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AYURVEDA USED SARASWATI RIVER WATER BEFORE THE RIVER WENT DRY..<br /><br />SARASWATI RIVER HAD AXOLOTLS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">GANGES RIVER HAS MACROPHAGES</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAxolotl is a species of aquatic salamander. Unlike humans, it has the \u201csuperpower\u201d of regenerating its limbs, spinal cord, heart, and other organs..<br />\n<br />\nYoung frogs are known to regrow limbs, though they lose this ability when they change from tadpoles to adult frogs. On the other hand, the axolotl retains it throughout its entire life, making it unique among vertebrates<br />\n<br />\nHumans have also been known to regenerate the tips of the fingers, including the bone and skin. I once lost the tip of my left forefinger on the ship--it has regrown fully.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF CHEMICAL POLLUTION FOR TANNERIES, GANGES MACROPHAGES HAVE LOST THEIR ANCIENT POWERS OF REGENERATION..<br />\n<br />\nInjecting a drug to get rid of macrophages in an axolotl\u2019s limb before amputation leads to the accumulation of scar tissue instead of regrowth..<br />\n<br />\nThis scarring, which happens when a protein called collagen becomes disordered, is a normal part of wound healing in humans, but it is unusual in axolotls. This result suggests that macrophages are essential for regeneration<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls stay 'babies' for their whole lives. Axolotls are neotenic creatures meaning they achieve sexual maturity without losing any of their larval features<br />\n<br />\nIf an axolotl is given a shot of iodine, it will experience a rush of hormones that triggers the animal's growth processes, and it will \"grow up\" and resemble a mature tiger salamander, their closest relative.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, this is not the axolotl's natural state. \"Grown-up\" axolotls are typically listless and die about a year after the injection.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls can regenerate pretty much any body part. A number of amphibians are capable of regenerating limbs, but axolotls take this habit up a notch by regenerating jaws, spinal cords, skin and even portions of their brain. Axolotls can also receive organ transplants and will not reject the new organ.<br />\n<br />\nAxolotls have a genome 10 times the size of the human genome..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B0GJOjfYn74</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_72BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535420216520#c2160380466037972725\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 28, 2018 at 7:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_183MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Juc6_of_A-s</span><br />\n<br />\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH HIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS.<br />\n<br />\nAS THE TOP PERMEABLE SOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES THEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">FOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL ACUITY TO DECLARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWATER ACTS AS A LUBRICANT BETWEEN TWO LAYERS OF SOIL..<br />\n<br />\nHOUSES AND ARTERIAL ROADS CAN BE PROTECTED BY WATCHING THE VIDEO ABOVE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I WILL BE PENNING A BLOG NAMED \" VADAKAYIL REPORT\" WHICH WILL SUPERCEDE THE GADGIL AND KASTURIRANGAN REPORTS...</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE ABOVE COMMENT IS MOST CRITICAL.. During emergency mass secret conversions of Hindus to Christianity and Islam took place in South India... Today the census is a LIE\u2026<br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS INSERTION OF THE WARPED WORD SECULAR INTO THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS BEEN THE GREATEST FRAUD PERPETRATED ON INDIA SINCE INDEPENDENCE\u2026</span></b><br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">This EVIL intrusion of the word SECULAR into the Constitution was made through the 42nd amendment in 1977 when democracy was dead, voice of the people was muzzled and ALL fundamental rights had been suspended . ..</span></div>\n<br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THIS \"HIJACKED WORD\" SECULAR AUTOMATICALLY BECOMES NULL AND VOID\u2026</span></b><br /><br />The Forty-second Amendment of the Constitution of India, officially known as The Constitution (Forty-second Amendment) Act, 1976, was enacted during the Emergency by the government headed by Indira Gandhi which kicked into effect on 3 January 1977..<br /><br />42nd amendment is THE most controversial constitutional amendment in Indian history\u2026<br /><br /><div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Again--- The 42nd Amendment also amended the Preamble and changed the description of India from \"sovereign democratic republic\" to a \u201csovereign socialist SECULAR republic\u201d which was never the intention of the founding fathers when they drafted and passed the Constitution...</span></div>\n<br />THE WAITRESS WENT ONE STEP AHEAD WHEN SHE FORMED THE NAC/ CVB WHERE SHE BECAME THE SUPER PRIME MINISTER OF INDIA. ..<br /><br />CVB IS COMMUNAL VIOLENCE BILL WHERE ONLY MAJORITY HINDUS ARE AT THE RECEIVING END..<br /><br />Since Pakistan /Bangladesh was founded they have driven away almost all the Hindus by ethnic cleansing . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhaya can teach us\nto be non-reactive and non-grasping, and allow the process of letting things go\na bit easier. It challenges us to look deeply into our essence and discern\nsuperficial ego from divine truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhyaya,&nbsp; wants us to get to know who we really are\nbeneath the mind\u2019s explanations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhyaya asks us not\nto shy away from doing the deep dive, and it offers us a practice to take our\nsearch to a whole new level.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing ourself is the\npath to liberation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Practicing svadhyaya is\nregarded as a niyama (positive or righteous duty).&nbsp; This process of getting to know your psychic,\nemotional, and soul interior is central to the yogi path <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lLug9Tm7-JE/W39If7N1fFI/AAAAAAABdzc/uKFdl-M6Q84lOx89JZSawCLUpflMuzvzgCLcBGAs/s1600/Fixed-annd-Growth-Mindsets.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"640\" data-original-width=\"1024\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lLug9Tm7-JE/W39If7N1fFI/AAAAAAABdzc/uKFdl-M6Q84lOx89JZSawCLUpflMuzvzgCLcBGAs/s640/Fixed-annd-Growth-Mindsets.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we get to know our\nsmall self \u2013 the self of our personality, our ego, and our identity \u2013 we learn\nthe many habits, behaviors, and ways of relating to the world that have been\nconditioned by our experiences.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to transform,\nwe need to get really intimate with these habits, behaviors, and perceptions so\nthat we can identify where they\u2019re ultimately not serving us. This awareness\ncan bring great change, while also getting us in touch with our larger Soul\nSelf, the Self that knows what\u2019s best for our evolution.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jV3SLK-U2oE/W39ICZc2lnI/AAAAAAABdzQ/_QDNdrE8mXY872EI224xFq1mRnVKap9ygCLcBGAs/s1600/ibmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"194\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jV3SLK-U2oE/W39ICZc2lnI/AAAAAAABdzQ/_QDNdrE8mXY872EI224xFq1mRnVKap9ygCLcBGAs/s400/ibmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everyone\u2019s talking\nabout mindset these days. Mindset is that it\u2019s based on self reflection and\ncontemplation . If we truly sit down and reflect on our actions and habits, we\ncan quickly find that they often don\u2019t align to what our real goals in life\nare, or the person we truly want to become.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Somewhere along the way we\u2019ve just\naccepted this extra baggage that we often don\u2019t remember signing up for.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness depends on your mindset and attitude. With the right mindset you can\nchange your weaknesses to strengths. Limitations of MAYA exist only in small\nminds. The wave does not need to die to become water\u2014it is already water<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CP-OvHpHnPM/W39H3Wt5KVI/AAAAAAABdzM/3YxzFivRKmAjz8cXOwsg7wl3GOIDqdyIwCLcBGAs/s1600/ix%2Bmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CP-OvHpHnPM/W39H3Wt5KVI/AAAAAAABdzM/3YxzFivRKmAjz8cXOwsg7wl3GOIDqdyIwCLcBGAs/s320/ix%2Bmages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examining our own\nconduct and accepting responsibility for the consequences allows us to move on\nfrom mistakes and chart new courses in our relationships. It helps us navigate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Introspection is a gift\nin that it gives us complete freedom to determine our own future and our own\nsuccess because we can choose to operate in our areas of strength while\nacknowledging our weaknesses and managing them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Introspection without\napplication of self-knowledge to bring about positive personal change is a\nwasted opportunity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular introspection\nshould also include reflecting on our successes. This promotes\nself-fulfillment, inner peace and positive energy.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Awareness of self can\nbe a practical and applicable approach to many of the mysteries of life itself.\nIt is a fine way to assess situations in order to make the wisest decisions. In\nloftier terms, to know yourself is to know the divine.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: orange;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHY DO YOUR SCHOOL TEXT BOOKS TEACH US ABOUT\nA MAD MAN NAMED CHARLES DARWIN?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">IT IS JUST AN INDICATION THAT FOR THE PAST\nFEW CENTURIES WE HUMANS HAVE LOST OUR CAPABILITY TO </span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">CONTEMPLATE</span><span style=\"background-color: orange; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: orange;\">WE ALLOW EVIL KOSHER BIG BROTHER TO THINK FOR\nUS.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ARE WE NOT IN THE DNA AGE TO BE SEARCHING FOR\nMISSING LINKS BETWEEN MAN AND MONKEY LIKE LUCY/ PEKING MAN / PILDOWN MAN AND\nTHEIR ILK &nbsp;?</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/charles-darwin-and-his-apple-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/charles-darwin-and-his-apple-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">JEW ROTHCHILD DUG UP ARTIFACTS WHICH HE\nPLANTED SOMETIME A CENTURY IN ADVANCE.. THIS IS HOW WE GOT EMPEROR ESHOKA WHO\nNEVER EXISTED.. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE WHOLE EXERCISE BY JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO\nRULED INDIA WAS TO REVIVE BUDDHISM IN INDIA USING JOHN DEWEY BRAINWASHED BR\nAMBEDKAR WHICH WAS DEAD.. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">JOHN DEWEY CREATED MAO AND HIS COMMIE\nCONSTIUTION WHICH INDIAN COMMIES LIKE SITARAM YECHURY AND PRAKASH KARAT SWEAR\nBY. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;THIS\nCOMMIE CONSTITUTION WAS ABOVE THE INDIAN CONSTITUION\u2014THE REASON WHY SOMNATH\nCHATTERJEE WAS SACKED BY THE PARTY..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">MOST OF ROTHSCHILDs ARCHEOLOGY IN PALESTINE\nWAS DONE BY HIS AGENT JEW SIR WILLIAM MATHEW FLINDERS PETRIE.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN THIS FELLOW DIED THEY FOUND A BOOK SHELF\nWHICH HID A LARGE ROOM WHICH CONTAINED ARTIFACTS TO BE PLANTED AND THEN\nRETRIEVED AFTER A CENTURY..&nbsp; IT CONTAINED\nA FEW ALIENS.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/05/lawrence-of-arabia-part-5-zionist.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/05/lawrence-of-arabia-part-5-zionist.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BELOW: ROTHSCHILD TRIED TO PLANT EVIDENCE THAT GIZA PYRAMIDS WERE BUILT BY ALIENS AND NOT BY HINDU SAGES FROM KERALA</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/QwPTcmCb_KA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/QwPTcmCb_KA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>PYRAMIDS IS BUILT WITH DIVINE DIMENSIONS FROM\nTHE SRI YANTRA- AND REEKS OF VAASTU.</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">ONLY A CONSCIOUS HUMAN BEING HAS THE ABILITY\nTO CONTEMPLATE AND EXHUME BURIED TRUTHS..&nbsp; &nbsp;MERE PERCEPTION IS INSUFFICIENT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THAT IS WHAT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DOES.</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">ANIMALS CANNOT CONTEMPLATE ..&nbsp;</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contemplation is about\nthinking everything and meditation is about thinking nothing.&nbsp; While contemplation is a train of thought\nabout something, meditation is training the mind to rest in a particular focus\nthat leads to a connection to the source of consciousness itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Vedic&nbsp; Indian psychology has a&nbsp; fourfold scale, which represents the degrees\nof the ladder of being by which man climbs back to the source, the absolute\ndivine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The change, from \u201chere\u201d\nto \u201cthere,\u201d&nbsp; is not an uneventful process\nat all. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There come dry periods,\ndeviations, violent alterations, and temptations. If there are raptures and\nazure heavens, there are anaconda agonies and absolute abandonments, howling\nhot deserts and \u201cdark cold nights of the soul\u201d to go through. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Streaming tears of joy,\nhorripilation (bristling of the hair), stigmata (bodily marks or pains), and\nparapsychological phenomena have been known to develop.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first stage of\nmeditation&nbsp; achieves detachment from\nsensual desires and impure states of mind through analysis and reflection and\nthereby attains an emotional state of satisfaction and joy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the second stage,\nintellectual activities are abated to a complete inner serenity; the mind is in\na state of \u201cone-pointedness\u201d or concentration, joy, and pleasantness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the third stage,\nevery emotion, including joy, has disappeared, leaving the meditator\nindifferent to everything while remaining completely conscious. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fourth stage is the\nabandoning of any sense of satisfaction, pain, or serenity because any\ninclination to a good or bad state of mind has disappeared. The meditator thus\nenters a state of supreme purity, indifference to everything, and pure\nconsciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya is the illusion of\nboundaries--the creation of a mind that has lost its cosmic perspective. People\ncaught in the web Maya have lot of knowledge but little wisdom. They can see\neverything, but will miss the most important .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were no bounds to\nthe magical powers that can be attained by great Hindu ascetics and yogis&nbsp; teaching the suppression of all activity of\nmind, body, and will in order that the self may realize its distinction from\nthem and attain liberation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prayer is NOT\nmeditation. The former is a petition to&nbsp;\nGod, and the other is a detached observation of one's own mind, and its\nprocesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation is done to\npurify the mind and gain insight.&nbsp; It\nabstracts the self from conscious thought, and frees the mind from feelings\nthat cause stress and suffering.&nbsp;&nbsp; It\nfosters creative intelligence, raise consciousness, and enables fuller use to be\nmade of mental potential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spiritual aims are\npeace of mind, wisdom, and, ultimately, a state of enlightenment or\nself-realization.&nbsp; It is a&nbsp; form of natural healing, and helps people\ncope with&nbsp; anxiety, depression, and drug\ndependence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The attention is\nfocused on monitoring the breath, and noting thoughts crossing the mind,\nwithout any judgement or attempt at control, but as a silent and detached\nwitness.&nbsp; If the mind throws up\ndistractions, the meditator returns to simply observing the breath each time\nthe distraction happens.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A relaxed and\nunhurried attitude is important, since slowing down and observing the mind to\nsee how it works is central to the philosophy behind meditation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using the mantra\ntechnique, the meditator concentrates on a mantra&nbsp; to banish intrusive thoughts and thus achieve\nprogressively quieter levels of thinking until thought itself is transcended.\nThe subtle vitalizing frequencies of mantras activate psychic energies and awaken\nour intuitive faculties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During meditation\nthinking is separated from perceiving, so that the individual can stand apart\nfrom the emotional self.&nbsp; The reason why\npeople remain mired in negativity is because of the beliefs they have inherited\nover time. Beliefs are subconscious.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We act in the way we do\nbecause we are not aware of our beliefs and the feelings that these beliefs\ngenerate. That is why it is important to obeserve yourself and look within. We\ncan do it. That is why we are different from animals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can use our&nbsp; conscious mind to observe ,to introspect and\ndip into the&nbsp; subconscious where our\nbeliefs are embedded , in order to eliminate it.&nbsp; You can meditate to rewrite these negative\nprogrammes&nbsp; that cause you misery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be a mystic or a\nseer is not the same thing as being a spectator on the fence.&nbsp; Mysticism provides an escape from a life of\nuninspired existence. It magnifies man and gives him a hope and destiny to\nfulfill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the modern era the\nroad to holiness necessarily passes through the world of action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Mystic who is not of\nsupreme service to the Society -- AINT NO MYSTIC AT ALL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2UznXMCDH3k/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2UznXMCDH3k?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our actions reflect the\ndistilled wisdom that we possess of the innermost self. Our personal philosophy\nis an activated way of living. A peaceful person delves the truest definition\nof the self by maintaining an attentive state of conscious awareness and ceases\nescaping from reality with mindless diversions.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-inquiry is the\nprincipal method to remove ignorance, increase self-awareness, and abide in a\ntranquil existence.&nbsp; Introspection means\nbecoming aware of my inner-world, especially as it reacts and responds to the\noutside world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With introspection, we can find solutions to our every day life\nchallenges, because the answers are already within us.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examination of our past\nis never time-wasting. &nbsp;Reverberations\nfrom the past provide learning rubrics for living today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are the product of\nour past. We start each day where we left off the day before<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DO NOT STARE INTO THE\nREAR VIEW MIRROR AND DRIVE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contemplative actions\ncall for us to track the conscious mind at work rendering an accounting of our\nweaknesses and our strengths, folly and wisdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-reflection is a\nkind of self-judgment. The difference is just this \u2013 the former is positive and\nthe latter is negative.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regrets, seasoned with\nage were the things that denied you the peace of slumber - - that deep REM\nsleep that nourishes your soul--- not the restive, disquieting sleep of the\ndisappointed and the damned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-examination can be\npainful because being brutally honest requires us to acknowledge our faults,\nweakness, failures and shortcomings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By chanting OM\nmantra&nbsp; one\u2019s attention is singularly\nfocused on that word and all other thoughts fall away. One can then submit\nfully to the present moment and experience this pure consciousness within\noneself free of the constructs of the mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As you observe and\nnotice your habitual tendencies and patterns, it\u2019s important to adopt an\nattitude of non-judgment.&nbsp; When studying\nyourself it\u2019s easy to succumb to a judgmental mindset: either chastising\nyourself or, conversely, patting yourself on the back.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If that happens, that\u2019s\nanother tendency you can notice. Notice it, acknowledge it, and then come back\nto observing yourself with no judgment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Until we deeply examine\nour thoughts, words, and behavior and align them with our highest integrity, it\nwill be difficult to become the best we can be as human beings.&nbsp; And it will be nearly impossible to pursue\nour spiritual growth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-inquiry can be a\nmoment to moment practice of self-observation.&nbsp;\nIt can range from simply watching the breath to noticing emotions arise\nduring an argument.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During&nbsp; yoga practice, we include Svadhyaya in\nobserving the responses of our body and the reactions of our mind.&nbsp; In Svadhyaya, we study ourselves so that we\nmay become more of who we truly are\u2014our highest and greatest good within.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWARA YOGA HAS THE\nADVANCED FORM OF SVADHAYA INHERENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as physicists have\ndiscovered that the deeper they examine sub-atomic particles, the more they see\nthat the universe is composed of impulses of energy and information, the deeper\nwe look into ourselves, the more we unearth the profound truth that we are one\nwith all of consciousness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are Spirit\nitself.&nbsp; Study yourself, and you will\nfind your Self ( soul ) within.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-reflection helps\nto understand yourself and your problems, starting from your weaknesses and\nyour positive aspects. This practice not only makes you confident, but also a\nbetter individual<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A perfect individual is\none who has the precise knowledge of both their strengths and weaknesses.\nSelf-contemplation boosts self-confidence. Once you start thinking about your\nweaknesses, you will automatically find an answer to deal with that. And once\nyou have it, well, you are already on the path to victory. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Introspection alters\nyou as a person \u2013 for the better.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-reflection helps\nyou to pinpoint the things that make you happy and thus fills you with\npositivity. After a day out with a group of people, you can always introspect\non whether it was a memory that you want to cherish or a not so important one\nthat you would eventually discard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-reflection makes\nyou way more mature, and you start feeling calmer than ever even when things\nare spinning out of control. It helps you to focus and thus increases your work\nproductivity significantly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You realise that not everything is your fault, even\nwhen the entire world is against you. And even when you\u2019re wrong, introspection\nwill give you the strength to accept and learn from it. To err is human after\nall.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Introspection lets us\ntake better decisions as we learn from our mistakes. Experience teaches a lot \u2013\nbut just going through a situation is not what enlightens you or makes you very\nknowledgeable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless we learn to analyze and discern the magnanimity of an\nevent, we will never change for the better.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Internal change is the\nreal change in your life and the way that you view yourself. By contemplation\nyou can&nbsp; tap into the power of your\nsubconscious mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contemplation brings a sense\nof inner peace This inner feeling of peace and balance can go a long way in\nhelping any person be more aware of who they are and more accepting of\nthemselves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By contemplation you\nare&nbsp; able to recognize and eliminate bad\nhabits and beliefs. It&nbsp; helps you better\nunderstand what motivates you and what keeps you being you. In that you can\nalso learn about the things that may get in your way and the bad habits that\nhold you down. You may be surprised to find this sense of awareness helps you\nkick those habits to the curb for good.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By contemplation&nbsp; you will start to gain the strength and\nconfidence you need internally to make positive changes in your life\nexternally. You can control your journey in your life and feel empowered as you\ndo it once you start to realize who it is that you really are.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By contemplation we\nexamine our own internal thoughts and feelings and reflect on what they mean.\nThe process can be focused on one\u2019s currently ongoing mental experience or very\nrecently past mental experiences.&nbsp; We\nmust carefully analyze the content of our own thoughts, in an unbiased a\nmanner..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have over 60,000\nthoughts per day, over half of which are negative and over 92 % of which are\njust repeats from the day before&nbsp; If you\ndon\u2019t make the time and effort to focus your mind in a positive direction, you\nwon\u2019t give yourself the opportunity to grow and develop.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being present ( as\ndefined in Bhagawd Gita ) is defined as:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paying full attention to\nwhat is going on right now<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Staying in the moment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Observing what is,\nwithout criticism or judgment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balanced concern for\nthings exactly as they are<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accepting whatever\nexperience we are having<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having an awake\nparticipation in ongoing life<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">You can\u2019t cut out negativity until you are able to honestly identify negative traits as such.&nbsp; A \u201cbruised ego\u201d can be a good thing as long as it helps you to \u201cenhance your abilities in whatever you\u2019re tackling\u201d as well as to \u201cshape your character\u201d .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The best outcome of self-reflection is, quite simply, learning to understand what you are great at and should be doing more of.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The idea is to find the SWEET SPOT in your life where you spend the majority of your time doing things that you are both really good at and that you really love doing.&nbsp; It is about&nbsp; discovering your own personal genius..</span><br />\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/in-flow-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/in-flow-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/in-zone-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/in-zone-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JVcyaQNBnEY/W4Kd6_ly3lI/AAAAAAABd1s/XjVbbMVioaYqF39QwUUjQk6vTenfL2l-QCLcBGAs/s1600/daaownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JVcyaQNBnEY/W4Kd6_ly3lI/AAAAAAABd1s/XjVbbMVioaYqF39QwUUjQk6vTenfL2l-QCLcBGAs/s400/daaownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your daily life is\nnot contributing to your overall success, then ask yourself what\u2019s holding you\nback. What are you afraid of ?&nbsp; These things in life that hold you back often go\nby the term \u201cLimiting Beliefs\u201d, so-called because they are beliefs that can\nlimit you from doing or achieving something. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-86XcV3mJkxI/W4Kejqj0tzI/AAAAAAABd18/t7rZqQfkRKozMc24Z6uzxqcatF47P_ITwCLcBGAs/s1600/imafges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-86XcV3mJkxI/W4Kejqj0tzI/AAAAAAABd18/t7rZqQfkRKozMc24Z6uzxqcatF47P_ITwCLcBGAs/s400/imafges.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Limiting beliefs\nusually take the form of small, seemingly insignificant statements that slip\ninto our everyday speech, but with repetition they can become part of the\nidentity that we create for ourselves, severely holding us back from achieving our\ngoals and dreams. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Qb_f53aRL1Y/W4Ke2jWV3KI/AAAAAAABd2E/P6DWf_o5EJMlrYdzWMiznLQ2NArKwmKjwCLcBGAs/s1600/imtages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"196\" data-original-width=\"258\" height=\"303\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Qb_f53aRL1Y/W4Ke2jWV3KI/AAAAAAABd2E/P6DWf_o5EJMlrYdzWMiznLQ2NArKwmKjwCLcBGAs/s400/imtages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, many\npeople have an inherent, ever-repeated belief that they \u201ccannot sing,\u201d which\nmay then hold hold back from ever taking singing lessons and exploring the\npossibility that they could learn to sing.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aLeXV5w2SoI/W4KeOvDR4pI/AAAAAAABd10/lWmoX-_bYXYDlTq6o7CpvsoHI_non9TEgCLcBGAs/s1600/ddownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"255\" data-original-width=\"198\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-aLeXV5w2SoI/W4KeOvDR4pI/AAAAAAABd10/lWmoX-_bYXYDlTq6o7CpvsoHI_non9TEgCLcBGAs/s400/ddownload.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strive to find a\nbalance between the positive and negative thoughts within your self-reflection.\nWhen you reflect on past failures, don\u2019t fall into a rut of negative self-talk;\ninstead, make those \u201cfailures\u201d a positive thing by learning lessons from them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reflection starts\nworking against you when it prevents you from taking action<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contemplation can be\nthought of as a directed thinking practice, a way of thinking with greater\nboundaries and greater intention..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contemplation of one\u2019s\nown conduct, thoughts, desires, emotions is&nbsp;\none of the qualities of a great leader.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-contemplation\nshould become a regular activity \u2013 a habit. It requires quiet time with no\ndistractions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good leaders are\nregularly introspective about their leadership role and focus on how they can\nmake a positive difference within their organizations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/06/ethos-logos-pathos-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/06/ethos-logos-pathos-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Writing to record\nthoughts and insights and to set goals during regular introspection will help\ndrive positive change. Regular review of those notes and following up will give\npositive feedback and reinforcement of our efforts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Contemplation leads to\nthe recognition of samskaras (habit patterns) that shape our daily routines and\nfuel our desires. </span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In meditation, you are\nnot thinking about anything in particular. You are not doing anything. You are\nnot even resisting any thoughts which are coming to your mind. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During introspection,\nyou are doing something (means trying to find out the plus and minus points\nrelated to the events). But in meditation, you are doing nothing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is how\nintrospection and meditation different.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
