LISPING RIDICULOUS SOUND BYTES LIKE BOURGEOIS , PROLETARIAT , COMMON MINIMUM PROGRAM ETC --- LIKE HOW JNU COMMIES HAVE INTELLECTUAL DISCUSSIONS IN CAMPUS DHABBAS ABOUT AJJADDI, CRICKET, BHINDOW SEAT AND BOLLYWOOD \u2026.. ..<br />\n<br />\nNEHRU EMPLOYED GOVT AGENT WAITERS -- EVEN WALLS HAD EARS \u2026... . .<br />\n<br />\nNIKITA KHRUSHCHEV HAS ALREADY GIVEN NEHRU , THE LIST OF INDIAN TRAITOR COMMIES IN RUSSIAN PAYROLL BEFORE THEY WENT INTO CHINESE CAMP \u2026.... .<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS WAR BROKE OUT IN 1962, NEHRU JAILED THOUSANDS OF TRAITOR COMMIES WHO SUPPORTED SLIT EYED YELLOW SKINNED CHINESE IN A WAR AGAINST THEIR OWN WATAN. . \u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY NO ANAL SEX RECEIVING GAY GOES TO GAY PRIDE PARADES IN ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ULTBECr7ViM</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8836530626581760483\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_64M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535723056266#c8836530626581760483\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">August 31, 2018 at 7:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA,&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">KUTTANAD</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;WAS CALLED&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CHUTTANADU.</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">.</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />CHUTTA MEANS BURNT..NADU MEANS LAND</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">KHANDAVA FOREST WAS SITUATED HERE.. THIS FOREST WAS BURNT DOWN 6000 YEARS AGO BY LORD KRISHNA TO ARM TWIST MAYA DANAVA ( BEST ARCHITEST ON THE PLANET ) INTO BUILDING THE INDRAPRASTA PALACE WITH ITS HALL OF ILLUSIONS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya ( Danava ) is mentioned 23 times in the Ramayana, and 61 times in the Mahabharata. A unique reason for glory and legacy indeed. He was the acharya of all the Mayavis ( sorcerers).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya Danava was a descendant of Danu, one of Kasyapa\u2018s 13 wives and a daughter of Dakhsa Prajapati.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya Danava was in the Khandava forest, to build for Takshaka the Naga king.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">This was the opportunity Arjuna in collusion with Lord Krishna looked for. They set fire to the mighty forest which was reputed to hold every specimen of flora and fauna.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In this gruesome deliberate fire everything died except Takshaka's Aswasena son and 4 sarnagaka birds. Maya Danava was conveniently saved by Lord Krishna.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Out of sheer gratitude Asura Maya Danava asked , how he can ever repay Arjuna. Immediately Lord Krishna trapped him. \"Let a palatial Sabha (meeting hall) as thou choosest, be built by thee, if thou, O son of Diti, who art the foremost of all artists, desirest to do good to Yudhishthira the just (Mahabharata.2.1)\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Krishna told Arjuna \"Your city has been constructed by Vishwakarma and is truly beautiful. However, the Indraprastha palace is much too plain for such a wonderful city. Let a palatial meeting hall be constructed for Yudhishtra the just. Maya Danava is the best person to construct it, being the architect of the Asuras.\"</span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KRISHNA WAS ALREADY SETTING UP THE INCIDENT OF KING DURYODHANA FALLING INTO A POOL OF WATER , QUEEN DRAUPADI LAUGHING LOUND IN SARCASM\u2014WHICH WAS THE TRIGGER FOR THE MAHABHARATA WAR.</span></b></div>\n<br />Maya measured out a plot of land five thousand cubits square and began the construction. Soon the peerless palace of great beauty encrusted with diamonds was completed. The columns of this palace were made of gold.<br /><br />Maya appointed 8000 asuras called Kinkaras to guard this palace. Inside the palace, there were many amazing devices. It took the Maya just fourteen months to complete this building. Everything was made as per the principles of Vaastu.<br /><br />In Indian history, Mayan appears several times, most significantly as the author of Mayamatam, \"Concept of Mayan\" which is a Vastu Shastra, a text on art, architecture and town planning. He created the Mayan calendar.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">MAYA DANAVA AND KERALA KING MAHABALI WENT TO PERU ( PATALA ) BY VIMANA</span></b><br /><br />Aswasena later tried to take revenge for his mother, and hid in the quiver of Karna who was fighting Arjuna still like an arrow, but Arjuna's charioter Lord Krishna prevented this dart from hitting Arjuna by causing the horses to bend down thus sinking the chariot wheels. .</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n60 years after the Mahabharata war, Takshaka ( son of Ashwasena ) had his revenge by killing Parikshit, Arjuna's grandson.<br />\n<br />\nParikshit was forewarned and so he build a tower in the midle of a lake, with every hole and crevice plugged. But Takshaka coverted itself into a worm and bore into a mango, which was to be taken in a basket as food.<br />\n<br />\nParikshit was engulfed in flames due to the potency of the venom--as a poetic justice , as Takshaka's wife was killed in the Khandava forest fire.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">King Parikshit who was killed by snake bite , was father of Emperor&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Jayameyjayan&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">who built Kedarnath Temple in a grand manner .</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/6000-year-old-kedarnath-temple-highest.html</span><br /><br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">59.21%</span></b><br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>BELOW: THE FACE OF KING JAYAMEYJAYAN IS AT CENTRE TOP (UNDER THE LIGHT BULB )</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) ; prav\u1e5bitte\u2014about to commence; \u015bhastra-samp\u0101te\u2014to use the weapons; dhanu\u1e25\u2014bow; udyamya\u2014taking up; p\u0101\u1e47\u1e0dava\u1e25\u2014Arjun, the son of Pandu; h\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u012bke\u015bham\u2014to Shree Krishna; tad\u0101\u2014at that time; v\u0101kyam\u2014words; idam\u2014these; \u0101ha\u2014said; mah\u012b-pate\u2014King<br />\nTranslation<br />\nBG 1.20: At that time, the son of Pandu, Arjun, who had the insignia of Hanuman (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MY LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) on the flag of his chariot, took up his bow. Seeing your sons arrayed against him, O King, Arjun then spoke the following words to Shree Krishna.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH DWAJAH IS NOT MONKEY FLAG</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH MEANS VISHNU\u2014</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cKAPIH DWAJAH\u201d MEANS VISHNUs BANNER \u2013 GARUDA</span><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">KAPIH&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( sun ) is one of the 1008 names of Vishnu in Vishnu Sahasranamah</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KAPI MEANS BROWN.<br />IN MALAYALAM WE CALL IT COFFEE COLOUR.<br />KAPI DOES NOT MEAN MONKEY IN MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT</span></b><br />\n<br />\n###################3<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO TELL ALL THIS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHCHILD NEVER EXPECTED A BLOGGER CAPTAIN IN TOWN !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.22 %</span></b><br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/supreme-court-strikes-down-sec-377.html?showComment=1536279712034#c4939363172567571684\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 7, 2018 at 5:51 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_91MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME --CAPTAIN , WHY DO YOU BOAST?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\nI DO NOT GIVE FAALTHU BOASTS<br />\n<br />\nWHEN I SEE PEOPLE THROWING DARTS FIRST AND THEN DRAWING A CIRCLE AROUND IT--AND THEN WRANGLING PRIZES FOR MARKSMANSHIP<br />\n<br />\nI GO TEN TIMES THE DISTANCE THROWN-- I WILL FIRST DRAW A CIRCLE TEN TIMES SMALLER IN DIAMETER , AND THEN I WILL THROW A DART BULLS EYE..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE DONE IT AT SEA -- AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN --AND ALWAYS CAME AWWALL.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS PART OF THE VADAKAYIL \"LIVING LEGEND\" LORE..<br />\n<br />\nNOW I AM SAYING-- SANATANA DHARMA PARTS 106/ 107 / 108 WILL BE THE BEST EVER SINCE VEDAS WAS PENNED DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nADI SHANKARACHARYA DEALT ONLY WITH ADVAITA VEDANTA..4000 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS DEALT WITH DVAITA VEDANTA --IT WAS PENNED DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO ( BALLS TO ROTHSCHILDs CREATION MADHAVACHARYA OF THE FAKE UDIPI MUTT WHO NEVER EXISTED )<br />\n<br />\nUDIPI MUTT WAS AN AYYAPPA TEMPLE BEFORE..<br />\n<br />\nBHAGAWAD GITA DEALT WITH SANKHYA VEDANTA- 6000 YEARS AGO.. IT IS AN ACCOUNTING SYSTEM OF THE COSMOS..<br />\n<br />\nKRISHNA TOLD ARJUNA-- AMONG MAHARISHIS I AM KAPILA..<br />\n<br />\nKAPILA DOWNLOADED SANKYHA VEDANTA FROM AKASHA.. HE WAS NOT THE AUTHOR--HE WAS A CHANNEL.<br />\n<br />\nsiddh\u0101n\u0101m\u0301 kapilo munih\u0323 ( BHAGAWAD GITA 10.26 )<br />\n<br />\n\"AMONG THE PERFECTED BEINGS ,I AM SAGE KAPILA\"<br />\n<br />\nSANKHYA GAVE US PURUSHA , PRAKRITI AND THE THREE GUNAS ( RAJAS/ SATTVA / TAMAS ).<br />\n<br />\nTILL TODAY NOBODY --REPEAT--NOBODY HAS UNDERSTOOD SANKHYA .. PEOPLE PRETEND THEY UNDERSTAND WHAT KRISHNA TOLD ARJUNA IN BHAGAWAD GITA ABOUT THE 3 GUNAS ..<br />\n<br />\nI SHALL EXPLAIN SANKHYA ..AND THIS EXPLANATION WILL HOLD GOOD TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA..THROW EVERYTHING ELSE IN THE GARBAGE BIN..<br />\n<br />\nAND IF I FALL PHUTTT ON MY FACE-- I HAVE INVITED MY DETRACTORS TO SHOOT ME WITH MY OWN SHIT , RIGHT?<br />\n<br />\nTILL TODAY--IT HAS NOT HAPPENED -- RECORD HAI HUMAARA..<br />\n<br />\nHUMILITY HAS NEVER BEEN MY VIRTUE.. YOU CANT CALL THIS EGO-- IT IS SELF ASSESSMENT WHICH SPROUTED OUT OF SVADHYAYA..<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA ,AS SOON AS I TOOK OVER COMMAND , I TOOK OUT THE SWORD OF DAMOCLES AND HUNG IT RIGHT ABOVE MY CAPTAINs CHAIR--<br />\n<br />\nALL MY SHORE BOSSES KNEW IT.. THEY KNEW I DO THIS TO BOOST ME OWN PERFORMANCE ..IT WAS FOR MYSELF, NOT FOR ANYBODY ELSE..<br />\n<br />\nHOW THEY HATED MY GUTS !<br />\n<br />\nTHEY KNEW THAT I LEAD A TEAM -- WHOSE STRENGTH WAS AS GOOD AS ITS WEAKEST LINK.. AND THEY KNEW THERE WAS ONLY ONE STRONG LINK IN THAT CHAIN-- REST WERE ALL WEAK ..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS SOMETHING CALLED \" STRENGTH BY INDUCTION \"-- THE ESSENCE OF BLUE OCEAN LEADERSHIP..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS NOT A MANAGER--I WAS A LEADER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/blue-ocean-leadership-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>JAASTI BOL DIYA KYA?<br /><br />BOL BHI DIYA TOH DEKH LENGE !</b></span><br />\nTEE HEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4493948469647562661\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_142M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536514353438#c4493948469647562661\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 9, 2018 at 11:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_142MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND CRIED--<br />\n<br />\nI AM CONFUSED-- WHY IS KRISHNA CALLING ARJUNA SO MANY NAMES<br />\n<br />\n1) SON OF BHARATA<br />\n2) DESCENDANT OF BHARATA<br />\n3) BEST OF BHARATAS<br />\n4) SCION OF BHARATA<br />\n<br />\nAAKHIR YEH BHARAT KAUN HAI BHAIYYA-- KAUN SA KHET KA BEET ROT HAI YEH IS HE THE SON OF SHAKUNTALA ?<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nSHAKUNTALA NEVER EXISTED.. KALIDASA WHO CREATED SHAKUNTALA NEVER EXISTED...<br />\n<br />\nKALIDASA WAS CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD .. TO HIJACK ANCIENT INDIAN HISTORY.. TO SHOW THAT BIG BAND OF BIBLE IN 4004 BC IS RELEVANT..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS THE TRUTH?<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA WAS SON OF EMPEROR RISHABHA WAS WAS BORN IN 8190 BC.. RISHABHA WAS THE SON OF NABHI RAJA..GRANDSON OF AGNIDHARA , GREAT GRANDSON OF PRIYA VARTA ( 8255 BC )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA + RISHABHA ( BHARATARSHABHA ) RULED THE WHOLE PLANET...<br />\n<br />\nRISHABHA NAMED HIS SON BHARATA AFTER THE LAND OF BHARATA<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA THE LAND MASS IS DERIVED FROM THE SHABDHA BRAHMAN TERM ( BHAVA + RAGA + TALA ) BHA + RA + TA !!<br />\n<br />\nIN BHAGAWAD GITA KRISHNA CALLS ARJUNA BHARATARSHABHA --AND THIS HAS BEEN TRANSLATELY WRONLY BY EVER BODY AS -- O BULL AMONG BHARATAS..<br />\n<br />\nBALLS !<br />\n<br />\nBHARATARSHABHA MEANS FIRST NAME BHARAT + SURNAME RISHABHA ..<br />\n<br />\nPOOR JAINS DONT EVEN KNOW THEIR OWN HISTORY..<br />\n<br />\nIF I DONT REVEAL THIS--IT WILL NEVER BE REVEALED TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA..<br />\n<br />\nAND I HAVE HALF A MIND NOT TO REVEAL IT AS JAINS HAVE BEEN TRAITORS TO BHARATAMATA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RICHEST JAINS ARE CRYPTO JEWS WHO RUN THE DIAMOND MAFIA IN ANTWERP AND DUBAI-- WHO HAVE BUILD AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES FOR GHANSHYAM PANDE..<br />\n<br />\nBUDDHIRM DIED IN INDIA BUT IT FLOURISHED ABROAD..<br />\n<br />\nJAINISM NEVER WENT ABROAD..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">VARDHAMANA MAHAVIRA IS JUST THE 24TH THIRTHANKARA<br /><br />THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA IS ACTUALLY BAHUBALI SON OF RISHBHA , SON OF SUNANDA, BROTHER OF SUNDARI-- AND HALF BROTHER OF BHARATA..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nHOW WAS JAINISM BORN?</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The white historian has put Mahavira as a contemporary of Buddha at 599 BC. This is wrong . First of all Mahavira was just a reformer. He was the 24th Thirtankara . And he was born in 4500 BC.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">IN REALITY BAHUBALI IS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA..</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.23 %..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BUT BAHUBALI BECAME A MONK AND HIS USELESS SON SOMAKRITI HAD NO CHILDREN\u2026<br /><br />THIS WHY JAINS CHOSE HIS FATHER THE GREAT EMPEROR RISHABHA AS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA ( OPPORTUNISM AT ITS BEST )<br /><br />THERE WAS A SCHISM IN THE ROYAL BLOODLINE\u2014AS MAHUBALI AND HIS HALF BROTHER HAD A FIGHT..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Bharata was chosen by Emperor Rishabha to be his successor as he was loved by all and was level headed. Bahubali was an expert in Ayurveda and spent most of his time in Kerala learning Kalari ..</span></div>\n<br />\nAfter conquering the whole Bharata sent a communication to his brothers to accept his order. After an initial hesitation 98 brothers accepted Bharata\u2019s order.. .<br />\n<br />\nNow Bahubali ( son of Sunanda ) was left. When the messenger came to him with message he said \u2013 \u201cO messenger! Go and tell your emperor Bharat that Bahubali isn\u2019t like his brothers who became Sadhus leaving the kingdom.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_142BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Army of both sides fought hard. Sometimes army of Bharat dominated army of Bahubali and sometimes vice versa.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Seeing mass destruction in war it was decided that there should be a single combat between Bharat and Bahubali . One who wins will be the only Chakravarti or \"Emperor of Emperors\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In all the stages of battle Bharat had to face terrible defeat at the hands of his younger brother Bahubali in all these fights.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When a point came that Bahubali must give a lethal strike on his elder half brother Bharata, he raised his hand . He felt that his own sister Sundari and step sister Brahmi ( of script Brahmi Lipi fame ) were on the side of Bharata.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Instead of giving the final fatal blow, he suddenly uprooted a large tuft of hair from his own head instead, thus declaring himself as a monk, stunning all .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">After ruling for several years Bharata also became a wandering saint, like his father and brother..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Bahubali spent many years in meditation and severe penance. He was unable to become a Jivan Mukt as his enemity with Bharata scorched his soul..</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But one fine day Bharata came to him ,( standing naked and doing tapasya totally entangled in creepers )and worshipped him\u2014and his ego left him and he attained instant moksha ..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BAHUBALIs STATUE IS AT SHRAVANABELAGOLA KARNATAKA .\u2014IT IS A PLACE OF PILGRIMAGE FOR JAINS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">O Arjuna descendant of Bharata Rishabha</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">, four kinds of pious people engage in my devotion\u2014the distressed, the seekers after knowledge, the seekers of worldly possessions, and those who are situated in knowledge.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_142b+seedDigeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_142b+seedDigeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><br /></span><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">WHEN DID HINDU ORGS LIKE RSS/ VHP/ AVBP FIGHT FOR SANATANA DHARMA</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THESE ARE DOUBLE AGENTS WRECKING HINDUISM FROM WITHIN</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WHY ARE ALL RSS CHIEF SINCE&nbsp; THE ORG WAS FOUNDED NOT MARRIED ?</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THEY ARE BRAHMACHARIS?&nbsp; MY LEFT BALL !</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 32px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE KODUNGALLUR TEMPLE WAS ONCE WITHIN THE CAMPUS OF THIS PLANETs OLDEST UNIVERSITY ( OWNED BY THE CALICUT KIN )&nbsp;&nbsp;WHICH SENT OUT KERALA SAGES ALL OVER THE PLANET AS VISITING PROFESSORS<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 32px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 32px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red;\">TODAY THIS TEMPLE IS WORSE THAN A WHOREHOUSE.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 32px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 32px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html</a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: medium;\">After you round the coast of Ceylon sailing westwards, you reach the land known as Malabar , the noblest , most beautiful and richest land on this planet. &nbsp;No one here ate beef for anything in the world . The king and his barons sat on the earth. This kingdom produced no grain except rice. \u2014<b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;Marco Polo&nbsp;</span>1296 AD ( which inspired sailor like Columbus ) accounts on Calicut , my hometown</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Marco Polo\u2019s accounts are poison injected as they speak of the tribe GAVI of Kerala who ate beef \u2013who also killed St Thomas ( who never existed&nbsp; )&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 36pt;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE SHALL\nOVERCOME !</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">THE LAND OF THE DANAVAS , &nbsp;ANCIENT RICH RULERS OF THIS PLANET</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;--&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE CRADLE OF CIVILISATION&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">...&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: magenta;\">FOUNTAINHEAD OF ALL ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;....&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">THE MOST FERTILE AND BEAUTIFUL PART OF THIS PLANET&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">... THE LAND FROM WHERE ALL WORLD RELIGIONS SPROUTED....&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: purple;\">T</span><span style=\"color: purple;\">HE LAND WITH WILDEST FLORA AND FAUNA ...</span><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;THE LAND OF KALARI FIGHTERS</span><span style=\"color: purple;\">... THIS URINE SPARES GOOD MICROBES...<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">THIS IS WHY WE CALL HUMPED VEDIC COW HOLY..</b></div>\n<br />\nTHE HUMPLESS COW BEEF LOBBY IS THE MAIN REASON FOR GLOBAL WARMING.. THEY FART TOO MUCH METHANE , THEIR URINE AND DUNG IS LADEN WITH NITROUS OXIDE, DUE TO THEIR DIET POWERED BY ARTIFICIAL FERTILSERS ...<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br THIS BLOGSITE HAS HUGE RESPECT FOR RAJIV GANDHI..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1984, SAM BABY sold himself to Rajiv Gandhi who put him as his tech advisor . He instantly developed a Messiah Complex. He was literally ze cat\u2019s whiskers.<br />\n<br />\nHe had his first meeting with the Indian Tech minister Mr Unnikrishnan \u2013 a sharp and level headed politician, who had returned six times to Lok Sabha, from Badagara constituency, next to my hometown .<br />\n<br />\nThe entire group was waiting for Sam to appear. And there he breezes in , nay--sashays his ass in, fashionably late.<br />\n<br />\nAll must wait for the messiah right? He lisps to the Kerala minister \u201c Hi , you must have heard of me , I am SAM -- Sam Pitroda\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nIn the meeting , his huge ego occupied the whole room and he rubbed everybody the wrong way.<br />\n<br />\nThere was a grandiose sense of self-importance. There was this arrogant attitude and inflated feeling of personal ability, privilege, or infallibility.<br />\n<br />\nFinally Unnikrishnan told him \u201c I do NOT need messiahs!! \u201d<br />\n<br />\nAfter this electric shock Satyanarayan Gangaram Pitroda\u2014 OOPS\u2014 Sam got his CHOOTIYA messiah syndrome rearranged.<br />\n<br />\nThe messiah sees himself as the one visionary who can save the world and restore utopia, even if they have to drag everyone else kicking and screaming to get there, because they are the only ones that understand things as they are.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO SAM PITRODA<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO OUR ITALIAN HALF BREED CUM HALF WIT...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; Coast Guard with their 49 boats, 2 helicopters, 23 fixed wing helicopters, 2 fixed wing and 27 hired boats, 22 helicopters of Air Force and their 23 fixed wing aircrafts, one company of Border Security Force, 10 teams from CRPF and 2 companies of BSF along with one water vehicle team.<br />\n<br />\nIt is for the first time that such a massive rescue operation of this magnitude is being THIS IS RIVER WATER PLUS SILT.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SILT IS NOT JUST MUD--- IT IS THE COLLOIDAL LIFE OF THE RIVER..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">GANGES WATER AT GAUMUKH ( SOURCE ) CONTAINS MASSIVE AMOUNT OF COLLOIDAL SILVER AND OTHER COLLOIDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS WATER IS HIGHLY ALKALINE AND HAS AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF HYDROGEN WITH AN EXTRA ELECTRON TO NEUTRALIZE DAMAGING FREE RADICALS WHICH CAUSE DNA DAMAGE AND RAPID AGEING.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LOW SURFACE TENSION WATER IS BIO-ENERGISED MIRACLE WATER..LESS THAN THE USUAL 73 DYNES..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MIRACLE WATER EASILY PENETRATES THE 75 TRILLION CELLS AND MITOCHONDRIAL MEMBRANES TO SUPPLY NUTRIENTS AND FLUSH WAY TOXINS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE OLYMPICS CERTAIN ATHLETES HAVE GOOD COACHES WHO TELL THEM WHAT TO DRINK BEFORE THE RACE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_16.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS AT SEA FOR 40 YEARS AND THUS MISSED FAMILY MARRIAGES--WHERE RELATIVES MEET EACH OTHER..<br />\n<br />\nI WENT TO KANNUR TO GIVE INVITATIONS FOR MY ELDER SONs WEDDING 3 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF MY RELATIVES WERE SEEING ME AFTER HALF A CENTURY.. AND THEY ALL MADE SURE THAT I ATE WHATEVER NATIVE SWEETS THEY GAVE ME --IN ADDITION TO SWEET COLD DRINKS AND SWEET TEA..<br />\n<br />\nON THE DRIVE BACK FROM KANNUR TO CALICUT MY TOES AND FINGERS WENT HAYWIRE.. I BANGED INTO A MOTORCYCLIST AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.. HE JUST LOOKED BACK AND ACTED AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS UNABLE TO EVEN HOLD THE WHEEL LEAVE ALONE PRESS THE BRAKE.<br />\n<br />\nI IMMEDIATELY TOLD MY WIFE-- I WILL PARK AT THE NEAREST BAKERY-- MY BODY NEEDS SODIUM AND POTASSIUM IMMEDIATELY.. BUY A TIN OF SALTED CASHEW..BEFORE I GET BRAIN FOG..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS 2130 PM AND MOST STORES WERE SHUTTING..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE CAME RUNNING BACK WITH A HUGE TIN OF SALTED CASHEW--I GORGED ON IT AND DRANK LOT OF WATER...<br />\n<br />\nWITHIN THREE MINUTES I WAS OK--AND I DROVE THE NEXT ONE HOUR TO CALICUT AT FULL SPEED WITHOUT PROBLEM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bPFKDdWlCg</span><br />\n<br />\nBONGS CANT GET HILSA FISH ANYMORE AFTER THE FARAKKA ARRAGE WAS BUILT SANS FISH LADDER.. HILSA FISH SWIMS HUNDREDS OF MILES UPRIVER TO SPAWN IN PURE SWEET WATER..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI WANTED TO INTERLINK INDIAN RIVERS.. HE THINKS RIVERS ARE GUTTERS FLOWING INTO THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS SARASWATI RIVER FLOWED, GANGES WITH ALL IT DIVINE MACROPHAGES HAD NO IMPORTANCE..<br />\n<br />\nSARASWATI RIVER HAD MORE DIVINE AXOLOTLS...WHICH COULD REGENERATE EVEN THE SPINAL CORD.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL --WHAT DO YOU KNOW ?<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT GANGA MINISTER UMA BHARATI TO KNOW ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nHEY VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI-- WE HAD ENOUGH JAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR .. text-decoration-line: none;\">September 4, 2018 at 2:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_114MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain ! Please read these articles ! Indian connect with Russia during rule of Islamic-&amp;-European Invaders ! Note how \"Nikitin\" is similar to Indian name \"Nikethan\".<br />\n============================<br />\n<br />\n-&gt; \"From Tver to Calicut: Retracing Afanasy Nikitin\u2019s life in India. The Russian merchant arrived in India in 1469 and lived in the country for three years, travelling all the way to Kerala and Sri Lanka.<br />\n<br />\nFrom Dabhol, Nikitin traveled to Calicut in what was a 25-day journey --- \u201cCalicut is a big harbor on the Indian Sea, and God forbid that any ship should pass by it; no one who sails past it will cross the sea unscathed,\u201d he wrote. \u201cAnd it produces pepper, ginger, nutmeg, cinnamon, clove, spices, adrak, and many kinds of herbs. Everything is cheap there.\u201d --- \"<br />\n<br />\nhttps://tinyurl.com/y7nvrfem<br />\n============================<br />\n<br />\n-&gt; \"Russia and India: A civilisational friendship. Athanasius (also known as Afanasy) Nikitin was in India nearly thirty years before Vasco da Gama and, in fact, opened the country for Europeans. After Nikitin, however, it took two centuries to establish direct contact between India and Russia. It was only in the late 17th century that Russian merchant Semyon Malenkiy brought a letter from Peter-the-Great to the Badshah, Mughal-Emperor-Aurangzeb, with a request to allow him to sell Russian goods, as well as purchase local products. In 1696 Aurangzeb received Semyon Malenkiy and allowed him to conduct free trade.\"<br />\n<br />\nhttps://tinyurl.com/y9k444q8<br />\n============================</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_114BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; He has spoken very highly about Calicut --- (see above comment).</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_112MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-388877552\" style=\"display: inline;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/delete-comment.g?blogID=3564735312144269387&amp;postID=7323513480433974490\" o=\"d\" style=\"color: #888888; padding-right: 5px; padding-top: 5px; text-decoration-line: none;\" target=\"_self\">Delete</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_112BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_112B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_113B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2664489559251933325\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_113M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1536102520725#c2664489559251933325\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 5, 2018 at 4:38 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_113MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nCALICUT TAUGHT CELESTIAL NAVIGATION TO THIS PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nNO ALIEN SHIP DARED SNEAK LAST CALICUT WITHOUT BEING CHALLENGED .<br />\n<br />\nTHE CHINESE ADMIRAL ZHENG HE DECIDED TO TAKE THE CALICUT KING HEAD ON.<br />\n<br />\nHE CAME IN UNANNOUNCED WITH MORE THAN 300 LARGE SHIPS IN 1406 AD , WITH 31000 SOLDIERS ... A MIGHTY SHOW OF FORCE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE DAWN HORIZON OF CALICUT WAS OBLITERATED BY A STRANGE DARK MASS AND WOMEN CRIED OUT OF PANIC..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS NO CONTACT TILL SUNSET.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/chinese-admiral-zheng-he-in-calicut.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAT MIDNIGHTMORE THAN A HUNDRED OUR SWIFT LONG SNAKE BOATS , WITH HUNDREDS OF WARRIORS SNEAKED OUT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CHINESE SNIFFER DOGS COULD NOT DETECT THE SMELL OF HUMANS , AS THE KERALA SOLDIERS WERE COVERED WITH ACTIVATED CHARCOAL.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SUDDENLY AS IF ON CUE , A THOUSAND FLAMING ARROWS WERE SHOT INTO THE SKY..JUST A SPECTACUL AR SHOW OF FORCE .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCHINESE JUNKS WERE SLOW AND PONDEROUS WITH PLAITED BAMBOO REED SAILS AND WERE VULNERABLE TO SUCH A SHOCK FIRE ATTACK.. NO CHINESE SHIP WOULD GO BACK , IF THEY HAD TOUGH IDEAS..<br />\n<br />\nALL THE HUNDREDS CHINESE JUNKS WOULD HAVE BURNED OUT WITHIN AN HOUR<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ADMIRAL ZHENG HE WAS VERY HUMBLE AFTER THAT \u2026 HE CAME ASHORE THE NEXT MORNING AND MET THE CALICUT KING, WITH DEEP RESPECT IN HIS HEART</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">ADMIRAL ZHENG HE DIED IN CALICUT.. AFTER SEVEN BOUNTIFUL VOYAGES.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedBIS1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedBIS1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>This post is now continued to part 106 below</b></span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; color: red;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YtX4UvC3qlU/W38DFhkHvGI/AAAAAAABdy0/DsUUDDSAEpYTUZLpBZc568y5UmFbY1CugCLcBGAs/s1600/BBBBB1TBB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"640\" data-original-width=\"311\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YtX4UvC3qlU/W38DFhkHvGI/AAAAAAABdy0/DsUUDDSAEpYTUZLpBZc568y5UmFbY1CugCLcBGAs/s640/BBBBB1TBB.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enhancing our ability\nto understand ourselves and our motivations and learn more about our own values\nby Svadhyaya ( contemplation ) helps us take the power away from the\ndistractions of our modern, fast-paced life, and bring our focus back where it\nbelongs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EASIEST WAY OF SVADHYAYA FOR A LAYMAN ?</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">AFTER YOU WAKE UP IN THE MORNING, CONTINUE\nLYING DOWN&nbsp; IN THE HALF AWAKE CONDITION\nFOR 15 MINUTES - YOUR BRAIN WILL DRIFT TO ALPHA MODE..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Then ask yourself one or two questions every day..</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Who am I ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Am I waking up in the morning with a sense of\npurpose , ready to take on the day?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">If this were the last day of my life, would I\nwant to do what I am about to do today?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Am I using my time wisely?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">When did I last push the boundaries of my\ncomfort zone?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Am I holding on to something I need to let go\nof?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">What worries me most about the future?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Am I taking anything for granted?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Have I done anything lately worth\nremembering?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Am I employing a healthy perspective?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Am I living true to myself?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ETC</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Practicing svadhyaya allows\nus to see when we are NOT behaving in alignment with our goals.. We notice when\nwe are putting on a show for someone rather than aligning our behavior with the\ntruth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We will know when get get caught in activity traps.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We will notice when we\nare smiling even though we are deeply sad, or when we say we are fine even\nthough we are not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ASK YOURSELF ,IF THE\nCHOICES YOU MAKE ARE SERVING YOU OR CUTTING YOUR FEET.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/unlearning-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/unlearning-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal is to begin to\nfamiliarize yourself with your authentic self, and your inauthentic self. As\nyou learn to tell the difference, you will be better able to align your choices\nwith who you really are and what you really want to create.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ability to detach\nand observe ourselves separates us from animals<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A goal of svadhyaya is\nto look at how people are responding to us and let that be the opportunity to\nunderstand something about the way we habitually operate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhyaya suggests that\nwe can use all of our activities\u2014solitary and relational\u2014as mirrors in which to\ndiscover something important about ourselves and that we can use what we\ndiscover as valuable information in the process of arriving at a deeper\nself-understanding.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ultimate purpose of\nsvadhyaya is to function as a mirror reminding us of our higher potential\u2014in\nother words, as a way into the interior where our true Self resides.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhyaya is the means\nof self-reflection through which we come to an increasingly deeper level of\nself-awareness and self-understanding. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhyaya develops\ntapas, tapas develops svadhyaya, and together they help us awaken to the\nspiritual dimension of life. Tapas is any intense or prolonged practice for\nSelf-realization, which involves overcoming the natural tendencies of the body,\nemotions or mind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goal of tapasya &nbsp;is\nto control the disturbance created in mind, not to punish the body. Tapas\nliterally translates as \u2018heat\u2019 and is where we build the inner strength to\ncreate the best version of ourselves.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And we do this by going against what\u2019s\ncomes easiest to us. Tapas as \u201ca burning desire to cleanse &nbsp;our body and our senses, so that the senses\nand the body may be made permanently pure and healthy and leave no room for\nimpurities to enter into our system<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.01---&nbsp; tapah</span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">svadhyay</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">eshvarapranidhanani kriyayogah<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The practice of yoga is\nthe 'yoga of action', kriyayoga', comprising tapas, self-discipline, </span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">svadhyay</span>a</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\nself-study and Isvara pranidhana, surrender to God. &nbsp;&nbsp;--<b> PATANJALI YOGASUTRA &nbsp;5000 BC <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tapas is the blinding\ndesire to burn away the impurities of body, senses and mind. </span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Svadhyaya</span> </span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">is the&nbsp; study of spiritual sacred texts, and\ncontemplation in order to comprehend one's own self. The disciplines of\ncleansing man's three constituents - body, speech and mind constitute kriyayoga\n- the path to perfection. Human bodies are purified by self-discipline (tapas),\nwords by contemplation &nbsp;(svadhyaya) and\nminds by love and surrendering to Him (Isvara pranidhana). This sutra\nsymbolises the three great paths - karma, jnana and shraddha . The path of\naction (karma-marga) is the discipline (tapas) of body, senses and mind. The\npath of knowledge (jnana-marga) is the study of the self (svadhyaya) from the\nskin to the core and back again. The path of love of divine &nbsp;( shraddha-marga) is surrendering (pranidhana)\nto the supreme . &nbsp;Sadhana pada\ndistinguishes the source of all these paths. The first symbolises life, the\nsecond wisdom. The third, through the surrender of ego, brings the humbleness\nthat leads to the effulgent, sorrowless light of Isvara, God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And thus, as we go\ndeeper and deeper into the process of self-investigation and self-discovery, we\nalso go deeper and deeper into the Self, until eventually we discover (or\nuncover) the Divine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is akin to a drop of water dissolving into the ocean. At first we wonder whether\nwe are the drop. But eventually we discover that we are not and have never been\nthe drop, but only the water itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only when you do\nSvadhaya can you dive into your subconscious. Your subconscious mind is where\nyour self-image is stored. All of your attitudes, experiences, beliefs, and\nvalues are stored deep in your subconscious, forming the core of who you are\nand driving your behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhaya will help you\nachieve a new, higher level of consciousness, and it will help you find\nvaluable information and answers about yourself and your beliefs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind\ncannot tell the difference between a real experience and one that you vividly\nimagine. The subconscious mind does not think\u2014it is only a store house of our\nexperience. It has no sense of time. It cannot differentiate between positive\nand negative input. It cannot tell the difference between real and imagines experience.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The conscious mind can\nbe engaged 100% in talking or deep thinking while the subconscious keeps the\ncar on the road. The conscious and subconscious minds are connected through a\nfilter. So we cant read the contents of our subconscious mind.. When the\nsituation demands we are able to use the subconscious memory to the full\nextent\u2014but only in relation to the specific problem. The conscious mind has\nlimited memory. The subconscious mind has unlimited memory. Every experience we\nhave ever had is impressed somewhere in the electrochemical cells in our brain.\nThe brain records every thing\u2014every thing senses by our 5 senses\u2014and it is\nimprinted in the brain cells for ever. Whenever something reactivates those\ncells we get a mental picture duplicating the original experience. The\nsubconscious has a perfect memory. Every thing you have experienced using your\n5 senses is part of the permanent memory of the subconscious mind, which never\nsleeps The subconscious mind acts on old beliefs stored over a lifetime. Many\nof those beliefs you may have accepted without thinking. Or you may have\nabsorbed them when you were too young to exercise choice. Hypnosis is state\nwherein your conscious (thinking) mind becomes bored \u2026 it relaxes and stops\nthinking Persons who can do self hypnosis has discovered the secret of\nsuccessful living. All hypnosis is self hypnosis.\u2014no one can hypnotise you\nagainst your will. There is no loss of consciousness in hypnosis. Hypnosis is\nan altered state of consciousness, during which the conscious critical mind is\nrelaxed and relatively inactive, and the doorway to the subconscious, inner\nmind is opened with a person\u2019s permission. A hypnotist talks directly to the\nsubconscious mind, without interference from reasoning . Truth serums are also\nused in psychiatry to help patients speak more freely during psychoanalysis\nbecause they help the patient release many thoughts locked in the subconscious.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The subconscious mind\nis protective. Hypnotized people will accept suggestions that are acceptable,\nand reject suggestions that are not acceptable The hypnotized subject or\npatient is NOT asleep. He is relaxed, comfortable, focused, and in a state of\ndaydream type thinking. His analyzing thinking mind (Conscious mind) is turned\noff and his feeling and intuitive and creative mind (Subconscious) is aware of\neverything that is going on.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A hypnotized subject\ncannot be made to do anything he is not willing to do. If a person is not\nwilling to cooperate, he cannot be hypnotized..&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">By following the\n\"hypnotist's\" instructions, you become more suggestible. When you are\nin this altered state of increased suggestibility, your mental\n\"clutter\" is cleared away so that you can pay attention to the\nhypnotist's suggestions and be open to experiencing new perspectives and\nsolutions to your problem.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Once the Hypnotic State\nis induced and the doorway to the Subconscious Mind is opened, with your\npermission, the competent Hypnotist can provide information, in a language and\nform that the Subconscious can accept, to help you change the behaviors,\nfeelings and thoughts that you want to change. We utilize the fact that the\nSubconscious Mind has the ability (actually the tendency) to accept what it\nimagines as real.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">A hypnotic stage is not\nmysterious. You actually enter and exit this state of mind many times during a\nordinary day. Something triggers this state.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Subconscious mind has a\nmemory of 100 trillion images, all our experiences, emotions and feelings are\nstored as an image or a sound in a digitised manner . Data that cannot be recalled\nare retained in the subconscious. A person may be unconscious of ever having\nbeen locked in a closet as a child, yet under hypnosis he may recall the\nexperience vividly.</span></i></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Below: A good hypnotist can clear the cobwebs in the mind</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/fd7e1fXYIuM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/fd7e1fXYIuM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: cyan;\">During hypnosis \u2013our\nconscious mind goes into a trance and suggestions are given directly to the\nsubconscious mind, which cannot argue but accepts the suggestion at its face\nvalue. We do self hypnosis unknowingly several times an a day while doing our\nday to day activities. This is how our body learns to relax otherwise we would\ndie of stress at a very early age. Any monotonous sequence of events make it\nboring for the brain and eventually it starts producing a hormone called\nSerotonin which induces a drowsy state of mind. &nbsp;On my ship if have seen the POWERS OF VODKA as\na truth serum especially in conjunction with suitable music and blue light for\nthe alpha state , that can open pathways to the subconscious.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-reflection and\nintrospection are important exercises that can help people grow and develop by\nlooking inward instead of outward.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cinsula\u201d and\n\u201cposterior cingulate cortex\u201dis specialized in observing our internal landscape.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/o4JbIotpras/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/o4JbIotpras?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An internal world, with\nits varied landscape of emotions, feelings, and sensations exists which determines\nwhether we are having a good day or not, whether we are happy or unhappy.\nThat\u2019s why we can feel angry despite beautiful surroundings or feel perfectly\nhappy despite being stuck in traffic..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Exteroceptive attention\nrelies on the frontal lobes of the neocortex (literally, \u201cnew\u201d cortex), the\nevolutionarily newest outer layer of our brains that most distinguishes humans\nfrom other species.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/zu_tIDkfBkU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/zu_tIDkfBkU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Interoceptive\nattention, however, relies upon brain regions that link the cortex to the\nlimbic system, an evolutionarily older brain system that we share in common\nwith many other animals. These limbic connections &nbsp;support more direct access to emotions and\nphysical sensations while the neocortex is more responsible for a conceptual\nsense of self. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By recruiting\n\u201climbic-bridge\u201d areas like the insula and posterior cingulate, a person using\ninteroceptive attention may bypass the pre-frontal neocortex, directly tapping\ninto bodily awareness that is free from social judgment or conceptual\nself-evaluation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;States of mind such as anxiety, depression,\nand anger engage the prefrontal cortex.. Neural networks of interoceptive\nattention provide an inbuilt system separate from the thinking mind to help\nourselves find calm.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/HVGlfcP3ATI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/HVGlfcP3ATI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can\u2019t control our\nmind with our mind (or our pre-frontal cortex with the pre-frontal cortex), but\nwith interoceptive awareness, we may be able to escape our racing thoughts. The\nexpression \u201ctake a deep breath\u201d in a moment of anger or fear is a common saying\nthat directly taps into our ability to use our interoceptive awareness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SWARA YOGA MASTERED\nINTEROCEPIVE AWARENESS.. THIS PLANET HAS NOT YET WOKEN UP TO THE ASTOUNDING\nSECRETS OF YOGA..&nbsp; ITS AMAZING EFFECTS ON\nVAGUS NERVE AND AMYGDALA..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the left nostril (\nright brain lobe for right hander ) is PREDOMINANT it is the lunar energy or\nIda Nadi which is flowing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the right nostril\n( left brain lobe ) DOMINATES, the solar energy or Pingala Nadi is flowing.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_9.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_9.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who meditate\nhave greater interoceptive awareness than dancers who, though they also have\ntrained awareness of their bodies' movements, are perhaps less in tune with\ntheir emotional states.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For some, turning\nattention inward can be distressing, because it may tune us into emotions that\nare not comfortable..By learning to engage through our dedicated interoceptive\nawareness, we can heal ourselves..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have an inbuilt\nability to calm ourselves down. &nbsp;Swara\nYogis are masters of this art.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people do not\nunderstand their potential, or attempt to live up to that potential, because\nthey simply do not know who they are really.&nbsp; &nbsp; We Are conscious humans , we can create positive\nchange for ourselves and forge the HINGES OF DESTINY on our own terms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fate can be called as\nsomething that is predetermined. It is something that has been written in your\nlife even before you were born. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By fate, it has been\nalready decided that you should be born to certain poor parents, born at a\ncertain godforsaken place UGLY --BONDHU&nbsp;\n,.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Fate is that one cannot\nchange.&nbsp;&nbsp; Karma or the conscious actions\nthat you do in the present life is passed on to the next life.&nbsp; But fate is not passed on to the next life\n\u2014&nbsp; read this a million times</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rpWUUwV8afc/W32VH7eVfOI/AAAAAAABdv0/_Hrl_sHuMbwWkOfTkLhIZc8fbPT8Q9_ZACLcBGAs/s1600/DIKW_WEPyramid.svg.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
