, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WITHOUT INTROSPECTION YOU CAN NEVER BECOME A\nLEADER OF MEN, YOU CAN ONLY BE A MANAGER OF INVENTORIES</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"226\" data-original-width=\"223\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yVqe2GbWpN8/W32i5q_Rr1I/AAAAAAABdwg/pp0bZ4gteCEOXq_-1nAwzwjpzvNBJlz1QCLcBGAs/s400/imagWes.jpg\" width=\"394\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-reflection is a\npositive form of introspection, from which people attribute meaning and\nsignificance to their thoughts and actions, accept and learn from their\nmistakes, and increase their self-awareness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-rumination is the opposite:\nit is a negative form of introspection, from which a person obsesses over their\nshortcomings, doubting themselves and their self-worth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AV0ztsxzGWE/W32ih6D1DtI/AAAAAAABdwY/8bI4B-pAdmQxoQysPorPLY-0iNT_cFXAgCLcBGAs/s1600/4850958QQ-Sonja-Lyubomirsky-Quote-The-combination-of-rumination-and-negative.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"900\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AV0ztsxzGWE/W32ih6D1DtI/AAAAAAABdwY/8bI4B-pAdmQxoQysPorPLY-0iNT_cFXAgCLcBGAs/s640/4850958QQ-Sonja-Lyubomirsky-Quote-The-combination-of-rumination-and-negative.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhyaya an act of\nself-awareness that involves thinking about and analyzing your own thoughts and\nbehaviors, is one of the defining characteristics of man versus animal. &nbsp;&nbsp;We are naturally curious about ourselves. We\nreplay our own experiences and actions in the hopes of understanding who and\nhow we are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jlxRaXSJ1i4/W32jRWJaV4I/AAAAAAABdwo/Vrul7667dcgAKp0JfLcU-s8Aaf07viWygCLcBGAs/s1600/XAimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jlxRaXSJ1i4/W32jRWJaV4I/AAAAAAABdwo/Vrul7667dcgAKp0JfLcU-s8Aaf07viWygCLcBGAs/s400/XAimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regular contemplation\nis an essential part of our happy, fulfilled, lifelong journey. It is our\ncompass, our rudder and wind in our sails.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MKek_Zv1_eE/W32zz0_CCtI/AAAAAAABdw4/gz68fBu78MkMG6FAJwA7QuaouN4E29EGwCLcBGAs/s1600/w549c20c9182379b3b9b5824af5e0a5e9--tabatha-coffey-compass.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"236\" data-original-width=\"236\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MKek_Zv1_eE/W32zz0_CCtI/AAAAAAABdw4/gz68fBu78MkMG6FAJwA7QuaouN4E29EGwCLcBGAs/s400/w549c20c9182379b3b9b5824af5e0a5e9--tabatha-coffey-compass.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga provides the\ntools\u2014 postures, breath training, meditative methods, and self-reflection\u2014to\nactively engage with inner life. &nbsp;As a\nresult, yoga is described as a moksha shastra, a \u201cliberation teaching.\u201d at\nalthough yoga may be described as a moksha shastra, it is not an escapist path.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga does not tell us\nto turn away from the world or to avoid human affairs. Rather, yoga calls for\nself-effort and self-reflection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reflection takes us\ninto what we are are doing and how we might change it, were we to try it again\nin the future. Contemplation is asking why.. . This introspective practice asks\nyou to look back on what you have done, how it might have worked, how it may\nhave failed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contemplation takes us\ninto the inner workings of our selfish desires, egocentric motives and\nultimately, our deepest sense of purpose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT\nOF NEGATIVE DISTRACTIONS YOU SUBJECT TO EVERY SINGLE DAY?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Self-reflection is a\nvery important skill to cultivate because it enables us to assess the patterns\nand activities of our daily lives in order to see how our actions and habits\ncontribute to our overall well being, success, and happiness..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/jealousy-growing-ulcer-within-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/jealousy-growing-ulcer-within-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RXZmjw37PHc/W33zt3a9fkI/AAAAAAABdxQ/1ElcJ1pwhIscuwNsb060ItOQ-qdM3JWXwCLcBGAs/s1600/down5load.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"255\" data-original-width=\"198\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RXZmjw37PHc/W33zt3a9fkI/AAAAAAABdxQ/1ElcJ1pwhIscuwNsb060ItOQ-qdM3JWXwCLcBGAs/s400/down5load.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BHAGAWAD GITA ASKS YOU TO CONTEMPLATE -&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NEVER RUMINATE&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ijXPcTZfCy4/W3321ufjX1I/AAAAAAABdxw/oddBSOG1On4-d-XvP8PIYyIJ4WeHV8EhQCLcBGAs/s1600/idmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ijXPcTZfCy4/W3321ufjX1I/AAAAAAABdxw/oddBSOG1On4-d-XvP8PIYyIJ4WeHV8EhQCLcBGAs/s400/idmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u093f\u0926\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0926\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u0941</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">:</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916\u0938\u0902\u092f\u094b\u0917\u0935\u093f\u092f\u094b\u0917\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u094b\u0917\u0938\u091e\u094d\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093f\u0924\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u093f\u0936\u094d\u091a\u092f\u0947\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u094b\u0915\u094d\u0924\u0935\u094d\u092f\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u094b\u0917\u094b\u093d\u0928\u093f\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0923\u094d\u0923\u091a\u0947\u0924\u0938\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n|| 23||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ta\u1e41 vidy\u0101d du\u1e25kha-sanyoga-viyoga\u1e41\nyogasa\u1e45j\u00f1itam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sa ni\u015bhchayena yoktavyo\nyogo \u2019nirvi\u1e47\u1e47a-chetas\u0101 \u2014 <b>BHAGWAD GITA 4000 BC </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BG 6.23: That state of\nseverance from union with misery is known as Yog. This Yog should be resolutely\npracticed with determination free from pessimism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga implies both 1)\nattainment of bliss, and 2) freedom from misery. Krishna emphasizes both\nsuccessively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4fK5STBhdtw/W33zQNaHdKI/AAAAAAABdxI/J17nWXyOw_chrnX9MiMRj_uaR1tgODbpwCLcBGAs/s1600/dodwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"251\" data-original-width=\"201\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4fK5STBhdtw/W33zQNaHdKI/AAAAAAABdxI/J17nWXyOw_chrnX9MiMRj_uaR1tgODbpwCLcBGAs/s400/dodwnload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never allow anybody to\narm twist you to dig into your own rumination hole.. &nbsp;We need to know how to prevent healthy\nself-examination from degenerating into unproductive rumination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an important\ndifference between introspection and rumination. Time spent alone in thought\ncan be positive \u2013 a rich environment for personal growth and creativity, but it\ncan also be dangerous when we are negatively turned against ourselves.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Introspection can be a process of healthy self-reflection, examination, and\nexploration, which is good for your well-being and your brain.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The problem is that\nyour mind is not always a safe place. Every person is divided between a healthy\nattitude toward themselves that is goal-directed and life-affirming, and a\ndestructive side of themselves that can be self-critical, self-denying, paranoid,\nand suspicious. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QX_OE7v0VNc/W333vVUomCI/AAAAAAABdyA/B4l4KYPlN1UAbcdX39muo9LZRmlb0xNIQCLcBGAs/s1600/imwages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"170\" data-original-width=\"297\" height=\"228\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QX_OE7v0VNc/W333vVUomCI/AAAAAAABdyA/B4l4KYPlN1UAbcdX39muo9LZRmlb0xNIQCLcBGAs/s400/imwages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This inner critic,\n--the \u201ccritical inner voice\u201d&nbsp; can take\nover our thinking and lead to rumination. Rumination occurs when you become\ntrapped in this negative cycle of circular thinking. This type of thinking has\na strong link to depression and suicide.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we are in the\nrealistic point of view of our \u201creal self,\u201d we can have positive\nself-reflection. When we are in the point of view of our anti-self,\nexperiencing thoughts that focus on ourselves as \u201cbad,\u201d we must avoid\nruminating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gj_X3tvJIHY/W333LdxUCyI/AAAAAAABdx4/qsB_RWZE0LICuZLYUX9c25b_uLSAfM7SwCLcBGAs/s1600/dimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"159\" data-original-width=\"318\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gj_X3tvJIHY/W333LdxUCyI/AAAAAAABdx4/qsB_RWZE0LICuZLYUX9c25b_uLSAfM7SwCLcBGAs/s400/dimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Introspection is about\ngrowth, we look inward in order to learn.&nbsp;\nRumination is about getting stuck. The wheels are turning but you're not\ngetting anywhere-- other than frustrated or depressed or angry.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With introspection,\nthere is a sense that you are exploring something, considering new\nperspectives, and are more aware of feelings. Rumination feels like not just\ngoing in circles, but also digging yourself further into your distressed\nfeelings.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EMCTCJxMvtk/W336O2tq2eI/AAAAAAABdyM/L1mXrINaT141EGofaYQaYdgX9dZtQPRsQCLcBGAs/s1600/iemages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EMCTCJxMvtk/W336O2tq2eI/AAAAAAABdyM/L1mXrINaT141EGofaYQaYdgX9dZtQPRsQCLcBGAs/s400/iemages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tools of\ncontemplation and self-reflection built into the yoga system itself. One\nexample of these tools is the collection of the yamas and niyamas, the restraints\nand observances that are the foundation and first two limbs of raja yoga (Yoga\nSutra 2:29).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">2.29\u2014 yamaniyamasanapranayamapratyaharadharanadhy\nanasamadhayo-a-shtava anggani</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moral injunctions\n(yama), fixed observances (niyama), posture (asana), regulation of breath\n(pranayama), internalisation of the senses towards their source (pratyahara),\nconcentration (dharana), meditation (dhyana) and absorption of consciousness in\nthe self (samadhi), are the eight constituents of yoga.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This sutra sets out the\neightfold path of yoga (astahgayoga), which Patanjali continues to describe in\ndetail in the remaining sutras of sadhana pada. Restraints and observances that\nare bound by tradition and lineage follow uninterruptedly in the practice of\nyoga. Although asana, pranayama and pratyahara are separate entities, they\ndepend on one another for expressing the hidden aspects of yoga. These stages,\nwhich enable the seeker to heighten in the art of yoga, are called progressive\nsadhana. Through them one achieves a higher and even more higher state. The\nfirst five aspects of yoga are individual efforts for the evolution of the consciousness,\nwhile dharana, dhyana and samadhi are the universal manifestation or the\nnatural states of yoga (yoga svaritpa). The practice of yoga is an art and\nscience dedicated to creating union between body, mind and spirit. Its\nobjective is to assist the practitioner in using the breath and body to foster\nan awareness of ourselves as individualized beings intimately connected to the\nunified whole of creation. In short it is about making balance and creating\nequanimity so as to live in peace, good health and harmony with the greater\nwhole. It is important to perform all the eight limbs successfully to attain\nthe objective of yoga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Yamas</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-harming<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truthfulness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-stealing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moderation of the\nsenses<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-possessiveness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Niyamas</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Purity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contentment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Determined self-effort<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-study<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trustful surrender to\nthe Infinite<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Efforts to practice the\nyamas and niyamas are an essential ingredient in the yogic process of\nintrospection.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we consciously quiet our attention and turn it inward to\nCONTEMPLATE&nbsp; how we are or are not\npracticing these 10 commitments, it is naturally drawn toward the most refined\npart of the mind, buddhi.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There, sensitive both to what is pure and what is\nimpure, buddhi guides us. It provides an inner sense of whether we are on the\nright track, centered within ourselves\u2014even in the face of competing\ndistractions\u2014or whether we are starting to veer off the path, and what we might\nneed to do to get back to center.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the approach we take is to align\nourselves with what we sense to be wise and true, then CONTEMPLATION will lead\nto balance and self-understanding.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For instance, if we feel angry, we can\nrespond in one of two ways: we can react and strike out in return, which will\ncause even more harm, or we can step back, take a few deep breaths, walk away,\nand CONTEMPLATE&nbsp; what triggered our anger\nand why\u2014and then work to resolve it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c67694388076766502\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_144M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_191M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/18186282541542191115\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Kuldhir</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1535034801920#c7570090182012550528\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 23, 2018 at 8:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain sir<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Email recieved from chiefminister@kerala.gov.in<br /><br />Thanks for your support.Your suggestions were noted and will be considered at appropriate time.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">PINARAYI VIJAYAN</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"http://lh3.googleusercontent.com/zFdxGE77vvD2w5xHy6jkVuElKv-U9_9qLkRYK8OnbDeJPtjSZ82UPq5w6hJ-SA=s35\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7034171040670592281\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_156M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/09736891760660028300\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">UMohan</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1535007525595#c7034171040670592281\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 23, 2018 at 12:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_156MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nAjith Sir, I received a response from Kerala Chief Minister.<br />\n<br />\nMessage: ALL ELECTRICAL OFFICERS OF MERCHANT NAVY WHO ARE ON LEAVE AND WHO HAVE RETRIED ( BUT STILL IN GOOD HEALTH ), MUST REPORT TO THEIR DISTRICT COLLECTORS FOR ELECTRICAL CONSOLIDATION ...<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">Chief Minister's response below:<br />Thanks for your support.Your suggestions were noted and will be considered at appropriate time.</span></span><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /><br />PINARAYI VIJAYAN<br />CHIEF MINISTER</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can cultivate a\nsimilar practice of CONTEMPLATION &nbsp;based\non the list of nine obstacles (antarayas) and the symptoms accompanying them,\nfound in Patanjalis Yoga Sutras 1:30\u201331..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">1.30\u2014vyadhistyanasanshayapramadalasyaviratibhrantidar\nshanalabdhabhoomikatvanavasthitatvani chittavikshepastentarayah</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Disease, inertia,\ndoubt, lack of enthusiasm, laziness, sensuality, mind-wandering, missing the\npoint.&nbsp; falling away from the state when\nobtained&nbsp; - these distractions of the\nmind are the obstacles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This sutra delineates\nthe nine obstacles or deterrents, which hinders progress and deflects the\naspirer's consciousness.&nbsp; Unhealthy\npersons cannot be Yogis. Mental laziness makes us lose all lively interest in\nthe subject, without which there will neither be the will nor the energy to\npractice. Doubts will arise in the mind about the truth of the science, however\nstrong one\u2019s intellectual conviction may be, until certain peculiar psychic\nexperiences come, as hearing, or seeing, at a distance, etc. These glimpses\nstrengthen the mind and make the student persevere. Falling away when attained.\nSome says or weeks when you are practising the mind will be calm and easily\nconcentrated, and you will find yourself progressing fast. All of a sudden the\nprogress will stop one day, and you will find yourself, as it were, stranded.\nPersevere. All progress proceeds by rise and fall.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">1.31\u2014\nduhkhadaurmanasyanggamejayatvashvasaprashvaa&nbsp;\nvikshepasahabhuvah</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Sorrow, despair,\nunsteadiness of the body and irregular breathing further distracts the citta.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are four more\ncauses of distraction - sorrow, despair or evil disposition, tremble of the\nbody and irregular or laboured breathing (&nbsp;\nhyperventilation taught by fake gurus ).&nbsp;\nThese cause further distractions which excites the mind and\nconsciousness. These hindrances are of three kinds - self-inflicted\n(adhyatmika), imbalances of elements in the body (adhibhautika) and problems\narising from fate, e.g. genetic defects (adhidaivika). They need to be fought\nand curbed through yogic disciplines. Concentration will bring perfect repose\nto mind and body every time it is practised. When the practice has been\nmisdirected, or not enough controlled, these disturbances come. Repetition of\nOm and self-surrender to the Lord will strengthen the mind, and bring fresh\nenergy. The nervous shakings will come to almost everyone. Do not mind them at\nall, but keep on practising. Practice will cure them, and make the seat firm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Obstacles</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Disease<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mental inertia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doubt<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carelessness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sloth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inability to withdraw\nfrom sense cravings<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clinging to\nmisunderstanding<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inability to reach\nhigher ground<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inability to retain the\nground that has been attained<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Symptoms</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Discouragement<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unsteady limbs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Disturbance of\ninhalation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Disturbance of\nexhalation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These obstacles\nindicate blocks in the unfolding process of yoga. They represent circumstances\nin which equanimity and concentration have been diminished and replaced by one\nor more roaming tendencies of the mind. But the nine obstacles and their\naccompanying symptoms are also opportunities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They act as food for CONTEMPLATION\n&nbsp;and supply us with questions\u2014ones to be\nanswered by our practice:&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of the nine obstacles listed above, which is the main\none keeping my practice (and my life) from being less than perfect? &nbsp;What symptoms do I notice that are holding me\nback? Identifying these tells us what to prioritize\u2014where to start, and where\nwe might need more guidance, self-effort, or a change in attitude.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the\nprocess, we start to view more clearly our own transformative journey and the\nsignposts along the way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga reminds us that\nall suffering is a teacher and that its lessons are for our upliftment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We shouldn\u2019t imagine\nthat reflective thought alone, without the other practices of yoga,\nautomatically brings productive change. In meditation, we often see our\nshortcomings as well as our potentials.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Existentially, we abide midway between\nthe two\u2014glimpsing the final goal but often falling short of it. Ultimately,\nyoga restores balance at our deepest levels. In the process, we learn to listen\nmore attentively to buddhi, the voice of our heart\u2014a voice frequently lost\namong competing inner perspectives.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga reminds us that all suffering is a\nteacher, and that its lessons are for our upliftment. With that understanding,\nwe can begin to see periods of reflection as opportunities\u2014gems of quiet,\nshining light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qglbF7VKI48/W3670eX3sjI/AAAAAAABdyg/Ym3zRsc9vKMZimzDbY5t-zZuOWE3BLH_gCLcBGAs/s1600/dsaownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_14M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1534899549250#c7808485165684526906\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 22, 2018 at 6:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_14MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK THE CM OF KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nIMPROVE THE ELECTRICALS OF ALL FLOOD SUBMERGED AREAS..<br />\n<br />\nUSE UNDERGROUND CABLES AND <span style=\"color: blue;\">INCREASE THE POWER FACTOR..</span><br />\nPower factor is the cosine of angle between voltage and current. Inductive loads generate lagging current and power factor will be lagging. Capacitive loads generate leading current and leading power factor.<br />\n<br />\nMost of the loads are combination of resistive and inductive loads. So resultant power factor will be less than one and lagging which is not good of electrical system.<br />\n<br />\nTransformer output is reduced with reduced power factor. Same capacity load with less power factor requires more current to flow. Two methods are very common - using capacitors, synchronous condensers / motors and phase shifters.<br />\n<br />\nWATCH THE VIDEO BELOW--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P5pFe-StdJw</span><br />\n<br />\nCAN ANYBODY ASK SECOND STANDARD FAIL KERALA STATE ELECTRICITY MINISTER ILLITERATE MM MANI WHAT IS POWER FACTOR ?....<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCM OF KERALA PINARAYAI VIJAYAN<br />\nG0VERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nKSEB CHAIRMAN<br />\nALL COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nDGP KERALA<br />\nIG KERALA<br />\nALL MINISTERS OF KERALA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nALL MLAs/ MPs OF KERALA<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4942584257643946852\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
