IT WAS TEDIOUS AND MIND SAPPING TO READ HIS BOOKS.<br />\n<br />\nAAA ) HERE IS THE LIST OF MAHA MERUS WHO FOOLED THE WORLD , WHOM I HAVE TRASHED INTO THE GARBAGE BIN OF THE PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nGARBAGE BUCKET LIST:<br />\n<br />\n1) BERTRAND RUSSEL<br />\n2) ROMILA THAPAR<br />\n3) IRFAN HABIB<br />\n4) NOAM CHOMSKY<br />\n5) RAMCHANDRA GUHA<br />\n6) SHELDON POLLOCK<br />\n7) SIGMUND FREUD<br />\n8) GEORG WILHELM HEGEL<br />\n9) AMARTYA SEN<br />\n10) WENDY DONIGER<br />\n11) FREIDRICH WILHELM NIETZSCHE<br />\n12) IMMANUEL KANT<br />\n13 ) BARUCH SPINOZA<br />\n14) ALBERT EINSTEIN<br />\n15) ISAAC NEWTON<br />\n16) GUGLEILMO MARCONI<br />\n17) CHARLES DARWIN<br />\n18) KARL MARX<br />\n19) MAX WEBER<br />\n20) THOMAS ALVA EDISON<br />\n21) FIBONACCI<br />\n22) BARKHA DUTT<br />\n23) ADMIRAL LN RAMDAS , WIFE LALITA AND DAUGHTER KAVITA.<br />\n24) EDWARD BERNAYS<br />\n25) JOHN DEWEY<br />\n26) GEORGE IVANOVICH GURDJEIFF<br />\n27) PETER D OUPENSKY<br />\n28) OPRAH WINFREY<br />\n29) RICHARD BANDLER AND JOHN GRINDER<br />\n30) CHRISTIANE AMANPOUR<br />\n31) STEPHEN HAWKING<br />\n32) SIDNEY HOOK<br />\n33) ALFRED KINSEY<br />\n34) BARACK OBAMA<br />\n35) AYN RAND<br />\n36) <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>WILHELM WUNDT</b></span><br />\n<br />\nNOTE: MENTAL MIDGETS LIKE ROMILA THAPAR , IRFAN HABIB , RAMACHANDRA GUHA, SHELDON POLLOCK, WENDY DONIGER , BARKHA DUTT , RAMDAS FAMILY MUST BE THANKFUL THAT THEY ARE INCLUDED AMONG A LIST OF CEREBRAL GIANTS<br />\n<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nBBB ) HERE ARE PEOPLE WHO MADE A DENT IN THE UNIVERSE\u2014 THEY GET THE \"VADAKAYIL PRIZE\". THIS IS NOT A VESTED \u201cNOBEL PRIZE \u201c<br />\n<br />\n1) NIKOLA TESLA<br />\n2) DIMITRI MENDELEYEEV<br />\n3) IE IRODOV<br />\n4) ARYABHATTA<br />\n5) SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN<br />\n6) CHANAKYA<br />\n7) ADI SHANKARACHARYA<br />\n8) APOLLONIUS ( AN INDIAN SAGE \u2013WHO LEGACY WAS SHIFTED ON TO A COOKED UP JESUS IN 325 AD )<br />\n9) \"JOHN DOE\"<br />\n10) JULIAN ASSANGE<br />\n11) SWAMI CHINMAYANANDA<br />\n12) GARY STEPHEN WEBB<br />\n13) GEORGE ORWELL.<br />\n13) CESAR MILLAN<br />\n14) HENRY FORD.<br />\n<br />\nCCC) DOWN THE SHIT HOLE----<br />\n<br />\n1) SUHEL SETH<br />\n2) PRITISH NANDI<br />\n3) DILIP CHERIAN<br />\n4) PRANNOY JAMES ROY<br />\n5) AROON PURIE<br />\n6) VINEET JAIN<br />\n7) SHEKHAR GUPTA<br />\n8) SAGARIKA GHOSE AND HUSBAND RAJDEEP SARDESAI<br />\n9) SHOBHAA DE<br />\n10) SIDHARTH VARADARAJAN AND WIFE NANDINI SUNDAR<br />\n11) KAMALHAASAN<br />\n12) AUDREY TRUSCHKE<br />\n13) NOSTRODAMUS<br />\n14) MANI SHANKAR AIYAR<br />\n15) VERGHESE KURIEN<br />\n16) MS SWAMINATHAN<br />\n17 DEVDUTT PATTANAIK<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;WUNDT BABY-- LISTEN UP AND LISTEN GOOD&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">A GOOD PLACE TO SHOVE YOUR <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">STRUCTURALISM </span></b>WOULD BE DEEP UP YOUR CHRONS ASSHOLE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nuFARBQLx48/W3tNxu275hI/AAAAAAABduE/59i4ZocX448VUp_e9uGuychxT-j1cn9LwCLcBGAs/s1600/slEEide_2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nuFARBQLx48/W3tNxu275hI/AAAAAAABduE/59i4ZocX448VUp_e9uGuychxT-j1cn9LwCLcBGAs/s640/slEEide_2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self reflection is NOT\nrocket science -- In fact, those who take self-reflection too far can end up\nfeeling more stressed, depressed, and anxious than ever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contemplation must\naways be done when your brain is in ALPHA MODE of 7.83 Hertz.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/7000-year-old-vedic-brain-wave-theories.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/12/7000-year-old-vedic-brain-wave-theories.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anandamaya is a state\nof mind which does not change, despite anything that happens in life. With that\nstate of mind you can live with all the conditions of life. You are where you\nare, firmly rooted in your own self, but at the same time you can interact with\neveryone.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6Wgcx8-MUtk/W3u8OjaDNmI/AAAAAAABduY/q_2vqTelrno3v6KpMaimgQ8mkLn2jzDtgCLcBGAs/s1600/downlggfgoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6Wgcx8-MUtk/W3u8OjaDNmI/AAAAAAABduY/q_2vqTelrno3v6KpMaimgQ8mkLn2jzDtgCLcBGAs/s400/downlggfgoad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a gurukul when a\nmaharishi leads his pupil to Anandamaya kosha, the last words they exchange is\nAHAM BRAHMASMI,-- and they part probably never to meet again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to transport\nman by the ship of Brahma-Vidya to the farthest shore of the great ocean\n(Koshas), the Sruti says, This Atman is Brahman; Thou art That.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishads says:\n\"Aham Brahmasmi\" - \"I am Brahman, I am the totality, really I am\neverything.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-77l39A6PGvw/W3u75h-5fGI/AAAAAAABduQ/9u9qeM81vPkhVjEYYtcCf961gyvxGk3tACLcBGAs/s1600/doufvwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"189\" data-original-width=\"267\" height=\"283\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-77l39A6PGvw/W3u75h-5fGI/AAAAAAABduQ/9u9qeM81vPkhVjEYYtcCf961gyvxGk3tACLcBGAs/s400/doufvwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within anandamaya kosha\nlies the understanding that separation and ego are just an illusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the stage in\nwhich atma ( SOUL ) experiences the eternal bliss, a perfect state of peace,\ncomfort, stability and carefree nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This recognition totals\ncompassion, love and happiness-- anandamaya kosha is the bliss body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A TRUE GURU LEADS YOU\nTO YOUR OWN SOUL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Svadhyaya Yoga begins\nwith a practice of pratyahara. We turn the awareness inward and focus on the\nstate of inner being. We observe the anna maya kosha (the physical), the prana\nmaya kosha, (the pranic body), the mano-maya kosha (the emotional and\nintellectual bodies), the jnana maya kosha (the intuitive body). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/shambhavi-mudra-bypassing-amygdala-by.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/01/shambhavi-mudra-bypassing-amygdala-by.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7906824046861455063\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_162M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. The white invader converted Bharata into a MUNI ( sage ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><b>THE ANCESTOR OF PANDAVAS AND KAURAVAS WAS BHARATA ( 8165 BC ) SON OF RISHABHA (8190 BC ) AND ELDER BROTHER OF BAHUBALI</b></b></span></div>\n<br />\nThe story of Shakuntala has been added as an appendage in the Mahabharata ( Adiparva chapter ) by Jew Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nCRYPTO JEW Raja Ravi Varma who painted the non-existent Radha ( mistress of Lord Krishna ) does the honours for Shakuntala too.<br />\n<br />\nEmperor Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri Bharata is considered as the first Thirthankara. Mahavira was the 24th Thirthankara..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PUT MONKEY HANUMAN ON THE FLAG OF ARJUNAs CHARIOT.. THE REAL FLAG WAS KRISHNAs FLAG EMBLAZONED WITH VISHNUs CARRIER GARUDA..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE TEMPLE FOR HANUMAN , THE GOD OF THE DEVADASIS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; THERE IS NO NEED FOR SOME NEWSPAPER TO PUBLISH YOUR NAME IN THE LIST OF HIGHEST DONORS..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nTHE WHOLE OF INDIA CAN SEE HOW THE MALAYALAM LANGUAGE ( WHICH FOLLOWS THE SRI YANTRA LIKE SANSKRIT ) BINDS PEOPLE..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nLIKE IS NEW ORLEANS (HURRICANE KATRINA ) THERE ARE NO ROBBERS / OPPORTUNISTS PREYING ABANDONED HOMES..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nTHIS IS THE SPIRIT OF KERALA..THE CRADLE OF CIVILIZATION ( DANAVA ) WHICH PRECEDED THE VEDIC CIVILIZATION BY SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nALL PEOPLE WHO DONATE FOR KERALA FLOOD WILL BE REWARDED BY THE UNIVERSE..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nTHE ABOVE MANTRA ( <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ISOTOPE MAGIC </span></b>) IS 100% STRONG AND POSITIVE..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nIT WAS NOT AFFECT MY READERS ( OR UNKNOWN PEOPLE OR DETRACTORS ) NEGATIVELY IF THEY DONT WISH TO DONATE FOR THIS GOOD CAUSE ..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nTHIS IS ONE OFF ! FLOOD WATERS WILL DRAIN EASILY INTO THE SEA AS THE EASTERLY WIND SEA WATER BUILD UP HAS STOPPED AND TIDE IS FALLING..</span></div>\n<br />\nRESCUE PEOPLE WHO ARE MAROONED..<br />\n<br />\nPAY ATTENTION TO PREVENT DISEASE OUTBREAK..<br />\n<br />\nUSE LIQUID CHLORINE NOT BLEACHING POWDER..<br />\n<br />\nTAKE WATER SAMPLES FROM ALL OVER KERALA AND TEST IT FOR E COLI GERMS AND BACTERIA..<br />\n<br />\nOBSERVE PROPER SAMPLING PROCEDURES..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/sampling-procedures-chemical-tankers.html</span><br />\n<br />\nFloods can potentially increase the transmission of the following communicable diseases:<br />\n<br />\nWater-borne diseases, such as typhoid fever, cholera, leptospirosis and hepatitis A<br />\nVector-borne diseases, such as malaria, dengue and dengue haemorrhagic fever, etc<br />\n<br />\nDiarrhoeal diseases cause over 40 percent of the deaths in disaster and refugee camp settings.<br />\n<br />\nFloods facilitate the proliferation of rodents and the spread of Leptospires..<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nMay 15, 2018 at 8:08 PM<br />\n<br />\nWE BOUGHT AT TICKETS BY JET AIRWAYS-- VIA MAKE , MY TRIP DO COM..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WITHOUT MY SANCTION THEY HAVE CHARGED ME FOR INSURANCE ( PRIVATE COMPANY), A VAST PERCENTAGE OF THE AIR TICKET...<br /><br />I HAVE NOT CHOSEN ANY INSURANCE --LEAVE ALONE SOME GERMAN JEW APOLLOMUNICH INSURANCE COMPANY..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n###################################<br />\n<br />\nrelay@apollomunichinsurance.com<br />\nAttachments7:53 PM (1 minute ago)<br />\nto me, mmt.adkv, amhitravel<br />\n<br />\nDear Traveler,<br />\nWelcome to the Apollo Munich family! We thank you for choosing Apollo Munich Domestic Travel Insurance -specially designed for MakeMyTrip customers. Please find attached your Certificate of Insurance with this e-mail.<br />\n<br />\nWe suggest you to please take a print of this Certificate of Insurance and keep it with you during travel for your reference.<br />\n<br />\nPlease Note : The age of each of the insured member must be between 6 months and 70 years only on the date of travel.<br />\n<br />\nTo view or download the full Terms and Conditions of your Insurance Policy, please click here.<br />\n<br />\nApplies to Air Travelers only.For your convenience , we would like to bring to your kind notice that in order to process claims arising due to 1) Loss of Checked in Baggage 2) Flight &amp; Trip Delays , Apollo Munich Insurance Company will require a written confirmation from the respective Airline confirming that the baggage lost was checked in &amp; mentioning the duration of the said loss/delay. The confirmation should have the seal and signature of the competent airline authority specifically confirming the flight number, passenger name, PNR, Travel Date and the hours of delay. This is a mandatory document and needs to be attached along with the claim form for processing of claims. All claims will be settled as per the terms and conditions of the policy.<br />\n<br />\nWe wish you a safe and pleasant journey!<br />\n<br />\nBest Wishes,<br />\nApollo Munich Insurance Company Limited<br />\n########################################<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS THE MODI GOVT AND MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATAION ALLOWING THIS SCAM ?<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WHY ARE JEWISH INSURANCE COMPANIES FLEECING INDIAN PASSENGERS ?..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IF PRIVATE INSURANCE COMPANIES ARE COMPULSORY -- DOES THE PASSENGER NOT HAVE A CHOICE TO TAKE AN INDIAN INSURANCE COMPANY?</span></b><br />\nWANT ANOTHER EXAMPLE ?<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/credit-card-fraud-by-yatra-dot-com-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF --<br />\nMINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nSURESH PRABHU--<br />\nFINANCE MINISTER<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL..<br />\nCBI HQ<br />\nCBI DIRECTOR<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES .<br />\nJET AIRWAYS CHAIRMAN<br />\n<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_186MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_186BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Do not just increase the THICKNESS of the fuse wire.<br />\n<br />\nImmediately after energizing, check all medium-voltage equipment for the presence of PD activity using ultrasonic sensors to detect surface problems and TEV sensors to detect internal component or apparatus flaws.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nCM PINARAYI VIJAYAN<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISRY<br />\nK ALPHONS<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nELECTRICITY MINISTER OF KERALA<br />\nALL DISTRICT COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nALL MINISTERS OF KERALA</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3026127852537544134\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_163TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_163TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_163B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7352925475100776160\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_163M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1534844148120#c7352925475100776160\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 21, 2018 at 3:05 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_163MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nChlorine inactivates a microorganism by damaging its cell membrane. Once the cell membrane is weakened, the chlorine can enter the cell and disrupt cell respiration and DNA activity (two processes that are necessary for cell survival).<br />\nLiquid chlorine is cheap and can eliminate an overload of pathogens relatively quickly.<br />\nChlorine effective against algae.. In swimming pools if you put bleaching powder instead of Chlorine algae which harbor pathogens build up..<br />\nChlorination is able to provide a residual to reduce the chance of pathogen regrowth in water.. Certain pathogens, namely protozoan cysts, are resistant to the effects of chlorine. In Kerala right now after massive floods this is irrelevant.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3596864806745046819\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_169M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1534899356477#c708375956938044693\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 22, 2018 at 6:25 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_13MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK THE CM OF KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nIMPROVE THE ELECTRICALS OF ALL FLOOD SUBMERGED AREAS..<br />\n<br />\nUSE UNDERGROUND CABLES AND INCREASE THE POWER FACTOR..<br />\n<br />\nPower factor is the cosine of angle between voltage and current. Inductive loads generate lagging current and power factor will be lagging. Capacitive loads generate leading current and leading power factor.<br />\n<br />\nMost of the loads are combination of resistive and inductive loads. So resultant power factor will be less than one and lagging which is not good of electrical system.<br />\n<br />\nTransformer output is reduced with reduced power factor. Same capacity load with less power factor requires more current to flow. Two methods are very common - using capacitors, synchronous condensers / motors and phase shifters.<br />\n<br />\nWATCH THE VIDEO BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P5pFe-StdJw<br />\n<br />\nCAN ANYBODY ASK SECOND STANDARD FAIL KERALA STATE ELECTRICITY MINISTER ILLITERATE MM MANI WHAT IS POWER FACTOR ?....<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCM OF KERALA PINARAYAI VIJAYAN<br />\nG0VERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nKSEB CHAIRMAN<br />\nALL COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nDGP KERALA<br />\nIG KERALA<br />\nALL MINISTERS OF KERALA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nALL MLAs/ MPs OF KERALA<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4942584257643946852\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. DO NOT RELEASE DAM WATERS TODAY DURING DAYLIGHT..<br />\n<br />\nUSE THE DAYLIGHT PERIOD FROM THURSDAY SUNRISE TO SUNSET FOR TAKING OUT ALL FLOOD WATER DAMP STUFF, TO WASH IT AND DRY IT--TO PREVENT FUNGUS AND MOSS.<br />\n<br />\nELECTRICAL MOTORS OF WELL SUBMERGED MUST BE DISCARDED AND NEW ONES FITTED.. THE OLD ONES CAN BE LATER OPENED UP, CLEANED WITH GAMLIN TYPE ELECTRICAL SOLVENTS , INSULATION RESISTANCE IMPROVED AND SOLD AS CHEAP RECONDITIONED MOTORS ..<br />\n<br />\nUSE THE DAY FOR DISEASE PREVENTION..AND ELECTRICAL CONSOLIDATION..<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT PAY COMPENSATION TO HOUSES BUILT ILLEGALLY IN PADDY LANDS AND RIVER BANKS.. She had come to my house at Calicut with her husband for a 2 day holiday .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is what she told me.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">My wife was always a class leader and later on the school leader. Whenever the nuns at Auxilium convent, wanted to give a bad girl who was heading for hell , a good role model , it would be my wife.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These nuns , due to sexual repression were very MEAN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They would NOT allow the girls to touch the walls, in as much as even while climbing the stairs they had to be in the middle with hands tucked in.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So that had this school march past in Mumbai.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When they went for a dress rehearsal for this republic day parade , with dozens of other schools, some boys jeered loudly when the Auxilium contingent marched past.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This was put to a debate, with my wife mediating , not like Arnab Goswami , who will push his opinion ahead of others, even as a debate moderator. I wish I had a tete a tete with this man on national TV. I can cure his self obsession in just 5 minutes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">One good lookin' Catholic girl ( most of the group were Catholics ) , cried copious tears and was disconsolate .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She was of ze humble but firm opinion that all other girls from other schools were smartly turned out, while the Auxlium girls were NOT.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And to add to her woes hey boy friend was the leader of the hooting party.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When asked to be more objective\u2014the girl said , that other school girls wore miniskirts, while Auxilium convent girls, wore their bottom hems 2 inches below the mangy knees.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">So my wife took an instant decision.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hundreds of safety pins would be procured- el pronto .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As soon as the nuns left them alone , as the girls moved to the huge march past ground. Every girl would shorten the next girl\u2019s skirt by folding it inwards and pinning with six pins, to observe thigh display parity with other school girls.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They practiced it , so that they would do it in less than 2 minutes .</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, my wife was the leader with the school flag.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The same rowdy boys clapped and whistled in appreciation when the real march past took place.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And all including the chief guest were wondering , what the fu#k happened . They thought that the Auxilium contingent would be the prettiest, and indeed they were.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NUNS GOT WILD AND FROTHED FROM THEIR MOUSTACHED MOUTHS AND PROBABLY THEIR PANTILESS TWATS TOO, FOR GOOD MEASURE \u2014 SURELY THERE IS NO PLACE IN HEAVEN FOR SUCH WANTON GIRLS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Every girl was SEVERELY scolded , with my wife bearing the brunt , about how Jesus is so angry with them. They felt let down that my wife who was a graceful role model , was in cahoots .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All the girls were arbitrarily suspended from school and their parents had to come the next day.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parents had their own dress rehearsal. Some of them were IAS, some police, some lawyers, some even MLA s and media giants .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parents decided to go for scorched earth tactics--on the advise of a high court lawyer .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They would threaten to get the school shut down , by creating a stink in the media with demand for the PMS ridden head mistress nun to be sacked.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Needless to say, the nuns had weak hearts and less faith in their Lord, when the chips were down .</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The fall out was that my wife was sacked as the school leader - rather she declined the job .&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But when the annual prize distribution came, my wife got the most thunderous ovation, pissing off the holy , but MEAN nuns.</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So poor wife of Capt Ajit Vadakayil\u2014she does NOT have a mind of her own, she is a slave, she will be a bad mother in law, right?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_104B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c883203796410833733\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_104M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535325967587#c883203796410833733\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 27, 2018 at 4:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_104MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MY READERS WANT ME TO PEN THE \"VADAKAYIL REPORT\" TO SUPERSEDE THE \"GADGIL REPORT\" AND THE \"KASTURIRANGAN REPORT\"..</span></div>\n<br />\nWELL PADMA BHUSHAN MADHAV GADGIL , PADMA VIBHUSHAN KRISHNASWAMI KASTURIRANGAN ARE STILL ALIVE AND THEY HAVE BEEN GIVING RIDICULOUS SOUND BYTES ON TV , ABOUT LANDSLIDES AND KERALA FLOODS ALONG WITH PADMA VIBHUSHAN MS SWAMINANTHAN..<br />\n<br />\nWELL FIRST LET ME DESCRIBE MS SWAMINATHAN , THE FATHER OF THE \"GREEN REVOLUTION\".. THIS DESH DROHI IS THE REASON WHY INDIA LOST ITS HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND LOST 90% OF LAKES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAKES SURVIVED FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS IN PRISTINE CONDITON , AND WERE DECIMATED IN JUST 55 YEARS BY THE GREEN REVOLUTION WHICH GAVE US TOXIC ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nMADHAV GADGIL BEHAVING LIKE AN OUTRAGES VIRGIN , MUST KNOW THAT QUARRYING HAS NOTING TO DO WITH LANDSLIDES..THERE HAS BEEN NO LANDSLIDES IN THE VICINITY OF QUARRIES IN KERALA DURING THESE RECENT FLOODS..<br />\n<br />\nAN AVALANCHE OF SNOW CAN BE SET OFF BY A MERE SONIC BOOM OF A FIGHTER JET FLYING OVER THE MOUNTAIN.<br />\nINDUCED SESMICITY CAUSED BY MAN MADE DAM RESERVOIRS ARE THE MAJOR REASON FOR LANDSLIDES IN KERALA\u2026 AND THE REASON WHY MANY DAM WALLS COLLAPSED WITH MAJOR LOSS OF LIFE ALL AROUND THE PLANET..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN MERCANTILE MARINE DEPT, THE DIRECTOR GENERAL OF SHIPPING AND SHIPPING MINISTER MUST KNOW THAT MANY IRON ORE SHIPS WHICH LOADED IRON ORE AT PARADIP HAVE SUNK AT SEA WITH TOTAL LOSS OF LIFE..<br />\n<br />\nPARADIP DOES NOT HAVE THE MEANS TO TRIM THE PILE OF IRON ORE WHICH IT LOADS INTO THE SHIPS HOLDS..THE ANGLE OF REPOSE WAS TOO HIGH AND THE ORE SHIFTED DURING ROLLING IN HEAVY SEAS..<br />\n<br />\nHUNDREDS OF ORE SHIPS CARRYING CONCENTRATES HAVE SUNK.. WHEN THE POWERS THAT BE GOVERNING SHIPPING MADE NO EFFORTS ,<br />\n<br />\nI AS A YOUNG CAPTAIN HAS MY OWN RULES FOR MY SHIP.. THIS IS NARRATED IN THE BLOGPOST BELOW\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHERE THERE IS EXCESSIVE RAIN LIKE THE EL NINO POWERED RAINS WHICH CAUSED THE FLOODS IN KERALA CERTAIN SOILS HOLD TOO MUCH MOISTURE .. WHEN THE SOIL GETS SATURATED IT JUST FLOWS DOWN SLOPE LIKE A RIVER , WHICH IS CALLED LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS A YOUTUBE VIDEO OF SUCH A LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=czVJ6MNgE8E</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SLOPE DOES NOT HAVE TO BE TO STEEP IF DEEP ROOTED VEGETATION IS REMOVED WHICH BINDS COLLUVIUM TO BEDROCK.<br />\n<br />\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH HIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS. AS THE TOP PERMEABLE SOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES THEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<br />\n<br />\nFOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL ACUITY TO DELCARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY. THERE WILL ALWAYS BE A TRIGGER LIKE RAIN WATER STURATION OR A SEISMIC TREMOR ( IN CASE THERE IS NO RAIN ). EVEN THUNDER CAN CAUSE A LANDSLIDE.<br />\n<br />\nIN KODUGU DISTRICT THIS BLOGSITE HAS WARNED OF GROUND WATER PRESSURE FROM UNDERNEATH TRIGGERING LAND SLIDES AND HAS ASKED PEOPLE TO RUN IF THEY SEE WATER FOUNTAINS ENAMANTING FROM THE GROUND.<br />\n<br />\nA THIXOTROPIC MATERIAL SUCH AS MUD CAN CHANGE INTO A GEL OR SOL BY ADDING WATER OR PRESSURE OR SHAKING . IT GOES FROM BEING STABLE ONE MINUTE TO FLUID THE NEXT MINUTE ( THE REASON WHY ORE CONCENTARE SHIPS SANK )<br />\n<br />\nI ASK \u2013WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ARE THESE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">DON\u2019T WE HAVE TRAINED AND INTELLIGENT PEOPLE IN INDIA.. WHAT ARE OUR THINK TANKS WORTH..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_104BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedERLcD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_103T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535420216520#c2160380466037972725\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 28, 2018 at 7:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_183MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Juc6_of_A-s</span><br />\n<br />\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH HIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS.<br />\n<br />\nAS THE TOP PERMEABLE SOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES THEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">FOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL ACUITY TO DECLARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWATER ACTS AS A LUBRICANT BETWEEN TWO LAYERS OF SOIL..<br />\n<br />\nHOUSES AND ARTERIAL ROADS CAN BE PROTECTED BY WATCHING THE VIDEO ABOVE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I WILL BE PENNING A BLOG NAMED \" VADAKAYIL REPORT\" WHICH WILL SUPERCEDE THE GADGIL AND KASTURIRANGAN REPORTS...</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE ABOVE COMMENT IS MOST CRITICAL.. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535714446665#c8111759016671708497\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 31, 2018 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME --IF I HAVE BEEN A BIT HARSH WITH OUR PDAMA AWARD HEROES MADHAV GADGIL AND K KASTURIRANGAN.<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN --- IF I GO HAMMER AND TONGS AFTER THE, THEY WILL BE COVERED WITH SHIT AND PEOPLE WILL THROW STONES AT THEM. ECOLOGISTS MUST NOT DEVELOP THE OSTRICH SYNDROME..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS--ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE?<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA AS A CHEMICAL TANKER SHIP CAPTAIN, IF I GO TO MY SHORE BOSSES WITH A PROBLEM WITHOUT AN ATTACHED SOLUTION, IT GOES AGAINST ME ..<br />\n<br />\nIF MY ATTACHED SOLUTION IS LATER PROVED TO BE HOGWASH I WILL NOT GET MY NEXT CONTRACT.<br />\n<br />\nIF I GO GHADI GHADI TO THEM WITH PROBLEMS ND ZERO ATTACHED SOLUTIONS --MY RELIEVER WILL LAND UP WITHOUT WARNING AT THE NEXT PORT..<br />\n<br />\nHAS OUR NGT EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE ?<br />\n<br />\nACCOUNTABLITY IS NOT ONLY WHAT WE DO , BUT ALSO WHAT WE DO NOT DO--FOR WHICH WE ARE ACCOUNTABLE.<br />\n<br />\nOUR GRUESOME TWOSOME MADHAV GADGIL AND K KARURIRANGAN HAS TURNED A NELSONs EYE TO THE BIGGEST ECOLOGICAL PROBEM IN KUTTANAD --THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nKUTTANAD WENT UNDER FLOODS ONLY BECAUSE OF RAMPANT LAND RECLAMATION OF VEMBABAND LAKE...THIS MASSIVE ENCROACHMENT STARTED DURING THE WHITE INVADERS RULE WITH HELP OF OF CHURCH FOR THE RICH LAND OWNING CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br />\n<br />\nCHRISTIAN CONVERT FISHERMEN WANTED TO CATCH NICE BRACKISH WATER FISH WITHOUT VENTURING INTO SEA, KEEPING THEIR ASSES SAFE IN PLACID WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nWHY HAS THE GRUESOME TWOSOME NOT SAY A SINGLE WORD ABOUT THANEERUKKOM BUND AND THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY ?</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">Over 1.7 million people live on the banks of the Vembanad lake and are directly or indirectly dependent on it for their livelihoods</span></div>\n<br />\nTHE THANNERMUKKOM BUND WAS FOR THE RICH CHRISTIAN CONVERT LANDOWNERS TO CULTIVATE PADDY CROPS THREE TIMES A YEAR INSTEAD OF TWO AND MAXIMISE PROFITS. THIS BUND HAS CREATED EXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">NETHERLANDS&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL .</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nThe bund has caused deterioration of fish varieties in the region and the fishermen opposed to the bund.<br />\n<br />\nThe bund has also disrupted the harmony of the sea with the backwaters and has caused problems not foreseen before the bund like the omniprescence of the water weeds.<br />\n<br />\nEarlier the salt water tends to cleanse the backwaters but this does not happen any more leading to the pollution of the backwaters and the entire land near by.<br />\n<br />\nKuttanad region has the lowest altitude in India, and is one of the few places in the world where farming is carried around between four to ten feet below sea level. Rice grown in saline waters is not good for heath.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of FRESH WATER paddy cultivation in Kuttanad can be traced back for millenniums<br />\n<br />\nI will write in more detail later<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE ASK GADGIL BABY AND KASTURIRANGAN BABY--WHY IS KUTTANAD STILL UNDER WATER? PRAY --PRITHEE ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: bold;\">IT DID NOT ACCOUNT FOR HIGHWATER SPRING TIDES, SEAWATER LEVEL RISE DUE TO ADVERSE WINDS OF LONG FETCH , EL NINO POWERED SEVERE RAINS , SUDDEN RELEASE OF DAM WATERS ETC&nbsp;</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_50BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br />\n<!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id=\"_x0000_t75\"\n coordsize=\"21600,21600\" o:spt=\"75\" o:preferrelative=\"t\" path=\"m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe\"\n filled=\"f\" stroked=\"f\">\n <v:stroke joinstyle=\"miter\"/>\n <v:formulas>\n  <v:f eqn=\"if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @0 1 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum 0 0 @1\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @2 1 2\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @3 21600 pixelWidth\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @3 21600 pixelHeight\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @0 0 1\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @6 1 2\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @7 21600 pixelWidth\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @8 21600 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @7 21600 pixelHeight\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @10 21600 0\"/>\n </v:formulas>\n <v:path o:extrusionok=\"f\" gradientshapeok=\"t\" o:connecttype=\"rect\"/>\n <o:lock v:ext=\"edit\" aspectratio=\"t\"/>\n</v:shapetype><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_1\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1026\" type=\"#_x0000_t75\"\n alt=\"Description: https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\"\n style='width:26.25pt;height:26.25pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image001.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"*\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" height=\"35\" src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image001.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_1\" width=\"35\" /><!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: 6.0pt;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\"><span style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span></a></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535871574594#c8318280190062080305\"><span style=\"color: #888888;\">September 2, 2018 at 12:29 PM</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: 13.5pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\">IN FUTURE NO MAJOR DAM\nMUST RELEASE WATER WITHOUT FILLING UP A RISK ASSESSMENT FORM , SIGNED , FILED\nAND SCAN SENT BY EMAIL TO PROPER AUTHORITIES ..<br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\nSUDDEN UNCONTROLLED RELEASE WITHOUT WARNING IS THE REASON WHY KERALA HAS\nSUFFERED MORE THAN 400 DEATHS AND 30,000 CRORES IN DAMAGES..<br />\n<br />\nYET OUR RULERS PROTECT THE GUILTY\u2026. ARE WE MONKEYS OR HUMANS ?.. WHO DO WE\nPRETEND TO SLEEP AND EXPECT OTHERS TO WAKE US UP?...<br />\n<br />\nWE ALL SAW HOW SECOND STANDARD FAIL KERALA MINISTER MM MANI CAME ON TV TO GIVE\nRIDICULOUS AND FRIVOLOUS SOUND BYTES ABOUT CHERUTHONI DAM WATER RELEASE..<br />\n<br />\nDAMS MUST NOT OPERATE AS SILOS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM MUST CONTAIN THE WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS WHICH CAN\nFLOOD THE HINTERLAND .. IT MUST INDICATE IF THOSE NERBY DAM SHUTTERS ARE OPEN\nOR MAY BE OPENED IN AN IMMINENT MANNER .. THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVELS OF OTHER\nDAMS MUST BE WRITTEN DOWN IN THIS RISK ASSESSMENT FORM..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM ( AND ATTACHED CHECK LIST ) MUST CONTAIN INFORMATION\nABOUT HIGH WATER SPRING TIDES AND RISE OF SEA WATER LEVEL DUE TO LONG PERIODS\nOF SEA TO SHORE WINDS ( LONG FETCH ) WHICH RAISE THE SEA WATER LEVEL.PROBABILTY\nOF LONG PERIODS OF HEAVY RAIN DUE TO EL NINO..AS WHAT HAPPENED IN 1997 IN 2018\n.<br />\n<br />\nDURING EL NINO YEAR THERE WILL BE NO HURRICANES IN THE ATLANTIC OCEAN WHILE\nPACIFIC OCEAN HURRICANES INCREASE DRASTICALLY..<br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n<br />\nNO NEW DAM MUST BE CONSTRUCTED WITHOUT DESILTING FACILITIES\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT A TRANSPARENT WEBSITE WHICH TELL US HOW MUCH MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA HAVE\nBEEN SILTED .. WHY RE WE HIDING THIS.. THERE MUST BE A NEW MINISTRY FORMED FOR\nTHE SUBJECT OF \u201cDAM SILTATION\u201d ..<br />\n<br />\nCURRENTLY ALOST ALL DAM RESERVOIRS IN INDIA ARE SILTED TO MORE THAN 60% CAUSING\nLOSS OF WATER HOLDING VOLUME ..SUBSEQUENTLY THESE WATER LEVEL OF THESE\nRESERVOIRS HAVE BEEN RAISED INDUNDATING MORE LAND, INCREASING WATER SURFACE\nAREA , INCREASING EVAPORATION LOSSES IN A CRIMINAL MANNER ..<br />\n<br />\nUNCONTROLLED DAM WATER RELEASE IS DISASTROUS AS WHAT HAPPENED IN KERALA.. RISK\nWAS NOT ASSESSED..<br />\n<br />\nUNCONTROLLED EXPLOSION CAUSES LOSS OF LIVES ( BOMB ).<br />\n<br />\nCONTROLLED EXPLOSION HELPS MAN ( DIESEL ENGINE INTERNAL COMBUSTION ) ..<br />\n<br />\nWE DO NOT WANT ANY MORE DAMS IN ECOLOGICALLY SENSITIVE AREAS.. PATH OF NATURAL\nWATERWAYS MUST NOT BE BLOCKED ... ANCIENT FLOOD WATER DRAIN BASIS MUST NOT BE\nCONSTRUCTED OVER..<br />\n<br />\nKERALA IS LUCKY THAT WE THE PEOPLE STOPPED ARANMULA AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION\nAGAINST THE WISHES OF VESTED FOREIGN CONTROLLED CHRISTIAN FORCES, TRYING TO\nSTOP SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BY KILLING THE PAMPA RIVER..<br />\n<br />\nMUCH BEFORE MADHAV GADGIL WROTE AGAINST THE ARANMULA AIRPORT, CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL HAD WARNED -- \"DO NOT BLOCK NATURAL WATERWAYS \"..<br />\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/11/aranmula-airport-kerala-mindless-rape.html</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI\nVIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY OF KUTTANAD ( VEMBANAD LAKE ) WITH THE HELP OF\nEXPERTS FROM NETHERLANDS WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL ..NETHERLANDS IS BELOW\nSEA LEVEL LIKE KUTTANAD AND THEY ARE DYKE EXPERTS..</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS\nILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND\nSAND BARS ..CAUSING KUTTANAD THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA TO GO UNDER WATER..</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">THE THANNERMUKKOM BUND\nWAS FOR THE RICH CHRISTIAN CONVERT LANDOWNERS TO CULTIVATE PADDY CROPS THREE\nTIMES A YEAR INSTEAD OF TWO AND MAXIMISE PROFITS... THIS BUND HAS CREATED\nEXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS..<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER 17 LAKH PEOPLE LIVE ON THE BANKS OF THE VEMBANAD LAKE AND THEIR LIVES\nARE DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY DEPENDENT ON IT FOR SURVIVAL AND LIVELIHOOD.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nDO A PROPER ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS \u2013WHY KUTTANAD WATER IS NOT DRAINING OUT TO SEA\nEVEN DURING LOW WATER NEAPS AND PLACID ARABIAN SEA WATERS. ..LOCAL EXPERTS MUST\nBE CALLED FOR A BRAIN STORMING.. AND THEIR INFORMATION MUST BE GIVEN TO THE\nDUTCH TEAM..<br />\n<br />\nLOCAL EXPERTS ARE NOT BEAURAUCRATS --- THEY HAVE TO BE EXPERIENCED FARMERS WITH\nA STAKE ..<br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n<br />\nKERALA HAS LOST ALL HER WATER COLLECTION BASINS DUE TO CHRISTIAN , MUSLIM AND\nCOMMIE POLITICAL PARTIES GIVING AWAY PADDY LANDS FOR PARTY CADRE TO BUILD\nHOUSES ILLEGALLY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DAM RIVERS EXCESSIVELY, NO RIVER WATER FLOWS TO THE SEA \u2013 LIKE CAUVERY\nIN TAMIL NADU.. THIS CAUSES SALT WATER INTRUSION INTO COASTAL AQUIFERS AND\nFISHERMEN TO SHAMELESSLY STEAL FISH FROM SRI LANKAN WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS LIKE MADHAV GADGIL / K\nKASTURIRANGAN\u2014AND PATHETIC NGT -- ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING\nFINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE? ..<br />\n<br />\n</span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">DO THESE SO CALLED EXPERTS\nEVEN KNOW OF THE TERM \u201c DAM RESERVOIR INDUCED SISEMCITY \u201c WHICH CAUSES LAND\nSLIDES?..</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n<br />\nDO THEY EVEN KNOW THE MEANING OF A SOLITION WAVE CAUSED BY A LANDSLIDE INTO A\nDAM RESERVOIR.. IN BANASURA SAGAR DAM RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR YOU CAN SEE THE\nSIGNS OF PAST LANDSLIDES..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO SACK ALL IN IMD AND INFUSE FRESH BLOOD WHO ARE TRAINED ABROAD IN\nWEATHER PREDICTIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECARED 2018 AS A EL NINO YEAR , A FULL WEEK BEFORE THE\nKERALA FLOODS AND WARNED AGAINST LAST MINUTE EMERGENCY FLOOD WATER RELEASE..\nTHIS IS ON RECORD EVEN IN PMO..<br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n<br />\nWE MUST STOP THIS RIDICULOUS PRACTICE OF BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL\nAND BOTTOM OF THE LOSER LAWYERS POOL \u201cLAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES&nbsp; \u201d</span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">SUPERIMPOSING THE BLUE PRINT OF THE CONSTITUTION\nON TOP OF COMPLEX TECHNICAL CALCULATIONS \u2014WERE IS THE INTELLIGENCE IN THIS ?.</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\">. ARE WE DONKEYS ?..<br />\n<br />\nMUCH BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS I HAD DONE COMPLEX CALCULATIONS AND DEMANDED THAT\nMULLAPERIAR DAM WATER MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO BUILD UP TO 141 FEET..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU BUILD EXCESSIVE DAMS ( POLITICIANS MAKING MONEY ) ON THE UPPER REACHES\nOF A RIVER , THE LOWER PART OF THE RIVER IS STARVED OF WATER..<br />\n<br />\nWATER FLOW IN LOWER PARTS OF A RIVER IS A MUST AS THEY RECHARGE AQUIFERS\nHUNDREDS OF MILES AWAY FROM THE RIVER BANKS..TODAY THESE UNDERGROUND RIVER\nCHANNELS ARE ALL BLOCKED DUE TO DISUSE..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO WE HAVE MAIN STREAM MEDIA WHO ARE FIT ONLY TO TALK ABOUT POTHOLES? WHY\nDOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO DO THE JOB OF THE STUPID INDIAN MAIN STREAM MEDIA\n?<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE , PM MODI WANTED TO KILL BHARATMATA BY RIVER INTERLINKING AND THAT TOO\nUSING HIS WHITE JEW MASTERS IN ISRAEL\u2014 ISRAEL HAS GOT THOUSANDS OF MIGHTY\nRIVERS , RIGHT? BRAAAYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\n</span><b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt;\">GANGES CANNOT BE\nCLEANED UNLESS THE RIVER WATER FLOWS ..</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\n<br />\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html<br />\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 13.5pt;\"><br />\nWE ASK VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI\u2014TAKE CARE OF BHARATMATA . WE DON\u2019T NEED ANY MORE\nJAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR..<br />\n<br />\nENOUGH IS ENOUGH..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1506808177676703967\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_39M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535982742368#c1506808177676703967\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 3, 2018 at 7:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_39MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FINALLY WHAT I HAVE WARNED AGAINST REPEATEDLY OVER THE PAST TEN DAYS HAS HAPPENED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ACCUSES THE KERALA HEALTH MINISTER FOR NEGLIGENCE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Calicut now has 18 cases of Leptospirosis..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Estimates from the World Health Organisation (WHO) suggest a worldwide incidence of 1.2 million cases per year with up to 60,000 deaths.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">After floods in tropics Leptospirosis always happens --it is the No 1 disease --all doctors know this.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is the commonest zoonotic infection worldwide but is vastly underreported</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The cause of leptospirosis is bacteria (genus Leptospira and species interrogans), a Gram-negative spirochete (spiral-shaped bacteria).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The disease is transmitted through drinking water contaminated with urine of infected animals, often rats. However, human-to-human transmission occurs very rarely.The disease can\u2019t be passed through the air like a cold or the flu.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The incubation period of Leptospirosis is between 5 to 14 days.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is often difficult to diagnose clinically, as it can appear to be very similar to many other diseases such as dengue, typhoid and viral hepatitis.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Leptospira bacteria can enter the body through broken skin, water-softened skin, mucous membranes (the thin moist lining of many parts of the body such as the nose, mouth, throat and genitals) or by swallowing or inhaling contaminated water.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The first phase, which usually lasts 5 to 7 days, begins suddenly with symptoms including:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">high fever</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">vomiting</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">diarrhoea</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">red eyes</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">muscle aches (especially thigh and calf muscles)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">rash</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">chills</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">headache.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">MOST RECOVER AFTER THE FIRST PHASE. THE SECOND PHASE CAN BE WEILs DISEASE.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A second phase of illness (immune phase) may follow 1 to 2 weeks later, with symptoms such as:--</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">jaundice (yellowing of the skin and eyes)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">kidney failure</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">irregular heart beat</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">lung problems</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">meningitis (inflammation of the lining of the brain)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">red eyes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In most cases, leptospirosis is unpleasant but not life-threatening, like a case of the flu. It rarely lasts more than a week. But about 10% of the time, when you have a severe form of leptospirosis, you\u2019ll get better, but then get sick again. This is called Weil\u2019s disease&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis associated with liver and kidney disease is called Weil's syndrome and is characterized by yellowing of the eyes (jaundice). Patients with Weil's syndrome can also develop kidney disease and have more serious involvement of the organs affected.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Weil's Disease can cause organ failure and death ..it is a severe form of leptospirosis he condition can lead to more extreme complications, including shortness of breath, coughing up blood, a confused mental state, seizures and a painful swelling of the liver</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis can infect almost any animal where it is harboured in the kidneys, but most commonly it is found in rats is spread by their urine. It is not known to cause any noticeable illness in rats, so populations are unaffected by high levels of infection.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">To check for leptospirosis, your doctor does a simple blood test and examines the blood for antibodies. These are organisms your body produces to fight the bacteria</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Use disinfectant. Bleach, Lysol, acid solutions, and iodine are deadly to the bacteria. Keep them on hand to clean up.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Treat water to make it safe to drink by boiling or using an appropriate chemical treatment, especially if it has been collected from a source that could be exposed to urine from animals or contaiminated by floodwater runoff.</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK THE KERALA GOVT TO STOCK UP DOXYCYCLINE AND IBUPROFEN.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis can be treated with antibiotics, including penicillin and doxycycline. Your doctor may also recommend ibuprofen for fever and muscle pain</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_39BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_37T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_39b+seedRqGD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_37TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_37M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535982781091#c7285763356076832702\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 3, 2018 at 7:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_37MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The treatment of leptospirosis involves high doses of antibiotics. Antibiotic treatment (doxycycline , penicillin) is most effective when initiated early in the course of the illness. Severely ill patients may need hospitalization for IV fluid and antibiotic treatment. Severe liver manifestations and kidney damage and even failure resulting from the infection may require intensive medical care</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Doxycycline can be used for prevention.. CRITICAL.. take 200 mg of doxycycline per week by mouth starting before and during the time period of potential exposure.It works by stopping the growth of bacteria. This is not recommended in children of less than 7 year of age</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For severe leptospirosis, intravenous penicillin G has long been the drug of choice</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Infected dogs, cats, and other pets may exhibit vomiting, refusal to eat, weight loss, decreased activity, muscle pains, or stiffness.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">If leptospirosis develops during pregnancy, the risk of miscarriage is increased.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Leptospirosis is endemic in most areas where dengue virus is transmitted and may be mistaken for dengue, which is typically more common. It is important to consider leptospirosis when dengue is diagnosed in a severely ill patient, because early antibiotics are beneficial in the treatment of leptospirosis and are not given for dengue virus infection</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Again, many different animals can harbour Leptospira bacteria in their kidneys..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">After floods , silt that has been contaminated with animal urine can be the source of infection. This is why I had recommended to douse some kerosene as soon as flood water enters the home\u2014it keeps away snakes too.</span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ASK TV STATIONS TO BROADCAST INFORMATION\u2014ONLY A DOCTOR MUST BE ALLOWED\u2014NOT POTHOLE JOURNALISTS..</span></span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I AM AFRAID I HAD TO BREAK MY POLICY OF KEEPING AWAY FROM MEDICAL STUFF IN MY BLOGS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_37MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
