max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4461961813884987804\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_64M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY IS KUTTANAD STILL FLOODED WITH WATER ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY IS THE WATER NOT BEING ABSORBED BY THE GROUND AS USUAL-- NEVER MIND THAT THE FIELDS ARE BELOW THE LEVEL OF THE SEA-- THIS IS IRRELEVANT..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">KUTTANAD IS NOW COVERED BY A LAYER oF FINE SILT , WHICH IS COLLOIDAL TOP SOIL FROM HIGHER AREAS , WHEN CAME DOWN WITH THE FLOODS..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INDIA GANDHI WAS CLEVERLY ARM TWISTED TO IMPOSE EMERGENCY IN 1975 BY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE ...AS INDIA WAS LEANING TOWARDS RUSSIA...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In June 12, 1975 verdict of the Allahabad High Court convicting then Prime Minister Indira Gandhi of electoral malpractices and debarring her from holding any elected post..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The verdict delivered by Justice Jagmohanlal Sinha, led to imposition of Emergency in India on June 25, 1975.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Justice Jagmohal Lal is infamous for his 1975 ruling in the State of Uttar Pradesh v. Raj Narain lawsuit in which he invalidated the election of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The petition challenged her election to the Lok Sabha in 1971 from the Rae Bareli parliamentary constituency in Uttar Pradesh, which MAD CAP Raj Narain had also contested..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The judgement in itself ran to 259 pages.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Indira Gandhi was declared guilty of corrupt practices and her election to the Lok Sabha was declared null and void. She was charged under Section 123(7) of the Representation of the People Act. She was also disqualified from contesting elections for six years.. The whole affair was rigged by KOSHER foreign forces, who wanted India to be under the umbrella of CIA/ MOSSAD.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">INDIRA GANDHI HAD NATIONALIZED ALL JEW ROTHSCHILDs BANKS IN INDIA.. Indira Nehru Gandhi, respondent No. 1, to the Loksabha is declared void.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The judge read the rest of the order quickly in a rambling manner and left the courtroom. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Senator Joe McCarthy\nwas absolutely right about the infiltration of white JEW COMMIES inside the\nAmerican Government back in the 1940s and 1950s.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">McCarthyism is now\nreduced to the practice of making accusations of subversion or treason without\nproper regard for evidence<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Joseph Raymond McCarthy\n(&nbsp; died 1957) was an American politician\nwho served as U.S. Senator from the state of Wisconsin from 1947 until his\ndeath in 1957. Beginning in 1950, McCarthy became the most visible public face\nof a period in the United States in which Cold War tensions fueled fears of\nwidespread&nbsp; KOSHER Communist subversion.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term\n\"McCarthyism\", coined in 1950 in reference to McCarthy's practices,\nwas soon applied to similar anti-communist activities. Today, the term is used\nin reference to what are considered demagogic, reckless, and unsubstantiated\naccusations, as well as public attacks on the character or patriotism of\npolitical opponents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2302056862913156551\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_19M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Even though it\u2019s illegal for Big\nPharma to advertise drugs in other countries, it\u2019s completely legal in North\nAmerica. The advertisements are often misleading, overstating the benefits and\ncompletely omitting the risks or potential side effects (or simply putting them\nin tiny, illegible letters).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although the FDA has stepped in multiple times,\nsending pharmaceutical companies warning letters or even forcing them to take\ndown their ads because they are false, misleading, and/or exaggerate the\neffects of their drugs, this is still an ongoing issue ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobbying expenditures\nby the pharmaceutical industry are in billions of USD.&nbsp; This money is then used to influence\nlawmakers and politicians to shape pending legislature. Big Pharma pressured the FDA to speed up their drug\napproval process, and this is what happened as a result. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In essence, war and\nchaos are profitable businesses, and they\u2019ve been used by the shadow government\nand the deep state for many years to not only take over nations, but to control\nthe masses using fear as well.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">War is often just a collaborative effort between\npowerful individuals to play out big picture plans through creating conflict\nand justifying war. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">USA became the first\nsociety in all of recorded human history to outlaw its citizens from knowing\nthe laws they live under!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The reason for the\nAmericans having so many laws they can\u2019t even count them anymore is due to what\nis called \u201cincorporated by reference\u201d (IBR)\u2014which is the act of including a\nsecond document within another document by only mentioning the second document.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Or in its simplest\nexplanation: When laws are made in America (either local, State or Federal),\nthey are actually nothing more than guidelines that then require what are\ncalled regulations (that carry the full force of law)\u2014with one of the most\nstupendous examples of this being the Internal Revenue Code that was first\nenacted in 1874 with barely 60 words\u2014but that since then, and thanks to IBR\u2019s,\nhas grown (by 2013) to contain more than 3.4 million words that if printed 60\nlines to the page would be more than 7,500 pages long!</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December of 2012 the\nECB (European Central Bank) based in Brussels was given dominion over all 6,000\nbanks of the European Union.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The European Central\nBank (ECB) is the central bank for the euro and administers monetary policy of\nthe euro area, which consists of 19 EU member states and is one of the largest\ncurrency areas in the world. It is one of the world's most important central\nbanks and is one of the seven institutions of the European Union (EU) listed in\nthe Treaty on European Union (TEU).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The capital stock of the bank is owned by\nthe central banks of all 28 EU member states. Speaking with Sverdlov, I asked in passing: \"Oh yes, and where is the Tsar?\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"Finished,\" he replied. \"He has been shot.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"And where is the family?\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"The family along with him.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"All of them?,\" I asked, apparently with a trace of surprise.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"All of them,\" replied Sverdlov. \"What about it?\" He was waiting to see my reaction. I made no reply.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"And who made the decision?,\" I asked.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"We decided it here. Ilyich believed that we shouldn't leave the Whites a live banner to rally around, especially under the present difficult circumstances.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I asked no further questions and considered the matter closed.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Yurovsky brought the Tsar and his family to a former house of a wealthy Jewish merchant named Ipatiev, now made into a prison for his captives.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In prison for over two months, just before midnight on July 17th 1918, the Jew Yurovsky brought the Imperial Family to the basement. They were told that they were going to pose for a group picture. But, the Jewish assassins, Yurovsky, Nikulin, Yermakov, Vaganov, were waiting.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; The United States had fought two bitter wars against Britain: the War of Independence and the War of 1812.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the fall of 1863, the darkest hour of the Civil War, part of the Russian fleet arrived at the ports of New York and San Francisco.<br />\n<br />\nOn September 24, 1863 the Russian Baltic fleet began to arrive in New York harbor. On October 12, the same year, the Russian Far East fleet began to arrive in San Francisco. The squadrons stayed in American waters for about seven months.<br />\n<br />\nThe average American knows nothing of the 1812 war. US President Madison strategically sought an alliance with Russia because it was the only power in Europe which could command respect from both Rothschild poodles France and England..<br />\n<br />\nRussia\u2019s support of America through czar Alexander I helped to leverage the end of the War of 1812, enabling America to become a respected power on the world stage -- a phoenix. Czar Alexander proved to the world his might in 1814, when he defeated JEW Napoleon with his Russian army and its allied forces.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1817, Czar Alexander was convinced by the Holy Synod of the Russian Church that his ticket to heaven was to convert all the Jews in Russia to Russian Orthodoxy. He therefore attempted to do so by granting special privileges to those Jews who would convert.<br />\n<br />\nAlexander banned the Jews from having distilleries, which was traditionally a Jewish business. He also did not allow them to be landlords\u2019 agents for the collection of rents, another traditional Jewish line of work. He granted these rights to the Christian converts.<br />\n<br />\nHe established an organization called \u201cThe Society of Jewish Christians\u201d of which he was the patron.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">HERE IS ROTHSCHILD SIGNATURE \u2013 A 100 YEARS LATER..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; And\nit's really amazing that the most warmongering country in the history of\nmankind is put there in charge to make sure that there is peace. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The United Nations Charter tells you how you\ncan proceed to reform it. They say you have to call a general conference, and\nhow you have to call it, and the approval that you have to have from the\nSecurity Council. But at the end, when all is said and done, when you have\ndecided what reforms you want to make, they have a veto power over it. So it's\na farce. It's a fraud.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United Nations is\nbeyond reform. It's beyond patchwork. It's the most important organization in\nthe world to help save the human species and Mother Earth, but it has to be\nreinvented.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The UN's Agenda 21\nproposes a global regime that will monitor, oversee, and strictly regulate our\nplanet's oceans, lakes, streams, rivers, aquifers, sea beds, coastlands,\nwetlands, forests, jungles, grasslands, farmland, deserts, tundra, and\nmountains. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It even has a whole\nsection on regulating and \"protecting\" the atmosphere. It proposes\nplans for cities, towns, suburbs, villages, and rural areas. It envisions a\nglobal scheme for healthcare, education, nutrition, agriculture, labor,\nproduction, and consumption - in short, everything. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is nothing on,\nin, over, or under the Earth that doesn't fall within the purview of some part\nof Agenda 21.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;UN Agenda 21/Sustainable Development is the\naction plan implemented worldwide to inventory and control all land, all water,\nall minerals, all plants, all animals, all construction, all means of\nproduction, all energy, all education, all information, and all human beings in\nthe world.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Agenda 21 is Deep\nState. What does Deep State mean? Deep State is basically a \u2018hidden body of\ngovernment that influences and opposes official U.S. policies. Why is Agenda 21\nconsidered to be Deep State?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Because it was passed via treaties and\nexecutive order 12852(Presidential Council on Sustainable Development) in US\nminus congressional approval involving an intergovernmental organization known\nas the UN(that's one of your hidden bodies of government) without the American\npeople\u2019s approval. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its policies and\nprocedures are being forced on the citizens without their knowledge and does\nnot serve in their best interest, but rather serves the establishment of one\nworld government stripping the country of its sovereign rights<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.N. Agenda 21\nadopted in 1992 and signed by 178 countries has morphed into Agenda 2030\nadopted in 2015 with its 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) and 169\n\u201cspecific targets.\u201d&nbsp; it is a recipe for\n\u201cglobal socialism and corporatism/fascism\u201d foisted upon the world by the United\nNations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sustainable\nDevelopment \u201cpartnerships\u201d include some corporations both domestic and\nmultination. They in turn are partnered with the politicians who use their\nlegislative and administrative powers to raid the treasury to fund and enforce\nthe scheme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course, as the\nchosen corporations, which become a new elite, stamp out the need for\ncompetition through government power, the real loser is the consumers who no\nlonger count in market decisions. Government grants are now being used by\nindustry to create mandated green products like wind and solar power. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Products are put on the\nmarket at little risk to the industry, leaving consumers a more limited\nselection from which to choose. True free markets are eliminated in favor of\ncontrolled economies which dictate the availability and quality of products. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sustainablist policy is\nto oversee any issue in which man interacts with nature \u2013 which, of course, is\nliterally everything. And because the environment always comes first, there\nmust be great restrictions over private property ownership and control.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is necessary,\nSustainablists say, because humans only defile nature. Under Sustainable\nDevelopment there can be no concern over individual rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Individual human wants,\nneeds, and desires are conformed to the views and dictates of social planners.\nThe UN\u2019s Commission on Global Governance said in its 1995 report: \u201cHuman\nactivity\u2026 combined with unprecedented increases in human numbers\u2026 are impinging\non the planet\u2019s basic life support system. Action must be taken now to control\nthe human activities that produce these risks\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maurice Strong,\nChairman of the 1992 UN Earth Summit said: \u201cA shift is necessary toward\nlifestyles less geared to environmentally-damaging consumption patterns. Food and other goods for domestic\nconsumption are all imported from abroad and paid for with money borrowed from\nforeign banks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The IMF and World Bank\nare the chief pushers of the whole scheme of structural adjustments that are\ndesigned to further open up the Third World economies for penetration and\nplunder by private monopoly corporations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We call for the abrogation of all\nloan agreements that provide for structural adjustment, public assumption of\nprivate debts and the further exposure of the Third World economies to plunder\nby private multinational giants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bilderberg Group\nhas been meeting secretly behind closed doors once&nbsp; each year since its formation. Israel is a key member of the American Deep State empire.\"--Jeff\nHalper<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cComing to grips with\nU.S./CIA activities in broad numbers and figuring out how many people have been\nkilled in the jungles of Laos or the hills of Nicaragua is very difficult. But,\nadding them up as best we can, we come up with a figure of six million people\nkilled-and this is a minimum figure. We thank you for choosing Apollo Munich Domestic Travel Insurance -specially designed for MakeMyTrip customers. Please find attached your Certificate of Insurance with this e-mail.<br />\n<br />\nWe suggest you to please take a print of this Certificate of Insurance and keep it with you during travel for your reference.<br />\n<br />\nPlease Note : The age of each of the insured member must be between 6 months and 70 years only on the date of travel.<br />\n<br />\nTo view or download the full Terms and Conditions of your Insurance Policy, please click here.<br />\n<br />\nApplies to Air Travelers only.For your convenience , we would like to bring to your kind notice that in order to process claims arising due to 1) Loss of Checked in Baggage 2) Flight &amp; Trip Delays , Apollo Munich Insurance Company will require a written confirmation from the respective Airline confirming that the baggage lost was checked in &amp; mentioning the duration of the said loss/delay. The confirmation should have the seal and signature of the competent airline authority specifically confirming the flight number, passenger name, PNR, Travel Date and the hours of delay. This is a mandatory document and needs to be attached along with the claim form for processing of claims. All claims will be settled as per the terms and conditions of the policy.<br />\n<br />\nWe wish you a safe and pleasant journey!<br />\n<br />\nBest Wishes,<br />\nApollo Munich Insurance Company Limited<br />\n########################################<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS THE MODI GOVT AND MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATAION ALLOWING THIS SCAM ?<br />\n<br />\nWHY ARE JEWISH INSURANCE COMPANIES FLEECING INDIAN PASSENGERS ?..<br />\n<br />\nIF PRIVATE INSURANCE COMPANIES ARE COMPULSORY -- DOES THE PASSENGER NOT HAVE A CHOICE TO TAKE AN INDIAN INSURANCE COMPANY?<br />\nWANT ANOTHER EXAMPLE ?<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/credit-card-fraud-by-yatra-dot-com-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF --<br />\nMINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nSURESH PRABHU--<br />\nFINANCE MINISTER<br />\nFINANCE MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL..<br />\nCBI HQ<br />\nCBI DIRECTOR<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES .<br />\nJET AIRWAYS CHAIRMAN<br />\n<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_182MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_182BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_24.html?showComment=1535128930219#c6232128958494317986\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 24, 2018 at 10:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_114MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nINDIA MUST CONTINUED ON 4G..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST NOT JUMP INTO 5G..<br />\n<br />\nUntil now, mobile broadband networks have been designed to meet the needs of people. But 5G has been created with machines\u2019 needs in mind, offering low-latency, high-efficiency data transfer<br />\n<br />\nIt achieves this by breaking data down into smaller packages, allowing for faster transmission times. Whereas 4G has a fifty-millisecond delay, 5G data transfer will offer a mere one-millisecond delay\u2013it will permit machines to achieve near-seamless communication.<br />\n<br />\nThe idea behind 5G is to use untapped bandwidth of the extremely high-frequency millimeter wave (MMW), between 30GHz and 300GHz, in addition to some lower and mid-range frequencies.<br />\n<br />\nHigh-frequency MMWs travel a short distance. Furthermore, they don\u2019t travel well through buildings and tend to be absorbed by rain and plants, leading to signal interference<br />\n<br />\nThis would likely result in wireless antennas every few feet..with each emitting bursts of radiofrequency radiation (RFR)..<br />\n<br />\nIf we could see the RFR, it would look like a smog that\u2019s everywhere, all the time. They will permeate the Blood Brain Barrier, disrupt cell metabolism, rupture DNA strands, cause oxidative damage etc.<br />\n<br />\nBEES WILL BE DECIMATED..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/queen-bee-and-darwin-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nThe new 5G technology utilizes higher-frequency MMW bands, which give off the same dose of radiation as airport scanners.<br />\n<br />\nOver ninety percent of microwave radiation is absorbed by the epidermis and dermis layers, so human skin basically acts as an absorbing sponge for microwave radiation. Disquieting as this may sound, it\u2019s generally considered acceptable so long as the violating wavelengths are greater than the skin layer\u2019s dimensions. But MMW\u2019s violate this condition.<br />\n<br />\nWith millions of sweat ducts, and 5G\u2019s increased RFR needs, it stands to reason that our bodies will become far more conductive to this radiation.<br />\n<br />\nUS Department of Defense already uses a crowd-dispersal method called the Active Denial System, in which MMWs are directed at crowds to make their skin feel like it\u2019s burning, and also has the ability to basically microwave populations to death from afar with this technology if they choose to do so.<br />\n<br />\nThe Active Denial System (ADS) is a non-lethal, directed-energy weapon developed by the U.S. military, designed for area denial, perimeter security and crowd control. The weapon is also called the heat ray..<br />\n<br />\nThe ADS millimeter wave energy works on a similar principle as a microwave oven, exciting the water and fat molecules in the skin, and instantly heating them via dielectric heating.<br />\n<br />\nHuman test subjects reached their pain threshold within 3 seconds, and none could endure more than 5 seconds..<br />\n<br />\nFor the first millisecond, it just felt like the skin was warming up. Then it got warmer and warmer and you felt like it was on fire. ... As soon as you're away from that beam your skin returns to normal and there is no pain.<br />\n<br />\n5G, or \u201cFifth Generation\u201d technology promises speeds of up to 100 times faster than the current model<br />\n<br />\nIT IS TOO HEAVY A PRICE TO PAY !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nIT MINISTRY<br />\nIT MINISTER</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">BELOW:&nbsp; &nbsp;BANGALORE TIMES IS OWNED BY </span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">MIDGET VINEET JAIN</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1534424900454#c7664330454496749626\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 16, 2018 at 6:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_53MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK THE CM OF KERALA PINARAYI VIJAYAN.<br />\n<br />\nGIVE NOTICE TO ALL DISTRICT COLLECTORS OF KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS THE FLOOD EMERGENCY IN KERALA BLOWS OVER --WITHIN 30 DAYS THEY MUST PRESENT A REPORT OF THEIR OBSERVATIONS , RECOMMENDATIONS AND ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS , BUTTRESSED WITH PICTURES ..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THAT A BRAIN STORMING SESSION HAS TO BE CONVENED BY NITI AYOG, THE EX-DISTRICT COLLECTOR OF CALICUT AMITABH KANT CAN CHAIR THIS MEET..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO CREATE AN EMERGENCY MANUAL ( FLOODING ) WITH PROPER SIGNED RISK ANALYSIS / CHECKLISTS FOR RELEASING WATER FROM DAMS ..<br />\n<br />\nPLANS MUST BE LAID DOWN FOR A COMMAND AND CONTROL CENTRE .. WE WERE SHOCKED AT THE RIDICULOUS SOUND BYTES GIVEN BY MINISTER MM MANI ON TV..<br />\n<br />\nNO RAIL OR ARTERIAL ROAD OR BRIDGE MUST GET SUBMERGED IN FUTURE..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nIN FUTURE ALL HIGH RISE PRIVATE BUILDINGS MUST HAVE A HELIPAD ON TOP.. THE KERALA POLICE MUST OWN THEIR OWN DISASTER MANAGEMENT HELICOPTERS AND DRONES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE ELECTRICAL GRID OF KERALA HAS TO BE REVAMPED..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST UNDERSTAND THAT DURING EL NINO YEARS , DAMS MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO TOP UP RESERVOIRS TO MAXIMUM IN RAINY SEASON..<br />\n<br />\nDAMS OPERATORS MUST KNOW WHAT IS SPRING TIDES WHICH PREVENT WATER DRAINING OFF TO SEA.. DEATHS ARE ALWAYS CAUSED BY DAM WATER RELEASE NOT BY MERE RAINFALL..<br />\n<br />\nDEBRIS REMOVAL AND ESSENTIAL SERVICES MAINTENANCE MUST BE DISCUSSED.. ( PORTABLE GEN SETS/ DYNAMO RECHARGING MOBILE PHONE BATTERIES / FLOODED CAR ENGINE SERVICING / RAINWATER CATCHING TIPS/ LIFE JACKETS / STORM PROOF MATCHES / LIQUID CHLORINE / LIFE STOCK-PETS SAFE AREAS / DEAD CADAVER REMOVAL AND DISPOSAL ETC )<br />\n<br />\nILLEGAL CONTRUCTIONS ON RIVER BANKS/ BUILDING HOSUES IN PADDY LANDS BY BRIBING / ILLEGAL SANDMINING FROM RIVER BEDS IS THE REASON WHY KERALA IS SUFFERING..<br />\n<br />\nNO COMPENSATION MUST BE PAID TO ILLEGAL HOUSE CONSTRUCTION IN PADDY FIELDS AND RIVER SIDE VIEW PRIVATE BUILDINGS BY BRIBING..THESE PEOPLE MUST BE PUNISHED..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST CONVERT THIS DISASTER TO A \"BLESSING IN DISGUISE \" FOR LEARNING LESSONS AND GETTING OUR ACT TOGETHER .. THIS IS A WAKEUP CALL..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST NOW MOVE FROM CHEMICAL FERTILIZERS TO ORGANIC FERTILSERS --AS SOIL TOXINS HAVE BEEN WASHED AWAY..<br />\n<br />\nDIVERSION CANALS HAS TO BE PLANNED FROM CITIES ( AND AIRPORTS ) TO UNDERPOPULATED LOW LANDS ..IF THIS IS NOT THERE CONSTRUCT IT WITH PIPES AND GENERATOR BACKED PUMPS..WHEN SPRING TIDES AND ADVERSE WINDS CAUSE COASTAL SEA LEVEL BUILD UP..<br />\n<br />\nTAKE AERIAL PICTURES TO DECIDE ON STRENGTHENING OF RIVER EMBANKMENTS..PLAN ON REMOVING SILT WHICH BLOCKS FREE RIVER WATER FLOW..<br />\n<br />\nEVERY HOME FLOODED MUST BE INSPECTED AND ALL ELECTICAL OUTLETS AND PLUGS / SWITCHES RAISED ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html<br />\n<br />\nSTUPID SUPREME COURT COLLEGIUM JUDGES JUST KNOW THIS -- WHEN A DAM GETS SILTED ( ALL MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA ARE MORE THAN 60% SILTED ) , THE REMEDY IS TO DESILT--NOT MINDLESSLY RAISE THE LEVEL OF WATER IN THE RESERVOIR, AS DONE WITH MULLAPERIYAR DAM<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE CRITICAL COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nALL DISTRICT COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nKERALA HOME MINISTRY<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTER<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNGT<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit VadakayilAugust 14, 2018 at 10:53 PM<br />\nWARNING ..<br />\nWARNING ..<br />\nWARNING .<br />\n<br />\nRUSH... RUSH... RUSH...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.ndtv.com/kerala-news/torrential-rains-landslides-cause-nightmare-in-kerala-39-dead-1900524</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SUPREME COURT HAS ALLOWED THE WATER LEVEL IN MULLAPERIAR RESERVOIR TO BE RAISED TO 142 FEET 4 YEARS AGO --AS THE RESERVOIR IS SILTED.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS NOT SAFE TO RAISE THE WATER LEVEL OF THE 120 YEAR OLD DAM , MORE THAN 139 FEET...THIS CALCULATION IS BASED ON THE UPLIFT CAUSED BY THE WATER HEAD.<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE BEEN A SHIP CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS --I HAVE MORE EXPERTISE ON WATER ( THEORY AND PRACTICAL ) THAN THESE LAWYER TURNED JUDGES, WHO WERE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..AND THE THINK TANKS WHO ADVISED THESE JUDGES..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SIDEWAYS FORCE OF ACCUMULATED BOTTOM SILT CAUSED BY WATER HEAD , IS ACTING ON THE GRAVITY DAM. THIS IS CALCULATED BY THE RANKINE FORMULA ON A VERTICAL WALL WHICH ERRS ON THE DANGEROUS SIDE AS THE BOTTOM WALL SLOPES ( A SAILBOAT MOVES AHEAD BY USING A WEDGE IN HEAD WINDS ) . .<br />\n<br />\nMORE CRITICAL-- THE SOFT SILT OFFERS NO PASSIVE PRESSURE.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS IN ADDITION TO VERTICAL WATER PRESSURE ON SLOPING PART OF THE DAM UNDER THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVEL.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A HYDRAULIC GRADIENT ACTING UPWARDS FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE DAM WALL KNOWN AS UPLIFT. WATER ENTERS FISSURES OF THE FOUNDATION MATERIAL DUE TO WATER HEAD PRESSURE ..<br />\n<br />\nCRITICAL : THE WEIGHT OF THE MASONRY OF THIS GRAVITY DAM WHICH IS REDUCED SEVERELY BY RAISING WATER LEVEL TO THE HEIGHT OF 142 FEET AS THE STUPID SUPREME COURT JUDGES ORDERED..<br />\n<br />\nIF THE MULLAPERIAR DAM BREACHES--IT WILL BREACH THE CHERUTHONI DAM WALL ( IDUKKI DAM SPILLWAY ) ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE COMBINED WATER FLOW OF IDUKKI RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR RESERVOIR WILL KILL LAKHS OF PEOPLE AND DIVIDE KERALA INTO NORTH AND SOUTH KERALA WITH A WATER BODY IN BETWEEN.<br />\n<br />\nTAKE THIS FROM AN EXPERT..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP INS BETWA CAPSIZED AT MUMBAI LOCK GATES- NOBODY KNEW WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TILL CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TOLD THE NAVY FOOLS.<br />\n<br />\nREAD THE COMMENT DATED DEC 6TH 2016, IN THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_28.html?showComment=1538222792037#c2209668059005708675\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 29, 2018 at 5:36 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS NOT GIVEN POWERS TO THE JUDICIARY TO STRIKE DOWN LAWS, CREATE NEW LAWS OR TAKE UP PUBLIC INTEREST LITIGATION ( PIL ) WHICH AFFECTS THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF INDIA\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nJUDICIARY TAKING ARBITRARY DECISIONS BY PIL ROUTE FOR THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF THE NATION, IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION OR\u2014OR BY ANY STATUTE OR ACT.. ..<br />\n<br />\nTAKING DECISIONS WHICH AFFECT THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE NATION IS THE SOLE PREROGATIVE OF THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS..WHO ARE ACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE AND THE WATAN\u2026. THIS IS THE MEANING OF DEMOCRACY..<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER \u201cWE THE PEOPLE \u201c ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION\u2014OUR REPRESENTATIVES IN A DEMOCRACY ARE THE ONES WE ELECT\u2026 NOT COUPLE OF JUDGES IMPOSED ON US BY AN ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM SYSTEM\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWE EXPECT OUR LEGISLATURE TO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE DHARMA\u2026NOT OBJECTIVE \u201c BLIND JUSTICE \u201c WHICH TRAMPLES ON OUR PRICELESS CULTURE \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM....INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES.. AS A RESULT DESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES HAVE HIJACKED OUR DEMOCRACY BY FILING PIL USING THEIR NGOs AND BRIBES TRAITORS..<br />\n<br />\nCOLLEGIUM judges rush to say -- Legislative and executive lethargy has actually forced us to step in and fill up the void . ..<br />\n<br />\nHey, MELORDS what about your own backlog of cases ? .. You have more than 3.41 crores cases pending.. Thousands of undertrails are awaiting justice for petty crimes which they have not committed...<br />\n<br />\nWhile 2.97 crore cases are pending in the subordinate courts, the backlog clogging the High Courts and Supreme Court (SC) is 43.5 lakh and 59,200 cases, respectively\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe Delhi High Court has so many cases pending, it would take a MIND BOGGLING 472 years for it to clear its backlog\u2026</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">JUDGES CAN ONLY JUDGE FOR A SPECIFIC CASE FOR AN AGGRIEVED INDIVIDUAL OR SMALL GROUP OF LIMITED NUMBERS&nbsp; \u2026 FOR AN AGGRIEVED NATION OF 1300 MILLION PEOPLE WE HAVE AN ELECTED DEMOCRATIC SYSTEM..</span></div>\n<br />\nThe first reported case of PIL in 1979 focused on the inhuman conditions of prisons and under trial prisoners ( Hussainara Khatoon v. State of Bihar)\u2026 this is OK\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION WILL NOT ALLOW UNACCOUNTABLE JUDGES TO CREATE PATHETIC RULINGS WHICH WILL BE USED AS A LIFE LONG GOSPEL FOR THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF THE WATAN ( ADULTERY ETC ) \u2014 WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING THE CONTEXT..<br />\n<br />\nJUDGES DID NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG WHEN 5.1 LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS WERE ETHNICALLY CLEANSED AND SUBJECTED TO GENOCIDE\u2026 THOUSANDS OF HINDU TEMPLES WERE RAZED DOWN IN KASHMIR. ..<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T WANT JUDGES TO SAVE INDIA..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">WE ASK THE LEGISLATURE TO CREATE AN IMMEDIATE LAW WHICH RESTRICTS THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHICH CAN BE AFFECTED BY A PIL RULING BY JUDGES \u2026</span></div>\n<br />\nDEFINITELY OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF 1300 MILLION PEOPLE TO COME UNDER PIL\u2026SO THAT JUDGES CAN ACT GOD --&nbsp; &nbsp; AND THAT TOO TO KEEP DESH DROHI FOREIGN FORCES ( example: HOMOSEXUALITY\u2014 ANIMAL LUST CONVERTED BY MAGIC TO LOVE ) HAPPY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">THE DEEP STATE ( BIG BROTHER) NOW RULES INDIA..</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />\nWE WATCH..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\nPUT ABOVE CRITICAL COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF-<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nPMO<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nEVERY RSS SHAKHA LEADER<br />\nRSS CHIEF MOHAN BHAGWAT<br />\nABVP<br />\nVHP<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nEVERY HINDU STALWART<br />\nEVERY HINDU ORG<br />\nEVERY LOK SABHA MP<br />\nEVERY RAJYA SABHA MP<br />\nEVERY MLA OF EVERY STATE<br />\nEVERY MINISTER OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nIGs OF ALL STATES<br />\nEVERY MINISTER/ MINISTRIES OF CENTRE AND STATE<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCJI DIPAK MISRA<br />\nROHINGTON NARIMAN<br />\nINDU MALHOTRA<br />\nKHANWILKAR<br />\nCHANDRACHUD<br />\nMARKANDEY KATJU<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT JUDGES.<br />\nALL HIGH COURT JUDGES F INDIA..<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL SUPREME COURT LAWYERS.<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA.<br />\n<br />\nALL MY READERS MUST CO-OPERATE.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In June 12, 1975 verdict of the Allahabad High Court convicting then Prime Minister Indira Gandhi of electoral malpractices and debarring her from holding any elected post..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The verdict delivered by Justice Jagmohanlal Sinha, led to imposition of Emergency in India on June 25, 1975.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Justice Jagmohal Lal is infamous for his 1975 ruling in the State of Uttar Pradesh v. Raj Narain lawsuit in which he invalidated the election of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The petition challenged her election to the Lok Sabha in 1971 from the Rae Bareli parliamentary constituency in Uttar Pradesh, which MAD CAP Raj Narain had also contested..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The judgement in itself ran to 259 pages.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Indira Gandhi was declared guilty of corrupt practices and her election to the Lok Sabha was declared null and void. She was charged under Section 123(7) of the Representation of the People Act. She was also disqualified from contesting elections for six years.. R Fali Nariaman - Son of noted lawyer Fali Nariman<br />\n8. Uday Lalit - Son of U R Lalit, ex judge Delhi HC<br />\n9. D Y Chandrachoodh - Son of ex CJI Y V Chandrachoodh<br />\n10. K M Joseph - Son of K K Mathew ,ex SC Judge<br />\n<br />\nTotal 25 Judge Out of which 12 are relatives of Judges, politician or Advocates..<br />\n<br />\nRoughly 1500 judges in HC &amp; SC since 1947 come from 250 families.<br />\n<br />\nSAB MIL BHAANTKE KHATE HAIN ...<br />\n<br />\n################################################<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE OF INDIA KNOWS HOW SHANTI BHUSHAN BECAME LAW MINISTER -- BY REPRESENTING DEEP STATE AGENT , MAD CAP RAJ NARAIN ..<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW HOW SHANTI BHUSHANs SON PRASHANT BHUSHAN WHO WAS DOING IIT SUDDENLY LUMPED INTO THE LAWYER BOAT.. WE KNOW HOW PRASHANT BHUSHAN CONVERTED COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO KINGS --NAY--GODS BY PIL ROUTE !<br />\n<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE HAVE WOKEN UP.. WE WANT NJAC ( OR IIT TYPE ENTRANCE EXAM FOR JUDGES ) , NOT THE ROTTEN DEEP STATE CONTROLLED COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SYSTEM WHICH IS NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK THE LEGISLATURE TO CREATE AN IMMEDIATE LAW WHICH RESTRICTS THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHICH CAN BE AFFECTED BY A PIL RULING BY JUDGES \u2026<br />\n<br />\nWE EXPECT OUR LEGISLATURE TO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE DHARMA\u2026 NOT OBJECTIVE \u201c BLIND JUSTICE \u201c OF COURTS WHICH TRAMPLES ON OUR PRICELESS CULTURE AND THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE AS IN HOMOSEXUALITY/ ADULTERY/ SABARIMALA RULINGS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS NOT GIVEN POWERS TO THE UNELECTED/ UN ACCOUNTABLE JUDICIARY TO STRIKE DOWN LAWS, CREATE NEW LAWS OR TAKE UP PUBLIC INTEREST LITIGATION ( PIL ) WHICH AFFECTS THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE POPULATION OF INDIA\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW THE TRAITORS OF INDIA WHO ARE IN THE DEEP STATE PAYROLL.<br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL 32 PARTS OF THE POST BELOW-- IT IS ONLY 60% COMPLETE ..<br />\n<br THIS SYSTEM IS ILLEGAL AS PER THE CONSTITUTION..<br />\n<br />\nWE EXPECT OUR LEGISLATURE TO DELIVER SUBJECTIVE DHARMA\u2026 NOT OBJECTIVE \u201c BLIND JUSTICE \u201c OF COURTS WHICH TRAMPLES ON OUR PRICELESS CULTURE \u2026<br />\n<br />\nTAKING DECISIONS WHICH AFFECT THE FORTUNES OF THE ENTIRE NATION IS THE SOLE PREROGATIVE OF THE ELECTED LAW MAKERS..WHO ARE ACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE AND THE WATAN\u2026. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE: Al-Biruni wrote an encyclopedic work on India called \u201cTarikh Al-Hind\u201d (History of India) in which he explored nearly every aspect of Indian life, including religion, history, geography, geology, science, and mathematics. My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Over time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">While others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Ibn al-haytham<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ibn fuckin\u2019 al-Haytham or Alhazen has been made out to be the first theoretical physicists, -- a system where a hypothesis must be proved by mathematical evidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Alhazen\u2019s ( Ibn al-Haytham) science of optics is not his own. He just lifted and patented.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">As regards Alzhazen\u2019s OPTICS, the wolrd must know we Indians were masters in TOTAL INTERNAL REFLECTION \u2013 the ultimate in optics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/total-internal-reflection-capt-ajit.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Ptolemy stole from the astronomical data from Surya Siddhanta . The white historians had the gall to LIE that Varahamihira 2660 BC stole from Ptolemy of 155 AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">He went back and patented SWASTIKA ( dhruv / Polaris and sapt rishis/ great bear ) in his own name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">We never affixed author\u2019s names on our books of knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Kodungallur university BLACK BALLED all stealing Greeks . And ancient Greek knowledge suddenly dried up like water in the hot desert sands..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">##########################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Zakariya al-Razi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Muhammad fuckin\u2019 ibn Zakariya al-Razi studied in Kodungallur University in 886 AD. He left behind several translated to Arabic manuscripts on medicine and surgery ( Al Mansuri ) and astronomy. This knowledge of Susruta and Charaka was sold to him for gold . All the manuscripts he left behind were ready made translated knowledge from Kodungllur university ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">###############################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Nasir al-Din al-Tusi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Nasir al-Din fuckin\u2019 al-Tusi studied in Kodungallur University in 1260 AD. He is called the father of Trigonometry This is nonsense . He was NOT a bright student and he was given translated Math knowledge ( Kit\u0101b al-Shakl al-qatt\u0101 ) from the Kerala school of Math in exchange for gold. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">################################<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi</b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Mathematician Muhammad ibn fuckin\u2019 Musa al-Khwarizmi studied in Kodungallur University in Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Fibonacci took his Arabic works to Italy from Bejaya , Algeria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">ALGEBRA is derived from Al-Jabr, one of the two operations he used to solve quadratic equations. Algorism and algorithm stem from Algoritmi, the Latin form of his name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Let me quote wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">QUOTE- Ibn al-Nad\u012bm's Kit\u0101b al-Fihrist includes a short biography on al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b together with a list of the books he wrote. Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b accomplished most of his work in the period between 813 and 833. After the Muslim conquest of Persia, Baghdad became the centre of scientific studies and trade, and many merchants and scientists from as far as China and India traveled to this city, as did al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b. He worked in Baghdad as a scholar at the House of Wisdom established by Caliph al-Ma\u2019m\u016bn, where he studied the sciences and mathematics, which included the translation of Greek and Sanskrit scientific manuscripts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">Al-Khw\u0101rizm\u012b's Z\u012bj al-Sindhind[11] (Arabic: \u0632\u064a\u062c \u0627\u0644\u0633\u0646\u062f \u0647\u0646\u062f\u200e, \"astronomical tables of Sindh and Hind\") is a work consisting of approximately 37 chapters on calendrical and astronomical calculations and 116 tables with calendrical, astronomical and astrological data, as well as a table of sine values. This is the first of many Arabic Zijes based on the Indian astronomical methods known as the sindhind.[22] The work contains tables for the movements of the sun, the moon and the five planets known at the time. This work marked the turning point in Islamic astronomy. Hitherto, Muslim astronomers had adopted a primarily research approach to the field, translating works of others and learning already discovered knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">-UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_ibn_Musa_al-Khwarizmi</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 18.4px;\">LIES WONT WORK ANYMORE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
